GSP29nystik_u:4: viśvavyāpī viśvaśaktiḥ pinākī viśveśāno viśvakṛd viśvamūrttiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:16: kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ vārttikārambha iti śaṅkāṃ nirācikīrṣuḥ sūtrākāroktāśāstraprayojanānuvādapūrvakaṃ vārttikārambhaprayojanaṃ darśayati-yadakṣapāda iti //
GSP29nystik_u:18_1: na tattvanirṇayāya paryāptamiti uddyotakareṇa svanibandhoddyotena tadapanīyata iti
GSP29nystik_u:19: sūtroktaprayojanānuvādaśca prayojanavacchāstravyutpādanena svanibandhasya prayojanavattāṃ prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgaṃ darśayitum,
GSP29nystik_u:21: atra caikaviśatiprabhedabhinnasya duḥkhasyātyantikī nivṛttiḥ śamaḥ, tasmai /
GSP29nystik_u:23: paramakārūṇiko hi bhagavān muniḥ jagadeva duḥkhapaṅkamagnāmuddidhīrṣuḥ śāstraṃ praṇītavān /
GSP29nystik_u:29: tapaḥprabhāva eva hi tāddaśasteṣāṃ yata evaṃvidhāḥ pāpmāno vilīyanta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:31: na hi gajānāmudaryaṃ tejo vaṭakāṣṭhamaśitaṃ pacatītyasmadādīnāmapyudaryeṇa tejasā tathā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:33: avigītaśiṣṭācāraparamparaprāptaḥ paramaśiṣṭena vārttikakāreṇa kṛto 'pīṣṭadevatānamaskāro na śāstre niveśitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:36: tatra saṃkṣepataḥ prathamasūtramanūdya tasya tātparyamāha--pramāṇādipadārthatattvajñānānniḥ- śreyasādhigama ityetacchāstrasyādisūtram /
GSP29nystik_u:38: ādigrahaṇena kramaprāptasyaiva prathamaṃ vyākhyānaṃ yuktam na dvitīyāderiti darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:42: pramāṇādipadārthatatvajñānādityatra hi jñāyate 'neneti jñānamiti vyutpatyā tatvajñānaṃ śāstramucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:44: na hi viṣaghnamantravat svarūpamātreṇa tadavivakṣitārthaṃ niḥśreyasaheturiti padārthatatvāvagamakaraṇatayā śāstramapadiśati,
GSP29nystik_u:46: tena śāstrasya niḥśreyase kartavye pramāṇāditatvāvagamo 'vāntaravyāpāra itayuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:48: pratipādakaṃ ca śāstramiti śāstrapramāṇādipadārthatatvayorjñāpyajñāpakabhāvaśca pramāṇādipadārthatatvajñānaniḥśreyasayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇaśca saṃbandhaḥ sūcito bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:50: patpadārthatattvajñānasya ca yathā niḥśreyasādhigamaṃ pratyupayogaḥ tathāgre nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:58: tasya śāstrasya niḥśreyasādhigamena saha sūtreṇa ghaṭitasya /
GSP29nystik_u:59: kutaścinnimittād vighaṭanaśaṅkāyām anu sūtraghaṭanāyāḥ paścāt sandhasanaṃ ghaṭanam anusandhānam,
GSP29nystik_u:64: tathā hi prameyādīnāṃ tāvatpadārthānāṃ tattvajñānaṃ pramāṇatattvajñānādhīnam /
GSP29nystik_u:65: na hi pramāṇaṃ tattvenānavadhāritaṃ bodhakatvamātraṇa svagocarāvadhāraṇāyālaṃ tāvanmātrasya tadābhāsasādhāraṇyāt,
GSP29nystik_u:70: tathā hi vijñānasca tāvatprāmāṇyaṃ svato vā niścīyate, parato vā?
GSP29nystik_u:77: jñānatvamātraṃ ca tadābhāsasādhāraṇamiti na svataḥ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:83: tacca sarvaṃ svato 'navadhāritaprāmāṇyamākulaṃ sat kathaṃ pūrvaṃ pravartakaṃ jñānamanākulayet?
GSP29nystik_u:84: svato vāsya prāmāṇye kimaparāddhaṃ pravatākajñānena yena tasminnapi tanna syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:85: na ca prāmāṇyaṃ jñāyate svataḥ ityāveditam /
GSP29nystik_u:86: yadā ca saṃvedanaprāmāṇyamaktena krameṇa duradhigamaṃ tadā kaiva kathendriyādīnāmavyabhicārisaṃvedanakāryavyaṅgyapramāṇabhāvānām?
GSP29nystik_u:87: tadeva dṛṣṭārthāḥ pramāṇabhṛtāṃ vyavahārā bhavantu sandehādapi yathātathā,
GSP29nystik_u:90: tasmāt pramāṇādipadārthatattvajñāpanadvāreṇa na śāstraṃ niḥśreyasena saṃbadhyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:107: śāstreṇa tu te nābhidhīyanta iti na niḥśreyasena saṃgatiḥ śāstrasyetvata āha--śāstrasya puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:109: tathāpi sopāyaiva sā atra śreyaḥśabdena vivakṣitā,
GSP29nystik_u:112: śāstraṃ tāvadetat puruṣaśreyaḥ sahopāyenābhidhatta ityanubhavasiddha sadaśakyānuṣṭhānatayāpavaditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:113: sā cedaśakyānuṣṭhānatāpanītā pramāṇata ityādinā saṃhitaṃ niḥśreyasena saha śāstramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:114: śāstrasyetyādi grahaṇakavākyaṃ vivṛṇoti--śāstraṃ punarityādinā upabhogāt prakṣayeṇetyantena /
GSP29nystik_u:121: evaṃ ca kvacit kenacidarthenaikena sūtravākyānāmekavākyatvaṃ samūhaḥ prakaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:125: tadevaṃ śāstrasvarūpaṃ darṃśayitvā nāntareṇa tadarthakathanaṃ puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvamasrū sidhyitīti tadarthaṃ kathayati-- tatpadārthā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:126: nanu pramāṇādīnāṃ pratinaramānantyena durjñānatvamiti tadavasthamevānarthakyaṃ śāstrasya prasaktamityata āha -- ṣoḍaśātmānaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:127: ātmā svabhāvaḥ pramāṇādīnāṃ pramāṇatvādisāmānyaviśeṣa iti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:129: āntargaṇikabhedādānantye 'pi svasāmānyaviśeṣaiḥ saṃgṛhītā na durjñānā iti yato 'sya padārthāḥ pramāṇādayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:135: prāmāṇikatve vā pramāṇādeva tatsiddheḥ śāstrasya vaiyarthyamityata āha--pratyakṣeti /
GSP29nystik_u:139: yadyapi prameyamātmādyapavargāntalakṣaṇamāgamikaṃ tathāpyāgamasyāptapraṇetṛkatayā tatrāpi mūlabhūtamanumānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vāstīti pratyakṣānumāne eva darśite /
GSP29nystik_u:140: nanūktaṃ prāmāṇikatve śāstravaiyarthyamityata āha-- tasya viṣaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:141: vyavaharamāṇā api pramāṇairlaukikā vainayikabuddhivirahiṇo naitān padārthān viviñcate /
GSP29nystik_u:142: aviviktāścete na niḥśreyasāya kalpanta iti anadhigatetyaṅktam /
GSP29nystik_u:145: tatra vivakṣitaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ grahītuṃ saṃbhavinaḥ puruṣaprakārān darśayati--puruṣaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:150: vipratipannasya tu sākṣiṇāṃ purato jalpavitaṇḍābhyāṃ viṣyamāṇasya vigalite 'haṅkāre sandigdhasya sa/
GSP29nystik_u:152: apratipannasyāpi kenacit prakāreṇa sandehamāpādya sāpekṣīkṛtasya pratipādyatā /
GSP29nystik_u:154: asandigdho 'pi tattvapratipādanāya kārūṇikena sandigadhaḥ kṛtvā pratipādyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:156: tathā ca pramātaṇāṃ na pramāṇāntare pravṛttiḥ syādityata āha-- te yadeti /
GSP29nystik_u:166: ihābhimataṃ śreyo nirdhārayituṃ śreyomātrapramārān āha--śreyaḥ punaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiśca /
GSP29nystik_u:169: na vyāsajya kiṃ tu pratyekamityāha-- dṛṣṭaṃ sukha strakcandanavanitādibhogajanma /
GSP29nystik_u:171: evaṃ ca duḥkhanivṛttirapi śreyo dṛṣṭāmadṛṣṭaṃ ceti yojanīyaṃ cakāralopāt /
GSP29nystik_u:182: yadyapi viṣayaḥ śarīramapi tathāpyanyathāsya duḥkhahetubhāva ityāha śarīramiti śarīrāvacchinna ātmapradeśo duḥkhāyatanamiti śarīraṃ duḥkhāyatanamuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:188: sādhanapāratantyaṃ kṣayitvaṃ kāma iti duḥkhahetavaḥ sakalasukhānasaṅginaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:192_1: prasaṃkhyānaparipākaprabhāvāt paritastattadupabhogabhāginaḥ kāyān nirmāya tatttphalopabhāgāt prakṣiṇoti /
GSP29nystik_u:195: ko hi yogaprabhāvādṛte agastya ica samudraṃ pibati,
GSP29nystik_u:203: iyaṃ tu duḥkhavat sukhasyāpyātyantikī nivṛttiriti kathaṃ śreyaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:204: kathaṃ ca prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgamityata āha--puruṣā rāgādimanta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:206: te hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamapyannaṃ madhuratayā āpātaramaṇīyaṃ viṣaviṅgattu mārayatu mā va mīmaradupayu/
GSP29nystik_u:208: ko hi hastagataṃ pādagataṃ karotīti vicintyopabhu/jate /
GSP29nystik_u:218: tadanena prapañcena pramāṇato 'rthapratipattavityādivākyasya tātparyamabhidhāya tadavayavaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyāditi vivarītuṃ bhūmimāracayati--pravṛtterapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:221: na hi tatpravṛtterniḥ- śreyasādhgimalakṣaṇaphalasaṃbandho dṛṣṭo niḥśreyasasyālaukikatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:223: pramāṇamanarthakamiti hi vipratiṣiddhamityata āha-- pramāṇaṃ tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:226: na cāpramāṇe pramāṇābhimāno vinā pramāṇādisādharmyāditi tatsādharmyaṃ pṛcchati--kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:231: kevalamekasminnava viṣaye rajatasamāropāpavādābhyāṃ buddhacorvādhakabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:235: tathā ca samarthā pravṛttiranarthavadvacatirekasaṃpannapramāṇasyārthavattve heturityāha--tasyāḥ samarthāyāḥ pravṛtterhetoḥ punaḥ pramāṇasyārthavattvamarthāvyabhicāritvam /
GSP29nystik_u:243: api tu tadarthajātīyasya śreyohetutāmasakṛdupalabhya saṃpratyupalabhyamānasyārthasya tajjātīyatayā śreyohetubhāvānumānasahito viniścayaḥ pravṛttihetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:246: prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ ca śreyohetutānumānanimittavyāptigrahaṇaṃ ca na samarthāṃ pravṛttiṃ vinā,
GSP29nystik_u:247: na ca samarthā pravṛttistābhyāṃ vivaneti parasparāśrayatā /
GSP29nystik_u:249: cadi pūrvaṃ pramāṇato 'rthapratipattiḥ rviniścitirapekṣitopayatānumānasahitā pravṛttisamārthyamantareṇa kimiti pratipadyate niścinoti apekṣitopāya eveti ca toyameveti ceti?
GSP29nystik_u:258: no khalūpāyatāvinaścayenāpi pravartamānā na anāgataphale sandihate /
GSP29nystik_u:259_0: tadamī saṃdihānā api pravartamānāḥ pravṛttisamārthyāt pramāṇasya tattvaṃ viniścatya
GSP29nystik_u:262: tasya yādṛśatādṛśasyāpīṣṭatvādiṣṭalakṣaṇatvācca phalasya tatsādhanatvaṃ te parīkṣante /
GSP29nystik_u:273: na ca saṃpratitanasya phalajñānasya prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇāyedānīmeva pūrvasya phalajñānasya tajjātīyatvena pramāṇyāvadhāraṇe satyanavastheti /
GSP29nystik_u:278: eteṣu ca madhye yatphalajñānaṃ svapnādyupabhogatulyatayā śaṅkitavyabhicāraṃ tadanabhyāsadaśāpannam /
GSP29nystik_u:280: anumānasya tu pravṛttisāmarthyaliṅgajanmano 'nyasya vā nirastasamastavyabhicāraśaṅkasya svata eva prāmāṇyamanumeyāvyabhicāriliṅgasamutthatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:281: na hi liṅgākāra jñānaṃ liṅgaṃ vinā,
GSP29nystik_u:282: na ca liṅgaṃ liṅginaṃ vineti svata eva gṛhītāvyabhicāliṅgasamutthaṃ niṣkampamupapadyate jñānam /
GSP29nystik_u:285: na ca kāraṇāntarāṇyapīndriyādīni asyārthena gṛhītāvyabhicārāṇi na cārthenāvyabhicārāṇi /
GSP29nystik_u:289: kiṃ tu saṅketagrahaṇamātrāt padārthapratyāyanena vākyārthamadhigamayati śabdaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:292: jñānagatatajjātīyatvaliṅgagrāhiṇaśca jñānasya mānasapratyakṣasya tādṛśasyādṛṣṭavyabhicāratayā parito nirastasamastavibhramāśaṅkasya svataḥ prāmāṇyamiti nānavasthā /
GSP29nystik_u:301: utpannamātrakasya hi bālakasya stanaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāgbhavīyastajjātīyāpekṣitānubhavajanitaḥ saṃskāra āvirasti /
GSP29nystik_u:306: evaṃ pūrvasmin pūrvasmin janmanītyanāditayā na bījāṅkuravat parasparāpekṣiteti /
GSP29nystik_u:310: tadanenoktena krameṇa pramāṇato 'rthapratipatāvityasya śāstrānusandhānavākyatva tātparyaṃ ca samāhitam /
GSP29nystik_u:317: tathā ca niḥśreyasaṃ pratyantaraṅgatvāt pramāṇānnyāyāt pravṛttireva balīyasī, na nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:318: tasmāt pravṛttireva vyutpādanīyā na pramāṇaṃ niḥśreyasaheturapi pravṛtterantaraṅgatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:319: tatredabhupatiṣṭhate pramāṇato 'rthapratipattau satyā pravṛtteḥ samārthyaṃ phalenābhisaṃbandho,
GSP29nystik_u:326: tathāpi pramāṇavyutpādanena pravṛttirapi vyutpāditā bhavatīti pramāṇasya vyutpādanamakāri śāstreṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:332: yathā hi pramāṇapratipattyupāyaṃ pratyācakṣāṇaka evaṃ praṣṭāvyo jāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:342: anyathā nāsi laukiko na parīkṣaka ityunmattavadupekṣaṇīyaḥ syā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:343_1: pravṛttisāmarthyāvat pramāṇa yato 'taḥ sarvaḥ pramātā pramāṇenāvagatārthavattvenārthamavadhārya
GSP29nystik_u:346: artho 'rthaśabdaḥ pramāṇato 'rthapratipattāvityatra sthitaḥ padaṃ vāyakaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:352: atra ca heyahānādhigantavyapadaiḥ pramāṇaprameyayorūpādānād gobalīvardanyāyena saṃśayādiṣu nigrahasthānānteṣu śāstrapadaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:357: tatra heyādicaturvarge cāryamāṇatayārthapadasūcite pramāṇādicaturvarge ca pramāṇasya prādhānyapradarśanārthamidaṃ bhāṣyam /
GSP29nystik_u:368: tadetasmāt prādhānyād vivakṣābhedena trivargadvayāt prāguddeśaḥ pramāṇasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:369: etena yadāhureke yadi prādhānyāt prāthamyaṃ tat prameyasyaiva,
GSP29nystik_u:377: pramāṇādicaturvargastu kathaṃ pradarśita iti pṛcchati--kathaṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:379: tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ vyākhyāyāvayavārthaṃ vyākhyātumupakramate--tadidaṃ vākyāmavayavaśa upanyasya varṇyate vyākhyāyate 'vayavaśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:380: tatrāsyāvayaveṣu vyākhyātavyeṣu prāthamyāt pramāṇata iti vivṛṇoti--tatreti /
GSP29nystik_u:382: nimittapañcamī cet kasmāt pramāṇāditi nābhihitamityata āha-- asyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:391: yatra dvayorbahūnāṃ vā saṃpalvaḥ pramāṇānāṃ tatraikaikasyāpyasti pratipattisādhanatvaṃ pramāṇasyeti kathayituṃ saṃplavāvasare 'pi pramāṇenetyaṅktam /
GSP29nystik_u:397: kasmāt punaḥ karaṇārtho gamyata ityata āha--pramāṇeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:399: atra ca karaṇabhāvanāntarīyakasya hetubhāvasya pañcamya abhidhānaṃ pramāṇaphalayostādātmyapratiṣedhārtham,
GSP29nystik_u:402: pramāṇaprātipadikalabdhakaraṇatvānuvādaśca pramākārakāntarebhyo 'bhyarhitatvenāsya vyutpādyatvaṃ ca prāthamyaṃ ca yuktamiti darśayituṃ saṃplavamākṣipati--saṃplaveti /
GSP29nystik_u:405: viśiṣṭo bhinno viṣayo yeṣāṃ tāni tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:420: tadidamanādivāsanodbhūtavikalpadhiṣṭhānaṃ vikalpākārasya vā alīkasya vā bāhyatvamanumānagācaro 'bhyupeyam /
GSP29nystik_u:424: tad vijñānādau bhāve śaśaviṣāṇādau cābhāve sādhāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:425: bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇaśca vikalpagocaro 'sti ghaṭo nāsti ghaṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:426: yadi punarasādhāraṇo bhāvo bhaved astiśabdo na prayujyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:430: na cālīkasya sarvasāmarthyavirahiṇaḥ paramārthasattā svalakṣaṇena sādṛśyaṃ manyate 'nyavyāvṛteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:431: na ca gauriti niyatau buddhivyapadeśau vināścādivyāvṛttim /
GSP29nystik_u:432: tasmāt sāmānyamanyavyāvṛttirūpamabāhyaṃ bāhyabhedāgrahād bāhyatvenāvagāhyamānamanumānaṃ bāhyo pravartayati /
GSP29nystik_u:433: pāramparyeṇa ca bāhyapratibandhād bāhyaṃ prāpayat saṃvādakaṃ sad bhrāntamapi pramātrāśayavaśāt pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:439: na ca sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāmanyadasti prameyāntaraṃ yatraite tat saṃploṣyete ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:441: yathā caitat tathā tatra tatra nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:449: nāsti vaiyarthyamadhigatīnāmāśutaravināśitayā tadgocarādhigatyantarotpādaṃ prati pramāṇāntarasyārthavattvādityata āha--adhigataṃ cārthamadhigamayatā pramāṇeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:451: tathāpyekatarapramāṇajanitārthādhigalibdhajanmanaḥ saṃskārādeva sthāyinastadarthasmṛtisantatisaṃbhāvād adhigamarthamadhigamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭaṃ piṣṭaṃ syāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:458: nāpi svakāraṇabalalabdhajanmāni pramāṇāni dirśito 'yamartho 'nyatamena cāsmāsu pramāṇena,
GSP29nystik_u:466: cattu pramāṇaṃ pramitsādhīnapravṛtti tadyadi pramātā na vyāpārayet kimāyātaṃ pramāṇasya?
GSP29nystik_u:467: na hi toyamapi pipāsunā na pīyata iti tasya pipāsopaśamanaśaktirapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:470: sa eva cānena sāmagrībhedaḥ pradarśitaḥ anyathā pratyakṣeṇetyādinā /
GSP29nystik_u:473: yadi ca dravyaṃ tvacā gṛhītamiti kṛtaṃ cakṣuṣā,
GSP29nystik_u:477: tathā ca saṃplavavaiyarthye 'pi vyavasthāyāṃ na vaiyarthyamityāha--viṣayāntara iti /
GSP29nystik_u:500: jñāpakatvena kāryatvena vā kathañcidarthasaṃbandhe saṃskārasyāpi tat samānamiti tasyāpi smṛtirūpopalabdhihetoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ prasaktam /
GSP29nystik_u:502: pramāsādhanaṃ hi pramāṇam na ca smṛtiḥ pramā /
GSP29nystik_u:505: tasmāt taddhetuḥ pramāṇamiti na smṛtihetau prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:506: anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ ca dhārāvāhikavijñānānāmadhigatārthagocarāṇāṃ lokaprasiddhapramāṇabhāvānāṃ pramāṇyaṃ vihantīti nādriyamahe /
GSP29nystik_u:509: na cādyenaiva vijñānenopadarśitatvādarthasya pravartitatvāt puruṣasya prāptitvāccottateṣām,
GSP29nystik_u:514: pradarśana ca pūrvavaduttareṣāṃ vijñānāmabhinnamiti kathaṃ pūrvameva vijñānaṃ pramāṇa nottarāṇyapi?
GSP29nystik_u:516: na cātidavīstayā tadarthasya heyatayā tadapi puruṣasyāpekṣitam,
GSP29nystik_u:519: upalabdhihetuṃ ca pramāṇaṃ vadatā anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ cārthasārūpyaṃ cātmānātmaprakāśanaśaktiśca pramāṇamiti nirastāni bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:521: upalabdhihetuṃ ca pramāṇaṃ vadatā anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ cārthasārūpyaṃ cātmānātmaprakāśanaśaktiśca pramāṇamiti nirastāni bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:531: sarvaḥ karttā karaṇagocaravyāpāro na tu sākṣāt phale vyāpriyate /
GSP29nystik_u:533: tatra siddhaṃ paraśvādi dārūdvaidhībhāvāyodyamyodyamya dārūṇi nipātayan dārū cchinattītyucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:535: kiṃ tu sparśavadvegavataḥ karaṇībhūtasya paraśoḥ saṃyogasyodyamananipātanalakṣaṇastu kartṛvyāpāraḥ paraśugocara eva /
GSP29nystik_u:536: evaṃ svargakāmo 'pi kartā na sākṣāt svarge vyāpriyate,
GSP29nystik_u:540: asiddhaṃ ca tatsannikarṣādi vyāpārayannutpādayan vā karaṇa eva caritārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:541: karaṇaṃ tvindriyādi tatsannikarṣādi vā nānyatra cāritārthamiti sākṣādupalabdhāveva phale vyāpriyate /
GSP29nystik_u:544: indriyameva tu tattatsannikarṣādi vā sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:545: tataḥ siddhametat na pramātā sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ kartṛtvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:546: yo yaḥ kartā sa sarvo na sākṣāt phalahetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:550: tathā pratyakṣaṃ prameyaṃ na sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:552: yad yat prameyaṃ vattat sarvaṃ na pramāheturanumeyādivat /
GSP29nystik_u:555: tadidaṃ pramātṛprameyayoḥ pramāṇe caritārthatvamacaritārthatvaṃ ca pramāṇasya,
GSP29nystik_u:557: pramātṛprameye tu phaloddeśena pravṛtte iti taddhetū kathañciditi /
GSP29nystik_u:562: yadā jñānaṃ pramāṇa tadā jñānasya pramāṇasyotvattāvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:572: astu tarhi tadīyo 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ kārakam,
GSP29nystik_u:573: tasyāpi pradhānakriyāyāṃ nimittatvādityata āha--na ca kriyāmātramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:576: kva tarhi kārakaśabdaḥ pravartata ityata āha--kārakaśabdo hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:578: dvaidhībhāve hi phale pradhānavyāpāre kartuḥ karaṇagocara udyamananipātanādiḥ avāntaravyāpāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:581: tasmādavāntarapradhānavyāpārasaṃpannaṃ kārakamiti sāmānyataḥ prasādhya prakṛte yojayati--pramātṛprameyaśabdau ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:590: tat kasya hetorapacatyapi pākasaṃbandhaṃ pratyasti svarūpśaktirdevadattādāviti?
GSP29nystik_u:591: dvayī hi śaktiḥ kārakāṇāṃ kāryopajananaṃ prati svarūpaṃ ca sahakārigrāmasamavadhānaṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:593: satyapi ca svarūpe trekālyavyāpini trekālyayogikāryāsaṃbhave 'pravṛtteḥ traikālyayogikāryopahitamaryādameva svarūpaṃ kārakaśabdānāṃ pravṛtau nimittamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:594: asatyapi pratyutpannapramāhetupramāṇasaṃbandhe pramātṛprameyaśabdayoḥ pravṛttiriti upapannaṃ pramātṛprameyābhyāṃ pramāṇa janyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:598: sādhākatamāsādhakatamayoḥ sādhakatame kāryasaṃpratyayāt sātiśayatvenodbhūtattvāt tasyetyāha--sādhakatamatvād veti /
GSP29nystik_u:600: uttaram--pramāṇasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ pramāyāḥ kāryasya tadvattā bhāvābhāvavattā sādhakatamārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:602: na tu pramātṛprameyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānamapyasti pramāyā anvayavyatirekayorityata āha--na pramātarīti /
GSP29nystik_u:605: pramātṛprameye hi pramāṇopakṣīṇavṛttinī na pramāyāṃ vyāpriyete /
GSP29nystik_u:607: pramāṇasya vyāpāre tu pramā bhavatyeveti kalpāntaramāha- yadvān vā pramimīte so 'tiśayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:608: pramimīta iti svatantraṃ kartāraṃ daśayati pratipādyāt karaṇād vyavacchettum /
GSP29nystik_u:615: pramātā prameyavānapi kvacid bhavet tattantratvāt prameyasya /
GSP29nystik_u:629: tacca siddhamasiddha vā pramātṛprameyavyāpārasya paścādeva tathātvena saṃpadyata iti caramabhāvītyucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:631: tathā tantūnāṃ paṭe janayitavye 'ntyāḥ saṃyogabhedā yadanantaraṃ paṭa utpadyata eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:634: ata eva tadanantaraṃ pratipatteḥ pramāyā bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:643: na ca prameyamekasyāpi prameyasya saṃplave sarvapratipattisādhāraṇyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:644: pramāṇāni tu yathāyathaṃ catasṛṣvapi pramitiṣvasādhāraṇānīti bhinnabuddhivyapadeśanibandhanāni /
GSP29nystik_u:650: nāsau pramātrā prameyeṇa vā śakyo viśeṣṭum,
GSP29nystik_u:653: eve sukhādiprameyāṇāmapi mana evāsādhāraṇaṃ vyavacchedaṅka draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:657: kasmāt punarniṣidhyate pramāṇaviṣayā pratipattirityata āha--yato na pramāṇaviṣayeti /
GSP29nystik_u:669: samarthapravṛttijanikā hi pratipattirnāpramāṇādbhāvatītyarthādeva pramāṇāditi gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:676: arthapratipattistu pramāṇakāryeti samarthā pravṛttiḥ pramāṇakāryā satī pramāṇasyārthavattvamanumāpayati /
GSP29nystik_u:678: anyathā pramāṇamarthavadarthapratipatteḥ masarthapravṛttijanakatvāditi kiṃ kena saṃgatam?
GSP29nystik_u:681: sa evārtho yasya pramāṇagrahaṇasya tat tathoktam /
GSP29nystik_u:683: tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati--pramāṇakāryāyā arthaprapitteḥ pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ na tadābhāsakāryāyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:685: tadidamuktam--tad yeha pramāṇena pratipattiḥ sā pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ pratipādayati pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:688: pravṛttisamārthyaṃ pratipadyamānaṃ prāpnuvattat pratipādayati prāpayati pramāṇakāryārthapratipattiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:689: idamapi pramāṇagrahaṇasya prayojanamityāha-- na ca pramāṇagrahaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:693: sarvasya sukhaduḥkhataddhetutvena heyapakṣanikṣepāt upādeyānāṃ pramāṇaśāstrāpavargāṇānāmabhāvaprasaṅgād vyāghātaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:701: na caitanniḥśreyasahetuṃ śāstraṃ praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya tadanuvartino vā bhāṣyakārasya vivikṣitamityāha--na ca pramāṇādihānaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP29nystik_u:706: na kevalaṃ vyāghātāśakyahānāvivakṣitatvairarthapadena na sarvasaṃgraho 'śakyatvādapi na sarvasaṃgraha ityāha--na saṃvida iti /
GSP29nystik_u:707: sukhaduḥkhataddhetutayā na saṃvido grahaṇaṃ saṃgrahaḥ sarvamadhyapatitāyā api /
GSP29nystik_u:711: na tāvat sarvā eva saṃvidaḥ saṃvidgocarā manoyonayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:717: na ca sukhaduḥkhe tatreturiti na sarvasaṃgrahaḥ saṃvido 'saṃgrahādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:718: tadevamādivākya vyākhyāya bhāṣyavākyāntaramavatārya tatraikaderśivyākhyānaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati--so 'yaṃ pramāṇārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:722: prāṇabhṛdbhedasyāparisaṃkhyeyatvāditi ca hetuḥ śvetaḥ prāsādaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāditivanna pratijñārthena saṅgacchate ityāha--prāṇabhṛdbhedasya ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:725: kaṇṭakādiviṣayaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ duḥkhotpādaprayojanamevetyetadubhayaṃ parisaṃkhyātuṃ niyantumaśakyamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:728: svābhāvikatve nīla iva sarvān pratyarthaḥ sukha iti karabhavanmanuṣyāṇāmapi kaṇṭakaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:731: evaṃ tṛṣṇaja ivāpāṃ suhitasyāpaḥ sukhāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:734: nivedayiṣye hi kṣaṇabhaṅgādhikāre tathā sthemabhājāmapi vastunāmakramāṇāmapi kramavatsahakārikāraṇasamavadhānavaśādupajanāpāyadharmāṇaḥ kramavanto dharmā bhavantīti, tadihāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:735: yadyapi na jātyā sukhaduḥkhahetubhāvo bhāvanāṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:744_0: kasmāt punaḥ pramātrādicaturvarge pramāṇasyaivārthavattvamucceta na pramātrādīnāmapītyāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:744_1: bhāṣyamanuvadanneva vyācaṣṭe-- arthavati ca samarthe samyagarthe 'rthāvyabhicāriṇīti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:746: arthasya tu samyaktvamidameva yad yādṛśaḥ pramāṇenopadarśistasya tathātvaṃ na punaranyathābhāva iti /
GSP29nystik_u:748: tadaivaṃ vyākhyānam-- arthavati ca prayojanavati ca yataḥ samarthaṃ śaktaṃ pramāṇa pratipattyādikrameṇa pūrvoktena prayojanaṃ prati,
GSP29nystik_u:749: ataḥ samarthe pramāṇe pramātrādīnyarthavanti prayojanavanti bhavanti,
GSP29nystik_u:750: yatastānyapi pramāṇavadeva samarthāni śaktāni prayojanaṃ pratīti,
GSP29nystik_u:756: tad yathā śivikāvahanapakrame puruṣamānayeti puruṣaśabdo viṣṭau /
GSP29nystik_u:757: tadvadihāpi pramātrādiparihāṇyā pramāṇasyārthavattvābhidhānaniyamaprakrama iti pramātrādibhyaḥ pramāṇasya viśeṣo vācya iti tatraivānyatamaśabdo vartate /
GSP29nystik_u:759: tathāpyadṛṣṭe viṣaye na tajjanitaprapittayavyabhicāreṇāvyabhicāraḥ śabdasya pramāṇasya śakyo vijñātum,
GSP29nystik_u:763: adṛṣṭārthaviṣayasya ca caturvargasyehārthavattvena prayojanaṃ dṛṣṭārthe sandehādapi vyavahāra siddheḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:770: na khalvīpsājihāsayorvā pravṛttau vā svāntryaṃ pramātṛtvam,
GSP29nystik_u:772: ipsādisvātantryeṇa tu taduttarakālabhāvinā pramāyāṃ svātantryaṃ parvakālābhāvyupalakṣim /
GSP29nystik_u:774: na hi sarvaḥ kartā samastakārakajanyaṃ svargādi vaudanādi vā bhuṅkte ṛtvikpācakādiṣu ca vyabhicāradarśanāt /
GSP29nystik_u:775: kārakasya tu sataḥ kartṛtvottarakālabhāvinī phalopabhoktṛtā kartṛvanāntarīyakatayā dupalakṣayati,
GSP29nystik_u:778: tadabhisandhipūrvakaṃ preṣaṇamadhyeṣaṇaṃ va yuktaṃ tasarvaṃ pacyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:781: kārakābhidhānena sannidhāpitāṃ kriyaṃ taditi sarvānāmnā parāmṛśati /
GSP29nystik_u:782: yasya hi vyāpāraṃ prādhānyena dhāturākhyātapratyayo vābhidhatte sa svatantraḥ kartā /
GSP29nystik_u:794: acetanasya tu bhāktava kartṛtvaṃ na svābhāvikamiti bhāvaḥ parisamāptipadārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe--tattvaparisamāptiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:797: paryavasānaṃ parisamāptiḥ viniyojyeti vaktavye yogyatāgrahaṇamīpsite 'pi dṛṣṭe vastuni kutaścit pratibandhāt puruṣeṇānupātte mā bhūt tattvāparisamāptiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:798: yadyapi hi tat puruṣeṇānupāttaṃ tathāpyupādānayogyatāpradarśanādasti tattvaparisamāptiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:799: tatpratiṣedhaśca ityatra tacchabdena hānopādānalakṣaṇaṃ viniyogaṃ parāmṛśati //
GSP29nystik_u:808: pṛthivyāpastejovayuriti vā catvāri bhūtānītyādīti na tado vācyāni bhavantītyata āha-- pramāṇaviṣayatvenādhikārāt /
GSP29nystik_u:809: sūtrabhāṣyavākyatadvivaraṇeṣu pramāṇa pramāṇaviṣayaścādhikṛtaḥ na ca saṃkhyādisiddhāntabhedānupātino 'rthāḥ pramāṇaviṣayāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:831: yadi sadasatī samarthe kutastarhi tayormeda ityata āha--svatantreti /
GSP29nystik_u:836: saṃprati sadupalambhakasya pramāṇasyāsadūpalambhakatvaṃ pratipipādayiṣatā bhāṣyakāreṇa pradīpo dṛṣṭānta upanyastaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:839: gopālāṅganā api hi kimatrāsti steno 'smaddhanaṃ vā apavarake na veti sandihānā pradīpamupādāya samantādavalokyāpavarakamastīhāsmaddhanaṃ nāsti stena iti samameva niścinvanti,
GSP29nystik_u:841: tenāgāpālāḍnamā ca paṇḍitarūpebhyaḥ siddhaḥ pradīpo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:843: anāśrayaṇe hetumāha pradīpena dṛśyamāne hi ghaṭādike 'rthe svatantre nānena samānajātīyaṃ tulyopalambhayogyataṃ dṛśyāntaramasti /
GSP29nystik_u:853: tadevaṃ laukikaparīkṣakasaṃmataṃ dṛṣṭāntamupapādya dārṣṭāntike yojayati--eve pramāṇenāpi indriyādinā sati pramīyamāṇe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:858: kasmāt sadbhedā ivāsadbhedā api sūtrakṛtā nocyanta ityata āha--tatra teṣu sadasadbhedeṣu madhye svātantryeṇāsadbhedā na prakāśanta iti nocyante /
GSP29nystik_u:859: niṣedhyaniṣedhādhikāraṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvādasadbhedānāṃ bhāvabhedatantraṃ pramāśanamiti bhāvabhedakathanenaivābhāvabhedā api gamyanta iti noktā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:860: atha vā kathitā eva yeṣāṃ tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasopayogi,
GSP29nystik_u:861: yaṃ tu na tathā na teṣāṃ prapañcaḥ anupayuktabhāvaprapañca iva vaktavya ityāha--caturvargānantarbhāvād vā bhāvaprapañcavad abhāvaprapañca iti /
GSP29nystik_u:864: atha niḥśreyasopayogābhāvaḥ kuto 'vagantavya ityata āha--bhāvopadeśādevābhāva upadiṣṭo bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:870: tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ vyākhyāya avayavārthaṃ vyākhyātuṃ bhāṣyaṃ paṭhati--sacca khalu ṣoḍaśadhāvyūḍhamupadekṣyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:875: dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthike caḥ samucce,
GSP29nystik_u:879_0: sūtrasya saprapañca tātparyaṃ vyākhyāya avayavārthaṃ vyācikhyāsunā bhāṣyakāreṇa tāsāṃ
GSP29nystik_u:879_1: khalvāsāṃ sadvidhānāmiti bhāṣyeṇa sūtramavatārya paṭhitaṃ tadasya vārtikakṛt tātparyamāha--ta
GSP29nystik_u:880: ta ete pramāṇādayaḥ sadbhedā niḥśreyasopayogino na gaṅgāvālukādayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:885: bahuvrīhikarmadhārayayorasaṃbhāvāt ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaparigrahe nigrahasthānasyāntyapadārthasya prādhānye vivakṣitārthahānaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:887: anyonyanirapekṣāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ pramāhetubhāvaḥ pramāṇānāmiti hi bahuvacanaprayojanam /
GSP29nystik_u:888: prameyeṣu tu yadyapi prameyatā vāstavī pratyekamasti tathāpyapavargahetubhāvena prameyatā samudāye samāpyate,
GSP29nystik_u:890: ātmādīnāmanyamatasyāpyatattvajñāne saṃsārānanivṛtteriti yadeva hi nirdeśa vacanabhedasya prayojanam,
GSP29nystik_u:893: pramāṇādīnāmiti vibhaktyarthavyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ paṭhitvā pṛcchati--kaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:898: kārakagrahaṇena ca tannāntarīyakatayā pradhānakriyāpyānīteti vivaraṇe sāpi darśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:899: yadyapi svasvāmibhāvādāvapi saṃbandhe 'ntargataḥ kriyākārakasaṃbandho 'sti saṃbandhamātrasya kriyāgarbhatvāt tannāntarīyakatvācca kārakasya,
GSP29nystik_u:909: iṣusthityā yathā tadbhāvapratiṣedha iṣobhāvo dharmo gatiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:912: evamatrāpi na pramāṇaprameyādimātramacyate tattvagrahaṇenāpi tvarthāntaraṃ teṣveva yat yat samāropitaṃ rūpamanyathātvamiti yāvat tat pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:917: tena gati mattvamarthāntaramiṣornabhavatītyasminnarthe iṣoḥ sthitiriti prayujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:919: pramāṇadibhyo 'narthāntarasya tattvasya ca iṣoranarthāntarasya gatyabhāvasya cāsiddheḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:926: sā ca dvayī svrūpalakṣaṇā sahakārisākalyalakṣaṇā ca,
GSP29nystik_u:928: śakteśca bhāvatvena bhavitṛnirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvād bhaviturapi nirūpaṇaṃ bhavatītyuktam //
GSP29nystik_u:930: takrijñadṛṣṭaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ grahītuṃ dṛṣṭamatiprasaṅgāpādanena dūṣayati--eve ca kṛtveti /
GSP29nystik_u:933: yadyapi niḥśreyasapadamabhimatamātravāci pramāṇāditattvajñānasya ca dṛṣṭamapi niḥśreyasaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:943: tasya āgamānumānasahakāriṇā kāraṇābhāvena kāryābhāvānumānamevātrārthe pramāṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:944: ye tu vaiyātyāt manyeran padārthatattvajñānamātrameva paraniḥśreyasaheturiti, yathāhuḥ---
GSP29nystik_u:948: na hi bhāvānāṃ tattvamanyadataḥ pratyakṣaviṣayīkṛtād rūpāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:950: sani muco 'karmakasya guṇo vā iti guṇābhyāsalopau /
GSP29nystik_u:954: kimarthamātmādasūtreṇa dvādaśaiva prameyāṇi nādhikāni na nyūnāni cetyavadhāryate sūtrakārerṇa?
GSP29nystik_u:955: tasmāt tadeva sākṣādupayoti niḥśreyase na padārthamātramityāha--prameyāvadhāraṇārthāyāṃ cotrarasūtraprikriyāyāmakuśalaḥ sūtrakāraḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:957: tasmād yadyupapattiḥ yadi ca sūtrakārabhimatasubhayathāpi prameyatattvaparijñānaṃ parasya niḥśreyasasya hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:959: atha kiṃ tattvajñānasyātmādiviṣayasyādṛṣṭa eva ko 'pi sāmarthyātiśayo yataḥ paraniḥśreyasotpādaḥ, maivam /
GSP29nystik_u:960: kiṃ tarhi? dṛṣṭayaiva dvāretyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ-- taccaitaditi niḥśreyasahetubhāvābhidhānasya anu paścāt udyate anūdyate /
GSP29nystik_u:974: na kevalaṃ heyādhigantavyabhedena dvādaśavidra prameyaṃ darśayataḥ tadviṣayatattvajñānāya ca sopakaraṇanyāyābhidhānapramāṇavyutpādakaṃ śāstraṃ praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya saṃmatam,
GSP29nystik_u:976: tatra saṃśayādīnāṃ pṛthagvacanamanarthakam ityādi codyabhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭesaṃśayādyagrahaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:986: sa cāyaṃ kiṃsviditi vastuvimarśamātramanavadhāraṇajñānaṃ saṃśaya iti bhāṣyam /
GSP29nystik_u:988: saṃśayastāvaditi jñānamavadhāraṇaṃ pratyaya iti paryāyā iti manvānaścādayati--anavadhāraṇātmaka iti /
GSP29nystik_u:990: api tu tidvaśeṣaviścayavacanaḥ kiṃsviditi dolāyamānasyobhayakoṭispṛśaḥ pratyayasyārthe 'navadhāraṇātmakasyāpi pratyātmaṃ mānasena pratyakṣeṇāvadhāryamāṇatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:993: tatra nānapalabdhe ityādi bhāṣyamavatārayituṃ pṛcchati-- sa kathaṃ nyāyasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1001: tasyāśrayo viṣaya upalabdha ucyamāno nirṇota eva vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1002: sandigdhe hi tasmin hetuḥ sandigdhāśrayatayā asiddhaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1011: upalabdho nirṇota iti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyāt samānaviṣayatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1013: sāmānyaviśeṣabhedena tu vyāghātaṃ pariharan sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na samarthayasa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1018: sa eva viśeṣato 'nirṇoto 'pi saṃbhavatīti na vyāghāta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1021: na hi kariṇi dṛṣṭe cītkāreṇa tamanumīme pekṣāvanta iti //
GSP29nystik_u:1030: pūrvasmina kalpe kāma ityevāstu kṛtaṃ dharmādibhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1035: tasmādayuktamediti manvāna āha-- vayaṃ tu paśyāma iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1036: sukhasyāptyā duḥkhasya hānyā viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇaṃ pratyayamupalakṣamati /
GSP29nystik_u:1039: tathāpi sukhaduḥkhāptitahānyoreva kartuḥ pravṛttiprasaṅgo na tatsādhane,
GSP29nystik_u:1040: na hyanyadvijānāti icchati ca karoti cānyaditi ghaṭate,
GSP29nystik_u:1057: tadāśrayaśca nyāyaḥ pravartate iti bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe--tadidaṃ prayojanaṃ nyāyasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1063: na jātu niṣprayojanā kākadantādau parīkṣāmārabhante prekṣāvanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1068: nanvevamapi nīyate prāpyate vivakṣitārthasiddhiraneneti vyupattyā pratyakṣādi pratyekaṃ nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1086: na tadvirodha iti pradarśanārthaṃ bhāṣyamanubhāṣya tātparyāṃ vyācaṣṭe--prayakṣāgameti /
GSP29nystik_u:1087: kathaṃ punaranena bhāṣyeṇa taducyata ityata āha--yadihānumāneneti /
GSP29nystik_u:1093: sa khalu tādṛśaḥ pañcāvayavaprayogo lābhapūjākhyātikāmaiḥ paṇḍitavya/
GSP29nystik_u:1096: tadevaṃ samudāyato bhaṣyaṃ vyākhyāyavayavavibhāgāya paṭhati-yat punaranumānamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1100: na cet, tata eve tarhi tadanumānābhāsamiti kṛtaṃ pratyakṣavirodhena /
GSP29nystik_u:1111: na ca sapakṣāsapakṣāvevānvayavyatirekāgamyāvinābhāvadarśanaviṣayau na pakṣa iti sāmpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:1112: yadi hi pakṣaṃ vihāya bahireva sapakṣāsapakṣayoravinābhāvo gamyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:1113: tadā bahirvyāptimātrabalena pakṣadharmo 'pi heturna pakṣe sādhyaṃ sādhayet /
GSP29nystik_u:1117: evaṃ ca siddhaḥ pakṣe 'pi vyabhicāraḥ sādhanadharmasyetyanaikāntikatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:1120: na hyasti saṃbhavo rūpatrayasaṃpannaṃ viruddhaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1124: sa caivaṃ pravartate--yo yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sa sarvo 'nuṣṇo yathā ghaṭadiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:1125: na ca vahneriva dhūmasaṃbandhe ārdrendhanasaṃyogo gurvantavāsinoḥ sāhacarye iva svādhyāyādhyayanamupādhiḥ kṛtakatvānuṣṇatvayoḥ saṃbandhe upalabhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1126: so 'yaṃ śaṅkitaḥ samāropito vā prayatnena punaḥpunaranviṣyamāṇo 'nupalabhyamānastatra tatra ghaṭādāvupādhirnāstīti pratyakṣeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:1132: kṛtakatvasyānuṣṇatvena svābhāvika autsārgikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sāmānyena yo yaḥ kṛkaḥ sa sarvo 'nuṣṇa ityavadhāritaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1136: tathā ca tatra tatraikadeśe pratyekaṃ vyāptipradarśanamaśakyam, ānanyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1138_1: viśeṣe tejovayavini sādhayitumanuṣṇatonmukhaṃ yanna sādhayet tat kiṃ pratyakṣeṇāpahṛtaviṣayatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:1142: uṣṇe tejovayavini kṛtakatvasya darśanād anaikāntikamapakṣadharmo vā kṛtakatvamiti cet-na,
GSP29nystik_u:1144: pratyakṣeṇa tejo 'vayavina auṣṇyagraheṇa tatra kṛtakatvasya hetorvṛttāvutpannamapi vyāptivijñānaṃ bādhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1147: anyathā tadgatasādhyadharmasandehe tatropalabhyamānaḥ sādhanadharmaḥ sandigdhabyatirekivādanaikāntikaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1155: evaṃ cānumāne dūṣite kṛtamapakṣadharmatvavyabhicārābhyāṃ tadupajīvibhyāmiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1156: yat punaḥ dignāgena pratyakṣaviruddhamanumānamudāhṛtaṃ tadupanyasyati- apare punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:1157: aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭādivaditi bruvāṇaḥ śabdasvarūpamevāpalapati /
GSP29nystik_u:1168: sati vibhave na jīrṇamalavadvāsāḥ stātakaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1170: tadvadihāpi aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti śrutivākyayoḥ sāmarthyāt śrāvaṇatvaviśeṣaṇopasaṃkānto niṣedho na viśeṣyeṇa śabdena saha saṃbadhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1172: vacanārthāvirodhino 'rthasyārthagamyatvānna tadvirodhinaḥ śrāvaṇatvaniṣedhasya cādhikāraṇa śabda iti na śabdābhāve tanniṣedho 'vakalpate /
GSP29nystik_u:1188: uttaram- śuci naraśiraḥ- kapālamiti bruvatā śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇānapekṣeṇānumānamātrasahāyenātra vastuni vayā śucirūpo 'rtho vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1199: kāpalikānāṃ tvāgamavihitamakurvatāṃ kurvatāṃ ca tanniṣiddhamarthaṃ prayatnenānādirapi vyavahāraḥ śākyamallakādīnāmiva na vedānumānamūlamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1203: api cāgamānapekṣo 'numānena śaucaṃ naraśiraḥkapālaṃvyavasthāpayan praṣṭavyo jāyate-- śuci naraśiraḥkapālamiti ko 'rthaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:1204: nanu ca eva vākyāt pratīyate sa evārthaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1205: tat kiṃ pṛcchacata ityata āha--viśeṣavidhānaṃ ca śeṣapratiṣedhaparaṃ loke dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nystik_u:1206: yathā dakṣiṇena cakṣuṣā paśyatīti ukte na vāmeneti gamyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1210: āgamapramāṇyaṃ ca na manyasa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1211: atha trayīvidveṣād anumānapakṣāpātinā tvayā sarvameva naraviṭkapālādi śaucapakṣe nikṣipyata ityāha--atha sarvameva śuci /
GSP29nystik_u:1215: na khalu pramāṇatvena pratyakṣāgamābhyāmanumānasya kaścid viśeṣo yena tau bādhakāvanumānasya nānumānamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1217: ayamabhisandhiḥ---yat tāvadanumānaṃ pūrvapravṛttaṃ tena bādhitaviṣayaṃ tabdalabhāvi paścattanamanumāna na svakāryāya paryāptam,
GSP29nystik_u:1220: na tu jñānākārālīke bahiriti tṛtīye nivradayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1221: tadiha śrāvaṇatvaṃ śabdasya niṣedhatāpūrvaṃ śravaṇamindriyamatīndriya tadgrāhrātvaṃ ca vastunī anumātavye śabdopalambhalakṣaṇena kāryeṇa /
GSP29nystik_u:1222: tathā caitenaivānumānenāpahṛtaviṣayamaśrāvaṇatvānumānaṃ caramamanvayavyatirekasaṃpannamapi na svocitaṃ kāryā janayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1223: eve tanubhuvanādīnāṃ na karteśvaro 'śarīritvānmuktasatmavat prayojanābhāvādityādyāpīśvaradharmigrāhimūlānamānenāpahṛtaviṣayatayā nyāyābhāsaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1225: na hyanayoranyatarad bādhyaṃ bādhaka vā saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1226: kiṃ tu mithaḥ satpratipakṣatayā na pramāṃ kurutaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1228: asamāveśe vā kutaḥ satpratipakṣatetyata āha--na hyanvayavyatirekasampanne iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1230: etaiḥ sampannayoryadi samāveśa ekasmin viṣaye bhavet,
GSP29nystik_u:1231: tata ekatarasya bādhyatvaṃ bādhakatvaṃ vā gamyetāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:1236_1: na pratyakṣeṇa tadviruddhārthopasaṃhāriṇā samāveśa iti na bādhyabādhakabhāva iyabhiprāyeṇa
GSP29nystik_u:1238: tulyabalau hi mithaḥ pratipakṣau bhavataḥ na tu durbalottamabalau /
GSP29nystik_u:1239: na hi bhavati tarakṣuḥ prapikṣo hariṇaśāvakasya,
GSP29nystik_u:1242: pūrvabhāvi pratyakṣamananyathāsiddhaṃ sadasatpratipakṣamanumānaṃ samānaviṣayasamāveśād bādhata iti yuktamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1244: gosadṛśo gavaya ityāraṇyakasya vākyaṃ śrutvā yadā nāgarako vanaṃ gato gosadṛśaṃ piṇḍamupalabhe,
GSP29nystik_u:1245: tadāsya vākyārthānubhavāhitasaṃskāraprabodhajanitasmṛtyapekṣa gosādṛśyajñānamupamānaṃ puro 'vasthitasya piṇḍasya gavayaśabdavācyatvajñāne pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:1247: pramāṇayet naiṣa piṇḍo gavayaśabdavācyo gopiṇḍasādṛśyād gopiṇḍāntaravaditi,
GSP29nystik_u:1258: prayojanasvarūpopayogābhidhānānantaraṃ dṛṣṭāntapade vyākhyātavye tadullaṅghanena vādajalpayoḥ ko 'vasara ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1262: vādajalpakathayorhi na dvayorvādiprativādinoḥ sādhane samīcīne saṃbhavataḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1265: ekasya tu nyāyābhāsa iti vādajalpābhyāṃ vivicyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1274: tathā vitaṇḍacate vyāhanyate 'nayā pratipakṣasādhanamiti vyutpattyā parapakṣopaghātena pāriśeṣyāt svapakṣasiddhirasyāḥ prayojanaṃ pratīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1277: tatra yadi niṣprayojanā tato na sarvā vidyāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1279: tanmukhena ca sarve prāṇinaḥ prayojanena vyāptāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1280: vitaṇḍāyā eva karmarūpāyā vidyārūpāyā vā niṣprayojanātvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1288: na hi parvatanitambavartiti dhūme asiddhatvādinā dūṣite vahnestatrābhāvo niścīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1293: sa tu svapakṣaseddhacaiva prayojanena pratipakṣasādhanamāhantīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1296: atha na pratipadyata ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭa--atha pakṣamapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:1298: nāstiko hi sadasadubhayānubhayarūpatayā na vicāraṃ sahanta iti prameyāṇi sarvathā dūṣayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1300: na tvasyāsti pakṣo na ca sthāpanā /
GSP29nystik_u:1303: edadvibhajate--etasminnapi pakṣe caturvarga cet pratīpadyate so 'sya pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1306: tathāpi tannāntarīyakatayā abhyupagamamātreṇa caturvargo 'pi pakṣa uktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1308: eṣa sādhanavādī jñāpayati--ahaṃ vaitaṇḍiko jāne anena pañcāvayavena sādhānāvākyenedaṃ sādhyaṃ jñāpyata iti caturvargaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1309: tatpratītyā khalvasya vaitaṇḍikasya parapakṣaniṣedhaḥ prayojanaṃ sidhyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1310: tathā ca na viṣprayojano 'yaṃ vaitaṇḍika ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1311: dvitīyaṃ kalpaṃ dūṣayati--atha na pratipadyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1312: caturvarganāntarīyakatvāt dūṣaṇamapi na pratipadyate ityunmattavadupakṣaṇīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1316: athāsiddhaviruddhādīnāṃ sadbhāvābhyupagame prameyamadhyapātināṃ prameyamātravicārāsahatvābhyupagamo vighaṭata iti svavākyābhihitamevāddhiviruddhādi na pratipadyate,
GSP29nystik_u:1319: tasmād vitaṇḍāpi prayojanavatīti nāvyāpakaṃ prayojanamiti siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:1326: nāpi yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1333: anyathā yadaprasiddhaṃ laukikānāṃ kevalaṃ paṇḍitarūpavedanīyaṃ paramāṇvādi tasyādṛṣṭāntatā syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1334: atra ca yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa evam,
GSP29nystik_u:1335: ta tu ya eve sa dṛṣṭānta iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1338: na kevalaṃ prameyavirodhaḥ sūtravirodhaścetyata āha--tataścodāharaṇasūtraṃ vyāhanyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1339: yat teṣu teṣu śāstrapradeśeṣvatīndriyodāharaṇasūtraṃ siddhānte pūrvapakṣe vā yathā,
GSP29nystik_u:1357: saṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ ca śābdasyāpi jñānasya nimittaṃ prathamaśrāviṇaḥ śabdādarthajñānābhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1372: asyāpi prameyāntargratasyāpi sataḥ pṛthagupādānaprayojanamāha--tasya prameya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1375_0: tathā hi yadi ghaṭo nāma na sarvatantrasiddhāntasiddhaḥ kimāśrayā avayavī vā paramāṇusamūho
GSP29nystik_u:1375_1: vā jñānākāro vā pradhānapariṇāmo vā brahmapariṇāmo vā tadvivarto veti pratitantrasiddhāntāḥ pravartante?
GSP29nystik_u:1379: kathaṃ sādhyasāmānyavyāptaṃ sādhanasāmānyamiti sāṇanaviśeṣat sādhyaviśeṣo gamyeta?
GSP29nystik_u:1381: abhyupagamasiddhāntaṃ copariṣṭād vicārayiṣyati vāttikakṛt iti tatprayojanamihāsmābhinogktamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:1383: nanu yathā tantavaḥ paṭasya samavācikāraṇaṃ kiṃ tathaivaite pratijñādayo vākyasya?
GSP29nystik_u:1384: no khalu rāganaguṇā varṇāḥ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ pratipadyanta ityāha-- vākyaikadeśā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1387: yathā hyavayavāḥ samudāyina ekasminnavayavini kārye dhārayitavye ca,
GSP29nystik_u:1388: evamekasmin vivakṣitārthapratipādane pratijñādayo 'vayavā vākyasya samudāyasya samudāyina iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1389: nanu varṇānāmāśutaravināśināṃ kramavatāmekakālatvābhāve samudāyābhāvāt kutastatsamudāyo vākyam,
GSP29nystik_u:1393: kriyā vā kārakaṃ vā prātipadikārtho vā padārthāntaraviśiṣṭo vākyārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1394: yathā somena yajeta godohanena paśukāmasya yasya pitā pitāmaho vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1400: na ca tadaviditaṃ sattāmātreṇa cakṣurādivad viśeṣyaṃ pratipādayatītyata uktam--pratyaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1404: na hi kramavadvarṇasamudāyaḥ padaṃ śravaṇendriyānubhavagocaraḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1414: ata evādhyayanasamaye gurumukhād gṛhīto vedarāśirvedāṅgopāṅgajñānasaṃskṛtena smaryamāṇa eva tasyārthaṃ bodhayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1415: evaṃ ca yadā padārthapratyāyana eva padānubhavo na kāraṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:1417: yadi tarhi viśeṣyapadameva smaryamāṇaṃ viśiṣṭamarthamavagamayati kṛtaṃ padāntaraiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1422: yadyapi smaraṇāni na saha saṃbhavanti tathāpyekasmṛtisamārūḍhāni vā padāni nirantarasmṛtisaṃtānasamārūsani vā parasparāpekṣāṇi /
GSP29nystik_u:1423: tathā ca smaryamāṇaṃ viśeṣyapadaṃ viśeṣaṇapadāpekṣaṃ viśiṣṭamarthamavagamayatīti //
GSP29nystik_u:1431: tathāpi padārthasmṛtiravāntaravyāpārabhūtā apekṣate kāṣṭhānīva pākapravṛttāni jvalanamavāntaravyāpāram /
GSP29nystik_u:1432: na ca padānyagṛhītasaṅketāti padārthān smārayantīti upapannā padārthasmṛtisaṃbandhasaṃvedanayorapekṣeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1434: hanta daśadāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpā bhavantītyevamādīnāmapi vākyārthabodhakatvaṃ syādityata āha--pratisandhīyamānaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1437: na ca daśadāḍimādivākyādiṣu tadastīti na tato vākyārthāvabodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1438: tadevamekasmṛtisamāroheṇa emārthāvacchedena ca padānāṃ samūho vākyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1449: tadgocarastu viniścayaḥ puruṣadharmo niṣpattiriti viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1450: kiyadbhiḥ kimabhidhānaiśca vibhāgaiḥ siddhiḥ parisamāpyata ityāśaṅkya bhāṣyakṛtoktam--tasya pañceti /
GSP29nystik_u:1465: āgamopacārasya ca prayojanamidaṃ yadarthasaṃvādenāgamenānugṛhyate nyāyaḥ saprayojanaśca bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1467: tasmād yadyapi na nyāyamātravartinī pratijñā āgamaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1469: tathā cāgamārthasaṃbandhena pratijñāyāḥ kalpitaviṣayatvamapi parākṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1477_1: liṅgadarśanamātre dṛśyamāne liṅgarūpe saṃbandhasmaraṇarahite hetūpacārāt anumānatvopacārat
GSP29nystik_u:1488: yat tad dvitīyaṃ liṅgadarśanaṃ śuddhamapyāpātataḥ saṃbandhasmṛtihetubhāvāt saṃbandhasmṛti sahakāryeva /
GSP29nystik_u:1490: evaṃ ca tatpratipādakasya vacasa upapanno 'numānatvopacāra iti siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:1491: evaṃ ca vāstavena liṅgena saṃbandhāt tadvacanasya buddhivikālpitaliṅgaviṣayatvaṃ parāstaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1495: yatra pratyakṣaviṣaye pūrvaṃ vyāptirgṛhītā tasya smṛtiriti smṛtiviṣayasya pratyakṣataḥ punarūpadarśanāt avipratipattyā punaḥ smaraṇāt tatsmārakaṃ vacanamudāharaṇaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:1502: upanayo hi tathā caitaditi pravartamāna udāharaṇasthaṃ yathāśabdārthamapekṣata iti yathā tatheti pravartata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1503: kiṃ punarūpamānaṃ yasyāyamekadeśa ityata āha--upamānaṃ khalu tathā gaustathā gavaya ityupadeśopayoge /
GSP29nystik_u:1505: tasmin sati paśvād vanaṃ gato nāgarakaḥ pratyekṣeṇādṛṣṭapūrvaṃ piṇḍaṃ paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1507: piṇḍasya ca purovartinaḥ smaryamāṇena gavā sādṛśyaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1508: tadevaṃbhūtaṃ sārūpyajñānaṃ gavayaśabdavācyo 'yaṃ piṇḍa iti pratītiheturūpamānam /
GSP29nystik_u:1509: tadetasyopamānasyopadeśārthasmaraṇagavayapiṇḍagosārūpyāpratyakṣarūpasyaikadeśe sarūpye yo yathātathābhāvaḥ sa upanaye 'pyastītyetāvatopamānatvopacāra upanaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1512: na khalvavayavānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ vā vākye samavāyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1518: iha tu vibhajyamānānāmavayavānāṃ nanmūlānāṃ ca pramāṇānāṃ sākāṅkṣatvameva dharmaḥ samārthyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1519: tadatra samastarūpasampannaliṅgapratipādanamekaṃ prayojanaṃ vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvaṃ cāstīti siddhamekavākyatvamavayavānāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1521: so 'yamiti bhāṣyamanubhāṣya pṛcchati--kaḥ punaḥ paramaśabdasyārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1524: yadyapi loke pratyakṣādīnāmekaikaśo 'pi vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakatvaṃ tatra tatropalabhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:1532: yata eva vādādipravṛttihetavo 'ta eva tattvavyavasthāyāścāśrayā bhavantīti /
GSP29nystik_u:1542: astu tarhi pramāṇapadasaṃgṛhītebhyaḥ pramāṇebhyaḥ pramāṇāntaramasaṃgṛhītaṃ pramāṇapadena prameyapadenevāsaṃgṛhītāḥ saṃśayādayaḥ prameyā ityata āha--na pramāṇāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:1548: na hi vayaṃ guṇatvenotpattimattvena vā rūpeṇāniścāyakatvaṃ tarkasyācakṣmahe,
GSP29nystik_u:1558: etaduktaṃ bhavati pramāṇaṃ tattvāvadhāraṇāya pravṛttaṃ karaṇatayā itikartavyatāmapekṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:1559: tarkaśca pramāṇaviṣayayuktāyuktavicārātmā pramāṇaṃ yukte tattve pravartamānamanujānan pramāṇamanugṛhṇarati /
GSP29nystik_u:1561: na ca pramāṇaviṣaye cet tarkaḥ pravartate kṛtamasya pramāṇānujñayā,
GSP29nystik_u:1564: asti hi prasaṅgo na prasaṅgo hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1565: tathā hi pratyakṣameva tāvad bhūtale pravartamānaṃ tadviśeṣaṇatayā ghaṭābhāve 'pi pravartamānaṃ yadyatrābhaviṣyad ghaṭo bhūtalamivādrakṣyata,
GSP29nystik_u:1568: tasmānnāstīti tarkeṇānujñāyamānaṃ ghaṭābhāviśiṣṭe bhūtale pravartate kevalamevedaṃ bhūtalaṃ neha ghaṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1569_0: evaṃ svargakāmo yajeta iti śabdo 'pi pravartamānaḥ paramāptasya bhagavatar iśvarasya
GSP29nystik_u:1569_1: niyogo nāsvargaphalāyāṃ yāgabhāvanāyāmavakalpata iti samānapadenopatto 'pi duḥkhatayā
GSP29nystik_u:1570: bhinnapadopatto 'pi puruṣaviśeṣaṇamapi svarga eva bhāvanāphalaṃ yukta iti tarkeṇānujñāyamānaḥ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:1571: na ca yadyabhaviṣyad ghaṭa iti vā yadyabhaviṣyad dhātvarthaḥ sāghya iti vā kriyātipattirasti,
GSP29nystik_u:1575: niśvayāya tu pravṛttaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadviṣayavivecanenānugṛhṇan itikartavyātvenopayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1598: yadyekaṃ nimittaṃ syād vaicitryaṃ na bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:1603: yāgādikā tu kriyā āśutaravināśinī na cirabhāvine svargāya kalpata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1604: avasthitaṃ ced yāgādyāhitamapūrvaṃ dharmo 'stīti sadaiva sukhinā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1605: evamadharmo 'stīti sadaiva duḥkhī syāditi sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kādācitkatvaṃ vyāhanyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:1608: kiṃ tu tāvadanena sthātavyaṃ na yāvadantyasukhaduḥkhasaṃvijñānaṃ janayati,
GSP29nystik_u:1614: ekadravyaṃ cedastu tarhi sarvasādhāraṇe pṛthivyādau yatra kvacit /
GSP29nystik_u:1616: atha pṛthivyādyeva kāraṇa janmavaicitrye kasmānna bhavatītyāśayavān pṛcchati--kiṃ kāraṇamiti kasmāt kāraṇādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1626: paramārthatastu tarkapūrvakastattvaviniścayo nirṇaya iti pratyakṣādīnāmapi tarkasahāyānāṃ nirṇayaphalatvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1628: dhūmādigocareṇa nirṇayena vahnyādāvanumīyamāne pramāṇabheva nirṇayo na phalamityāśayavān pṛcchati--kadā punatiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1638: ekasyāpi śāstrakartuḥ pūrvapakṣottarapakṣasādhanadūṣaṇapratipādako vacanasamūho vādaḥ syāditi nānāpravaktṛka ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:1639: siddhāntabhedānavidhānena hi dvāvapi svasiddhāntānurūpaṃ sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ cāhaturityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1643: pratyadhikāraṇa sādhanaṃ yasmin vāde sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1646: tathā ca nānāpravaktṛkatvena tulyatve 'pi vādasya vitaṇḍāyāḥ pratyadhikaraṇasādhanatvena bhadeḥ siddho bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:1649: asti hi jalpasya pratyadhikaraṇasādhanavatvaṃ ca nānāpravaktṛkatvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:1672: netyāha--etāvatā viśeṣeṇa kathāmārgabheda iti etāvāneva viśeṣo na sarvathā,
GSP29nystik_u:1679: pañcasu caturṣu vā liṅgarūpeṣvanyatamaṃ liṅgaṃ dharmamekaṃ dvayaṃ trayaṃ vānuvidadhānā ahetavo hetuvadābhāsānta iti hetvābhāsā uktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1688: atha ye ye vāde codyante te sarve pṛthugupadiśyante iti?
GSP29nystik_u:1692: tasmāt nāyamavinābhūto heturvāde codanīyatvaṃ vā pṛthagupadeśo vā bhāṣyakāreṇokta ityupasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:1695: tadevamekadeśimataṃ dūṣayitvā svamatena bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe--etadeva tu nyāyyāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1696: nigrahasthānebhyo hetvābhāsānāṃ pṛthagupadeśe prayojanaṃ yad bhāṣyākṣarebhyaḥ sākṣāt pratīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1697: sāmānyopadeśena viśeṣa upadiṣṭe viśeṣopadeśaḥ prayojanādhikyaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1698: yathā brāhmaṇān bhojaya kaṭha ceti kaṭhabhojane viśeṣo gamyate,
GSP29nystik_u:1699: tadvadihāpi nigrahasthānopadeśenaiva hetvābhāseṣu labdheṣu teṣāṃ viśeṣeṇābhidhānaṃ prayojanādhikyaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1700: etāvāneva sūtrakṛto vyāpāro yat sūtraṇaṃ nāma /
GSP29nystik_u:1701_0: tatra nigrahasthānaviśeṣāṇāṃ hetvābhāsānāṃ svarūpaṃ vādasya ca tattvanirṇayāvasānatvamālocya
GSP29nystik_u:1701_1: vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyanti nigrahasthānatvena hetvābhāsā nāpratibhādaya iti prayojanaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:1712: yadi vāde hetvābhāsāḥ prayujyeran tato nigrahasthānatvena codyeran,
GSP29nystik_u:1713: na tu teṣāmasti prayogo 'pramāṇatvāt pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhatvācca vādasya /
GSP29nystik_u:1721: tathā cāsti teṣāṃ vāde prayoga iti vāde nigrahasthānatvena hevābhāsāścādyantām,
GSP29nystik_u:1727: samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛttaṃ rūpaṃ vādasya ca nigrahasthānānāṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:1729: kānicideva nigrahasthānāni vāde na tu sarvāṇīti sāmānyato 'bhidhāya tadeva lakṣaṇaparatantratvamabhimate viśeṣe yojayati--vādasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1734: na niścayaḥ sarvaḥ pramāṇamūlo 'pramāṇamūlasyāpi tasya darśanāt,
GSP29nystik_u:1738: upāsyopāsakayoḥ parasparaṃ na dhvaṃsanaṃ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1740: hetvābhāsānāṃ ca pṛthakkaraṇaṃ na vāde tanmātrāvadhāraṇārtham,
GSP29nystik_u:1741: api tu yasminnanuddhāvite 'pi nigrahasthāne tattvapratipattivyāghāto bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1743: evaṃ ca nyūnādhikāpasiddhāntā api saṃgṛjītā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:1747: sāhaṅkāro vijigīṣurapratibhādibhirapi nigrahasthānaistiraskṛto galitāhaṅkārastattvabubhutsutāṃ nītaḥ paścād vādena vyutpādyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1754: atra hi jāteḥ svavākye parivarjanamuktvā punaḥ svayaṃ prayogo na yuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1759: tad vibhajate--svayaṃ ca sukaraḥ prayoga iti anena bhāṣyeṇa kimuktaṃ bhavati?
GSP29nystik_u:1760: pareṇa prativādinā jātau prayuktāyāṃ vādī prāśnikān sabhyān bravīti jātiranena prativādinā prayukteti /
GSP29nystik_u:1762: jīran he vādin kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa jātiḥ catuviṃśatyāṃ jātiṣu katamā jātiriti?
GSP29nystik_u:1770: yadyapītarā vidyāḥ pramāṇikamevārthamabhiniviśante tathāpyetadvidyāpratipādyameva pramāṇādyupajīvya sve sve vyutpādye tattve pravartantra,
GSP29nystik_u:1772: yathā pratyakṣādyupajīvya pravartamānamanumānaṃ na pratyakṣādiviṣayamapi tadānīmeva gocarayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1774: saṃprati vidyānāṃ yāni karmāṇi pratipādyāni sāmāgrihotrakṛṣyādīni tatrāpyānvīkṣikyupāya ityāha--upāyaḥ sarvakarmaṇāṃ vidyāvyutpādyānām,
GSP29nystik_u:1781: tasmāt saṃśayaparīkṣāpramāṇaviniveśa dvāreṇa tadarthatattvamavadhāryā tatra trayī viniveśanīyā /
GSP29nystik_u:1783: tasmādānvīkṣikīpariśodhitapramāṇapramāśitaṃ sāmādi itarā vidyāḥ kurvanti viṣayamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1784: api ca dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmabhimatānabhimatopāyatāprajñāpanena yathāyatha sarvā vidyāḥ prekṣāvataḥ pravartayanti nirvayanti vā /
GSP29nystik_u:1789: atha sādhyāṃśaṃ rāgataḥ prāptamanūdya sādhanetikartavyate eva vidharayete,
GSP29nystik_u:1790: tataḥ śyenādisādhyāyā hiṃsāyā avihitatvena na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti pratiṣadhādanarthatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:1794: tadevamānvīkṣikīmāśrayante sarvavidyā ityāha--āśrayaḥ sarvadharmāṇām sarvāsāṃ vidyānāṃ puruṣapravartanā dharmāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1803: sa ca vidyāntarasādhāraṇa iti vidyāntarādhigamyena niḥśreyasena saṅkaraprasaṅga ityata āha--tadidaṃ tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasādhigamaśca yathāvidyaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1804: vidyāntarāṇi tāvad yat tattvajñānaṃ kurvanti tatsvabhāvālocanayā hi tadvidyāsādhye eva niḥśreyasabhade upayujyante nānyatra /
GSP29nystik_u:1812: vādādīnāṃ nigrahasthānāntānāmupadeśaḥ parābhibhavopāyatayā madamānādihetutvena niḥśreyasaparipanthīti manvānaścodayati--madamānādīti /
GSP29nystik_u:1819: tatra jalpādīnā parāhaṅkārapraśamanamavāntaravyāpāra iti na niḥśreyasaparipanthitā,
GSP29nystik_u:1827: tadevaṃ prathamasūtreṇa śāstrasyābhidheyaprayojanasaṃbandhān darśayatā padārthāḥ pramāṇādaya uddhiṣṭāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1831: na ca prayojanasaṃbandhanirṇayaḥ parīkṣāṃ vineti tatparīkṣārthaṃ dvitīyaṃ sūtram /
GSP29nystik_u:1833: dvividhaṃ hi prayojanābhidhānaṃ granthakṛtāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ samīcīnamasamīcīnaṃ ca,
GSP29nystik_u:1836: tatrotsūtreṇa prayojanābhisaṃbandhapratipādanaparaṃ pūrvapakṣabhāṣyam--tat khalu vai niḥśreyasamityādi /
GSP29nystik_u:1851: dvitīyā tu śrutasya parīkṣya nyāyana vyavasthāpanam,
GSP29nystik_u:1863_0: atha pariniṣpannadhyānopāyaḥ sākṣātkāravatīṃ pratipadya caturthau pratītiṃ nirmuktasakalakleśajālaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:1864: na caivamavastho vītarāgo 'pi sahasaiva dehādibhiḥ viyujyate,
GSP29nystik_u:1866: na ca prāyaśvittenevātmajñānenādattaphalānyeva karmāṇi kṣīyanta iti yuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:1876: yogārddhivaśāccāniyatavipākakālānyapi dīrghakālaphalānyapi karmāṇi piṇḍīkṛtya bhūtendriyadavijayitayā yugapadeva bhuṅkte /
GSP29nystik_u:1878: na cācintyatvād vinaivopabhogena karmāśayān prakṣayiṣyatīti yuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:1882: tādṛśaśca munistattvajñānavān śāstrasya praṇeteti na vātaputrīyaṃ śāstramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1883: paraṃ tu riḥśreyasaṃ yogarddhiprabhavasampadā yugapadupabhogenopāttakarmāśayasya kṣayāt sarvaduḥkhoparama ityupapannaṃ niḥśreyasadvaividhyamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1891: na hyasti saṃbhavo na tatra tṛpyati tacca tasya sukham,
GSP29nystik_u:1892: na ca tad dveṣṭi tacca tasya duḥkhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1897: atha aparaniḥśreyasotpādasamaya eva paraniḥśreyasotpādo 'pi kasmānna bhavatītyāha--paraṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ tattvajñānāt krameṇa bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:1900: na hi kaphodbhāvajvarapraśamanāya kaphanivṛttau satyāṃ yatnāntaramātiṣṭhate,
GSP29nystik_u:1902: paraṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ na tāvad bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1905: tathā ca na tulyakāla utpādaḥ parāparayorniḥśreyasayoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1911: tasmāt janmaduḥkhocchedakramasamabhivyāhṛto mithyājñānādyucchedakramaḥ parasyaiva niḥśreyasasya śāstraprayojanasya /
GSP29nystik_u:1917: na cāsau duḥkhādīnāṃ mithyājñānāntānāmapradarśite kāryakāraṇabhāve sidhyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1923: ataḥ siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvādapavarga ityanena yogena kāraṇocchedakrameṇa kāryocchedakramapratipādanenāpavargaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1931: evanivṛttyā anyanivṛttyaiva kāryakāraṇabhāva ākṣipta iti nāsau sūtre darśanīyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1948: śāstrasya niḥśreyasādhigamalakṣaṇena prayojanena yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pūrvamākṣiptaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1952: yadyapi sāmabhedādau halaśakaṭadau ca mithyājñānamanekaprakāraṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1953: tathāpi na tat saṃsāraheturapi tvātmādidvādaśavidhaprameyaviśeṣaviṣayamiti sūtrasthaṃ mithyājñānaṃ viśeṣṭumāha--tatreti /
GSP29nystik_u:1957: na khalu yathā kuṇḍe vadaraṃ paṭe vā śauklyam,
GSP29nystik_u:1965: tadāha--tatrāyaṃ bhedaḥ tatrātmani tāvat pradhāne prameye nāstīti /
GSP29nystik_u:1969: sarvatra hi rajatodakādivibhrameṣu śuktirajatayorvā marūmarīcisalilayorvā sārūpyameva nimittaṃ pratīmaḥ na hi jātu rūpaṃ rasādiṣu hastinaṃ vā maśakādiṣu āropayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:1972: pītaḥ śaṅkhastikto guḍa iti ca dṛśyata iti cet--na,
GSP29nystik_u:1975: śaṅkhaṃ ca doṣācchāditasitimānamanubhavan pītagaṇasya ca tadasaṃbandhamananubhavaṃstadasaṃbandhāgraheṇa pītacīravilvādisāmānādhikaraṇyena sārūpyāt śaṅkha pīta iti viparyasyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1978: na ca brūmo yatra sārūpyaṃ tatra bhrama iti,
GSP29nystik_u:1980: api tu yatra bhramastatrāvaśyaṃ kathañcit sārūpyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1990: tathā ca kasya kutrāropa ityata āha--kriyāguṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1991: so 'yamasaddharmān kriyāguṇarahitatvādīn satyātmani samāropya asattayā viparyasyati--nāstyātmeti,
GSP29nystik_u:2000: astu nāstitāsamāropa eva tāvad yato na pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2002: sukhī bhaveyaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvamiti tṛṣyataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2016: na hi jātu kaściccetanaḥ sukhamāpsyāmīti madhuviṣasampṛktamannamupabhuṅkte /
GSP29nystik_u:2027: tāṃ khalvayaṃ śarīrādiṣvāropya eta evāhamiti śarīrādiṣvātmabhāvamāropayati //
GSP29nystik_u:2029: saṃprati sandihāno viparyayasvarūpaṃ pṛcchati--kaḥ punarayaṃ viparyayaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:2037: idamatrākūtam--na tāvat svākāraṃ rajatādi bāhyatayā ālambante vibhramāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2047: bhrāntaṃ hi jñānaṃ svākārameva bāhyatā ālambate /
GSP29nystik_u:2050: hanta cakṣuṣī nimīlya vaitālikapakṣapātaṃ parityajyālocayatvāyuṣmān ki purovartidravyākāratāmātraṃ pratiṣedhati rajatasya,
GSP29nystik_u:2052: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya brūvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃpriyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2057: santu tarhi bādhakapratyayānurodhād asatprakāśanaśīlā eva mithyāpratyayāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2058: tathā hi bādhakaṃ vijñānaṃ nedaṃ rajatamiti rajatajñānagocarasyāsattvaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP29nystik_u:2060: na hi viṣayatvaṃ nāma kāraṇatvaṃ yenāsati na syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:2068: āhosvit sadeva sadantarātmanā gahṇāti sataśca sadantarātmatvena asattvādasadviṣayamucyate?
GSP29nystik_u:2070: rajatātmanā cet asadālambeta na satī śuktikām,
GSP29nystik_u:2071: kathaṃ punarasau rajātartho śuktau pravartate na punā rajatābhāve /
GSP29nystik_u:2072: kaskāccedamiti purovarti dravyamaṅgulyā nirdiśya tasya rajatatvaṃ niṣedhati nedaṃ rajatamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:2073: yadi tatra na prasañjitaṃ rajatatvaṃ pūrvavijñānena?
GSP29nystik_u:2074: atha śuktireva rajatātmanā asatīti tadākāratayā tāmālambamānaṃ mithyājñānamasadālambanamucyate?
GSP29nystik_u:2086: yaḥpunaḥ advaitavādinā prapajco vaināśikānāṃ vā sāmānyādirno bahiḥ ki tvalīkam /
GSP29nystik_u:2087: tadviṣayaṃ ca jñānaṃ mithyājñānamityapi na saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:2091: tasmāt prapañcaśca sāmānyādi ca vastusatī nāmamīcīnavijñānagocarau /
GSP29nystik_u:2097: tanmātrasya sarvapratyayasādhāraṇyena sarve 'rthāḥ savarpratyayaviṣayā iti savarsarvajñatāpattiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2104: api ca cakṣurādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajananasāmarthyamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānaṃ bhavitumarhati?
GSP29nystik_u:2105: na hi śyāmākabījaṃ parikarmasahasreṇāpi kalamāṅkurāya kalpate /
GSP29nystik_u:2106: doṣasahāyā locanādayo mithyāpratyayamādadhata iti cet--na doṣā hi kāraṇānāṃ sāmarthya nighnanti,
GSP29nystik_u:2108: na khalu bhṛṣṭaṃ kuṭajabījaṃ nyagrodhadhānāyai kalpate,
GSP29nystik_u:2110: api ca svagocare vyabhicāre vijñānānāṃ sarvatrānāśvāsaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2112: tathā hi rajatamidamiti dve jñāne smṛtyanubhavarūpe /
GSP29nystik_u:2115: tāvanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛti janayati /
GSP29nystik_u:2116: sā ca gṛhītagrahaṇasvabhāvāpi doṣavaśāt gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa grahaṇamātramavatiṣṭhate /
GSP29nystik_u:2117_0: tathā ca rajatasmṛteḥ purovartimātragrahaṇasya va mithaḥ svarūpataśca viṣayataśca
GSP29nystik_u:2117_1: bhedāgrahaṇāt sannihitarajataviṣayavijñānasārūpyeṇedaṃ rajatamiti bhinne api grahaṇasmaraṇe
GSP29nystik_u:2120: atra hi viniryannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kāyasyevātisvacchasya pītattvaṃ ca gṛhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2125: tadupapattau ca bhrāntatvamapi lokaprasiddhaṃ siddhra bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2126: tasmād yathārthāḥ sarve 'pi bhramāḥ pratyayatvāt paṭapratyayatvayavaditi prāptam //
GSP29nystik_u:2127: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate--asti tāvad rajatārthino rajatamiti jñāne sati purovartidravyapravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnam /
GSP29nystik_u:2132: purovartivastugrahaṇarajatajñānādagṛhītabhedaṃ svarūpato viṣayato vā rajatārthinaṃ purovartidravye pravartayatīti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:2133: hanta bhoḥ kimetāvatā purovartivastugocaraṃ jñānaṃ rajatagocaraṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:2139: na hi vṛkṣamātradarśanaṃ niścayena śiṃśapārthinaṃ pravartayati,
GSP29nystik_u:2143: nanu rajatavijñānaṃ purovartini dravye na vartate,
GSP29nystik_u:2144: purovartijñānaṃ ca na rajata iti tatra purovartidravyamātrārtho purovartini pravarteta na rajatārtho /
GSP29nystik_u:2145: evaṃ rajatārtho yatra kvacana pravarteta na niyamena purovartina dravye /
GSP29nystik_u:2154: so 'yamubhayato bhedābhedagrahasārūpyāt pravṛttinivṛttibhyāṃ yugapadākṛṣyamāṇaḥ pratipattā kaṣṭāṃ daśāmāveśitaḥ prajñāśālibhirativyākhyayā //
GSP29nystik_u:2158: tathā ca śakyaṃ tatrāpi vaktum--yathā bhedagrahād viparyayajñānotpāda evamabhedāgrahāt kasmānna samīcīnajñānotpāda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2163: cetanavyavahārāṇāṃ tvabuddhipūrvakāṇāmapratīteḥ buddhipūrvakatve tu vivekāgraha upayujyate,
GSP29nystik_u:2165: yadyavivekagraho 'pi tatparipanthī vidyata iti kuto 'nyataranibandhano vyavahāraḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:2169: yad yadarthina niyamena yatra pravarpayati tadvijñānaṃ tadviṣayam,
GSP29nystik_u:2174: tatra kiṃ śuktikātvasya rajatamiti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvaṃ sādhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:2188: tadevamātmani mithyājñānaṃ vyākhyāya śarīrādiṣvekādaśasu mithyājñānaṃ bhāṣya eva darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:2190: tatra śarīrādiṣu manaḥparyanteṣu yathāyogaṃ mithyājñānaṃ duḥkhe sukham ityādinā apratihātavyam ityantena bhāṣyeṇoktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2191: pravṛttyādiṣu śṛṅgagrāhikayoktaṃ pravṛttau ityādinā rocayet ityantena bhāṣyeṇa /
GSP29nystik_u:2192: evaṃ mithyājñānasya svarūpaṃ darśayitvā mithyājñānadoṣapravṛttitajanmaduḥkhānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo doṣādīnāṃ svarūpaṃ coktam etasmāt ityādinā tāpa ityantena bhāṣyeṇa /
GSP29nystik_u:2197: tathā ca nāpavarga iti vakṣyamāṇamarthamupapādayitumaktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā,
GSP29nystik_u:2199: tad vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭa--ta hame duḥkhādaya iti bhāṣyakāroktakramād viparītakramābhidhānaṃ vārttikakṛtaḥ evaṃ sūtrakāroktakramād viparītakramābhidhānaṃ bhāṣyakṛtaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2200: tad duḥkhādīnāṃ mithyājñānapūrvakatvena mithyājñānasya duḥkhādipūrvakatvenānāditvaṃ darśayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:2202: yadyeta eva saṃsārastarhi sūtrakāraḥ prameyasūtre kasmād duḥkhādibhyaḥ pṛthak pretyabhāvaṃ saṃsārāparanāmānamupādatte?
GSP29nystik_u:2209: evamasati janmani mithyājñānasyānutpattaraviṣayo 'pi janma mithyājñānasya kāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:2210: evaṃ vinā pravṛttiṃ janmābhāvāt janmadvādeṇa pravṛtterapi mithyājñānakāraṇatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:2221: kāraṇanivṛttau kāryanivṛtteriti kathanaparaṃ bhāṣyam anubhāṣyākṣipati--yadā tu tattvajñānāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:2226: tasyāśutaravināśinaḥ saṃskārād vā jñānāntarād vā apāyasya tattvajñānasādhāraṇyena tasyāpi bādhyatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2228: na hi śuktikājñānaṃ rajatajñānasya rajataviṣayatāmapahartumutsahate jātaṃ hi tad rajataṃ viṣayīkṛtya /
GSP29nystik_u:2237: yasminneva hi purovartini dravye pūrveṇa rajatatvamāsañjitaṃ tatraivottaraṃ tadviruddhaṃ śuktikātvaṃ dharmamupanayati /
GSP29nystik_u:2238: tathā ca pūrvasya vijñānasya mithyātvamādarśayattajjanitāṃ pravṛttiṃ vighaṭayat phalamasyāpaharatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2245: parasparābhāvadharmiṇorekatra samavāye nedaṃ svābhāvikaṃ nānātvaṃ kvacidapītyadvaitaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2262: tattu na pūrveṇa nāpyanyena kenaciditi bhāvatyarthasahāyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2278: tasmād dṛḍhamūlatvāt tadapi tattvajñānaṃ mithyājñānaṃ nivartayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2281_0: āgamamayena hi jñānena prameyaṃ gṛhītvā śāstrīyeṇa ca nyāyavijñānenānumānāparanāmnā
GSP29nystik_u:2282: tatra trayāṇāmapi pramāṇānāṃ pratisandhānam astīti dṛḍhamūlatvāt tena mithyājñānaṃ bādhyate //
GSP29nystik_u:2284: samāhitatvena cetaso dhāraṇāṃ darśayati--ananyamanā iti pratyāhāram,
GSP29nystik_u:2292: saṃprati tu tattvajñānavāsanayā atyantabalīyasya samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvāt mithyājñānavāsanāyā bhavati viviktā tattvajñānavāsanā tasyāmityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2294: nivṛttaṃ taṃ tattvasākṣātkārasamaye 'pi kasmāt punaḥ svavāsanāvaśānna jāyate?
GSP29nystik_u:2295: na khalu mithyājñānavāsanā anādikālapravṛttā ādimatā tattvajñānena tatsaṃskāreṇa vā śakyā nivartayitumityata āha--nivṛtte ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:2296: tāvadeva puṃsāṃ buddhayo 'sthirā bhrāmyanti svocitaṃ ca saṃskārajātamātanvate,
GSP29nystik_u:2314: na ca tasmādeva rāgādīnāmabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2317: tayā virodhiguṇena viṣayatṛṣṇā ca tatparipanthini vidveṣaśca tadadhikaraṇāśrverṣyādayo nivartante /
GSP29nystik_u:2322: yadi hi janmanaḥ pravṛttiḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:2324: na punarasau kṣaṇikā sato āmuṣmikāya janmane kalpate /
GSP29nystik_u:2330: vartamānānāgatayoraviśeṣeṇa doṣāpāyāt nivṛttirūkteti bhrāntyā deśayati--yau tāvadanāgatāviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2348: syādetat, mahāpralaye 'pi mithyājñānādinā duḥkhāntenāsti viyoga iti atrāpi muktiprasaṅga ityata āha--so 'yaṃ mithyājñānādineti /
GSP29nystik_u:2354: tannivṛttau śarīrādivat tattvajñānasaṃskārasyāpi pralaya ityaśeṣaviśeṣaguṇavimukto mukta ityucyata iti saddhim //
GSP29nystik_u:2360: no khlvayaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ samācāro yad duḥkhabhiyā sukhaparityāga iti,
GSP29nystik_u:2361: api tu sukhaṃ duḥkhād vivicya upādadate duḥkhaṃ ca varjayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:2362: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante,
GSP29nystik_u:2366: tathāpyanityatvakṛtakatvavat parasparānuṣakte iti na khalu sukhasya kevalasyopādānaṃ duḥkhasya vā kevalasya parivarjanaṃ śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2371: na cāvinābhāvo vinā saṃbandhāditi tatsiddhaye saṃbandhavikalpānāha--samānanimittatā vā anuṣaṅgo 'vinābhāvaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2385: yatraikaṃ tatretaraditi vā yatra yasminnimitte satīti vā yatrādhāra iti vā yatropalabdhisādhane satīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2391: svapadebhyaḥ pramāṇādayaḥ padārthāstattvato jñātā yathāyathaṃ mithyājñānādinivṛttikrameṇa apavarge upayokṣyante,
GSP29nystik_u:2395: api tu lakṣaṇaparīkṣaṇābhyām ityasti prabandhasyottarasyopayoga iti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2402: śāstrakāryasya tattvajñānalakṣaṇasya tathaiva trividhayaiva śāstrapravṛttyā bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2405: na cāsya dharmidarśanamantareṇa pakṣadharmatā sidhyatīti tadupadarśanāya nāmadheyamātreṇa dharmiṇāmuddeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2408: na cāparīkṣito heturvyatirekī catūrūpo bhavatīti parīkṣāpyavaśyaṃ kartavyā /
GSP29nystik_u:2419: ghrāṇādisūtre # 1.1.12 # tu lakṣaṇapare kārakatvaṃ vivakṣitam anyathā lakṣaṇatvāyogāditi adoṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2420: atra ca yadyapi sūtrakāreṇa saṃśayapramāṇaprameyeṣu parīkṣā sākṣāt kṛtā na prayojanādiṣu,
GSP29nystik_u:2421: tathāpi tatkaraṇādeva prayojanādiparīkṣāpi sūcitā sūtrakāreṇa iti trividhetyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2431: tathāpi pramāṇapadasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ sat sāmarthyāt pramāṇatvamapi lakṣayatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2433_0: pramā ca smṛteranyaḥ arthāvyabhicārī svatantraḥ paricchedaḥ tasmād vibhāgaparādapi
GSP29nystik_u:2434: tathā ca vibhāgaparatvena sākṣāt sāmānyalakṣaṇānabhidhānād vibhaktasya lakṣaṇamucyata ityuktam tacceha /
GSP29nystik_u:2439: pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu ca viśeṣata iti gamayitavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:2443: na ca vivekaḥ svarūpa upayujyata ityata āha--athoddiṣṭavibhāgadvāreṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:2461: pramāṇalakṣaṇakaraṇapravṛtto yat catvāryeva lakṣayati tadavagamyate na nyūnānyadhikāni vā pramāṇanītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2467: na ca pratyakṣādīnāṃ samānāsamānajātīyasya vyavacchede pañcamyādyabhāva upayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2474: akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti vigṛhyāvyayībhāve kṛte sarvendriyāvarodho bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2476: kasmāt punarbhāṣyakāreṇa akṣasyākṣasyeti vigṛhyata ityata āha--anyathā tu vastunirdeśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2479: atha kasmāt samāsa eva tena vigraheṇa na pratipādyata ityata āha--samāse hi akṣasyeti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeteti /
GSP29nystik_u:2481: anyatra punarasya kaḥ samāsa iti pṛcchati--kaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:2483: tathā hi, prāptāpannālaṃpūrvagatisamāseṣu paravalliṅgatāpratiṣedhādabhidhayaliṅgopādānāt pratyakṣo 'rthaḥ pratyakṣābuddhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ jñānamityabhidheyaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2484: kvacit pāṭhaḥ samāse hi pratyakṣasyeti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeteti /
GSP29nystik_u:2495: tannimittaḥ khalvayaṃ pratyakṣaśabdastatra tatra laukikaparīkṣakaiḥ prayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2496: yathā mayūraśabdo mayūratvasāmānyanibandhanaḥ kāsucideva patatrivyaktiṣu vartamānaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2498: tadidaṃ pratyakṣamuddhiṣṭamapi sat pramāṇatadābhāsasaṃkīrṇamiti tadvivekāya lakṣaṇamupayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2505: yaḥ kārakaiḥ phale janayitavye cāramabhāvī dharmabhedaḥ phalotpādānukūlo 'pekṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2508: tathehāpi indriyādinā pramāṇena pramāyāṃ phale pravṛttena tadutpādanānukūlaḥ sannikarṣo jñānaṃ vā caramabhāvī dharmabhedo 'pekṣyata iti bhavati vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2510: vyavasthāṃ darśayati--yadā sannikarṣo vyāpāra indriyādeḥ pramāṇasya tadā jñānam ālocanaṃ vā savikalpakaṃ vā sākṣātkāravadvijñānaṃ pramitiḥ phalam,
GSP29nystik_u:2512: na cāntarālikena nirvikalpakenendriyavyāpāraviccheda iti pratyakṣavyākhyānāvasare nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2513: yadā jñānam ālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā vyāpāra indriyādīnāṃ tadā hānopādānopekṣābuddhayaḥ phalam /
GSP29nystik_u:2514: tatropādeyamidaṃ salilamiti buddhiranāgatopādānaviśiṣṭaṃ salilamālambamānā na sākṣātkāravatī,
GSP29nystik_u:2528: na ca vyāptismṛtivicchinnamālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā na liṅgaparāmarśajñānaheturiti vācyam,
GSP29nystik_u:2529: tadudbodhitasaṃskāradvāreṇa vyāpsmiraṇe ca parāmarśe ca tasya tadānīmasato 'pi kāraṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2538: kiṃ tu kāraṇānāṃ svarūpaṃ vā sahakārisākalyaṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:2541: janīyam, na tu tat toyarūpadarśanamātrāt śakyānumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:2542: tat kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadanumānasya gocara iti? atrocyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2549: idameva cāsya kāryopadhānaṃ yat kāryotpādāt pūrvamavaśyaṃbhāva ānantaryaniyamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2550: na ca tajjātīyasya dṛṣṭacarasya tathābhāvadarśane 'pi dṛśyamānasya toyasya tad dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati yena tatra smaryeta /
GSP29nystik_u:2556: kimiyaṃ hānaprayatnamapi prasūte yato hānaṃ syāt?
GSP29nystik_u:2557: tasmād yā nobhayaprayatnaprasavahetuḥ sopekṣābuddhistṛtīyā lokaprasiddheti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:2575: anumānajñānasya phalāvasthāyāmevārtho mita iti meyaṃ nāvaśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:2577: tatra phalaviśeṣaṇapakṣamāsthāya yata ityadhyāhṛtya sāmadhatte---naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2582: na svagocaraṃ pratītyata āha--sarva ca pramāṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2586: na hi panasaviṣayeṇa paraśunā khadire dvaidhībhāvo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2587: tathāpi phalāntarānapekṣamutpattāveva vijñāne yat prakāśate sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2592: bhāvasādhanaścet pramāṇaśabdaḥ phalamasyārtho na tu phalaṃ svaviṣaye karaṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:2598: tathāpi yatrānena pramāṇena satā hānādibuddhayo janayitavyāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2608: api tu pramāṇena nirūktiriti na vayāghāta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2615: yadā hyetat pramāṇaṃ tadā vākyārthavijñānaṃ phalam /
GSP29nystik_u:2616: yadānumānavad vākyārthavijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadā hānopādānādibuddhayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2617: atra pratyakṣādīnāṃ kramoddeśaprayojanaṃ prati ekadeśimatamupanyasyati---kecit tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2618: pratyakṣaparā hi pramāṇāntarajanyāḥ pramitaya iti pratyakṣasya prādhānyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2627: ato mahāviṣayatvaṃ prāthamya eva heturna caramatva ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2641: tathāpi śāstre vyutpādyatvenānumānasyāpi tadastīti sādhāraṇatayā na heturiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2646: na cānumānaviṣaye sāmānyarūpe saṃbandhini pratyarkṣa pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2651: tasmāt nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti vibhāgavacanamanupapannamiti śaṅkāmapanetuṃ vimarśapūrvakaṃ vicārayati sma bhārūyakāraḥ---kiṃ punaḥ pramāṇānīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2663: tadanena dhūmavyāpakatvopadhānena dhūmād gamyamāno bahniḥ parokṣa iti darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:2667: upadhānānapekṣastu pratyakṣeṇāvyavahitaṃ sākṣād varhina viṣayīkṛtya nirākāṅkṣo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2673: tasmād vyavasthāyāṃ guṇapradhānabhāvo na cintya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2679: tatra teṣu madhye prāthamyāt pratyakṣalakṣaṇam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam ityādi sūtram /
GSP29nystik_u:2686: yaḥ khalu kutaścid vyāmohāt samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛttaṃ tadrūpaṃ na śakroti grahītum,
GSP29nystik_u:2690: itastvavagatalakṣaṇaḥ tenaiva vivicya pratyakṣatattvaṃ gṛhṇātīti samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedaḥ sūtrārtha ukta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2691: atra ca yaha ityadhyāhṛtya yattadonityābhisaṃbandhāt tat pratyakṣamiti pramāṇavāci pratyakṣapadra yojanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2692_0: evaṃ ca jñānapramāṇyapakṣe 'pi yat tadviśeṣyajñānaṃ pratyakṣaphalaṃ liṅgaparāmarśo
GSP29nystik_u:2701: na cāsāvaṇvākāśādīnāmastīti satyapi saṃyogādau nāsāvarthasannikarṣa iti tadvyudāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2704: anyathā kuḍyādisaṃyuktenendriyeṇa kuḍyādivyavahitasya tatsaṃyuktasya ghaṭādeḥ tatsamavetasya ca rūpāderapi grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2705: na caitāvatā trividha eva sannikarṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ samavāyaśceti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:2707: ye hi dravyaguṇakarmāśrayaṃ sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśsayamarthānataraṃ rocayante,
GSP29nystik_u:2708: teṣāṃ kathaṃ rūpādibhedānāmanyonyasya sādṛśyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavet ?
GSP29nystik_u:2715: tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu parasparavyāvṛttimatīṣu ete nānubhūyeran asati sannikarṣāntare /
GSP29nystik_u:2717: tadā prativaktavyaṃ kutastyo 'yamanantāsu rūpagandhādivyaktiṣu rūpamiti vā gandha iti vā vyapadeśabhedaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:2722: tasmādastīndriyeṇa rūpatvādisāmānyānubhavo yannibandhanāḥ kāsucideva kecideva vyaktiṣu vyapadeśebhedā iti siddhaṃ sannikarṣāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:2723: viśeṣaṇabhāvena ca saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇaṃ samavetaviśeṣaṇa ca saṃgṛhītam //
GSP29nystik_u:2724: yasyendriyeṇa yādṛśaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tādṛśaṃ tatra darśayati--tatra cakṣuriti /
GSP29nystik_u:2728: santānena śrotre samutpādaḥ samavāya ityādi dvitīye nipuṇataramupapādayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2729: avayavāvayavinau guṇaguṇinau kriyākriyāvantau jātijātimantau ca mithaḥ saṃbaddhāvanubhūtete /
GSP29nystik_u:2734: śuklaḥ paṭa ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇyajñānaṃ na tu saṃbandhijñānamiti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:2742: tasmād bhinne eva vastunī saṃbaddhe sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhāsete,
GSP29nystik_u:2746: na hi jātu dadhiśabdaḥ kuṇḍe vartate kuṇḍaśabdo vā dadhni /
GSP29nystik_u:2747: vartante tu surabhimadharaśuklādiśabdāḥ svābhidheyaṃ nimittīkṛtya paṭādiṣu,
GSP29nystik_u:2748: evaṃ paṭādiśabdā api jātyādi nimittīkṛtya dravye pravartante iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2752: śabdānāṃ tu tatraikasmin dravye pravṛtteḥ tadvācyānāmaikātmyabhramaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2753: ayutasiddhyā tu kuṇḍe dadhītivat na sphuṭataro vivekaprakāśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2767: tasmād vinā saṃbandhāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva eṣitavya iti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:2768: evamabhāve 'pi yadindriyasaṃyuktaṃ vā yadvendriyasamavetu yathā bhūtale ghaṭo nāstīti vā nāstyakāre 'nudāttasvara iti vā tasya saṃyuktasya vā viśeṣaṇabhāvena,
GSP29nystik_u:2770: na ca bhūtalādirūpameva ghaṭābhāvo nārthāntaramiti sāṃpratam,
GSP29nystik_u:2772: na ca kaivalyaṃ tasya dharmo ghaṭabhāvavirodhī ghaṭābhāvādanyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2773: na ca dṛśye ghaṭādau bhūtalopalambhaḥ kaivalyamabhāvavyavahāraheturiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2774: evaṃ hi ghaṭasaṃsṛṣṭabhūtalagraho 'pi kaivalyamiti ghaṭābhāvavyavahāraṃ pravartayet /
GSP29nystik_u:2776: dṛśye 'nupalabhyamāna iti tu viśeṣaṇe kimaparāddhamupalabhyābhāvena yena tadapākaraṇāyopalambhābhāvo 'bhyupeyate?
GSP29nystik_u:2779: na ca pratiyogismaraṇavyavahita indriyārthasannikarṣo nālamabhāvadhiyamupajanayitumiti sāṃpratamityagra darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2787: ghaṭābhāvānubhavasya tu ghaṭasmaraṇaṃ heturiti na pratiyogi,
GSP29nystik_u:2789: nanu svarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ veśmādyarthaṃ smaranneva bahirnitaśrcaitro yadā pṛcchyate kenacit--vayasya,
GSP29nystik_u:2790: tava gṛhe tadā kimāsīt maitra iti ?
GSP29nystik_u:2791: sa caitraḥ pratiyogismaraṇavirahāt pūrvamapratipannamaitrābhāvo 'pi tatpraśnajanitamaitrasmṛtiḥ kṣaṇaṃ dhyātva tadabhāvamavagamyāha,
GSP29nystik_u:2795: naitat, saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇalakṣaṇena manaḥsannikarṣeṇa smartavyasya smaraṇābhāvaṃ maitrasya gṛhītvā tena liṅgena tadabhāvasya tadānīmanumānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2798: yad yasya jñānārhasyājñāne jñāyate tat tadabhā vavat /
GSP29nystik_u:2802: na ca yat kadācidānumānikaṃ tenenidrayagamyena na bhavitavyam,
GSP29nystik_u:2806: tadanena prabandhena indriyasyārthena sannikarṣād yadutpadyate jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣamiti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:2812: ātmīyena hi rūpeṇālokacakṣuṣī dravyaṃ darśayata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2816: tasmādanyonyanirapekṣatvaṃ mahattvānekadravyavattvayoriti vikalpa eva nyāyya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2817: satyapyevaṃlakṣaṇakatve cukṣuravayavinastaijasasya na cākṣuṣatvamityata uktam--upalabdhikalaḥ saṃskāra iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2822: pratyakṣalakṣaṇakaraṇapravṛtto hi sūtrakāraḥ tadeva brūyāt yadasyāsādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:2839: yadyapīndriyamanaḥsannikarṣe 'pīndriyam asti pratyakṣajñānasya viśeṣakam indriyeṇa vyapadeśādindriyajñānamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:2840: tathāpi manasā vyapadeśāmāvāt manasastatrāviśeṣakatvam indriyārthasannikarṣe tūbhayamapi viśeṣakam,
GSP29nystik_u:2844: yu/jānasya hi yogino yadātmamanaḥsayogādātmani buddhayo bhavanti tāḥ khalvātmanā vyapadiśyante ātmabuddhaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2851: etaduktaṃ bhavati---yathā cukṣuṣā indriyatvena jñānaṃ vyapadiśyate cākṣuṣamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:2853: evaṃ yathā rūpeṇārthena vyapadiśyate jñānaṃ rūpajñānamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:2857: liṅgādi vā tatra cātmā nārtho 'pi tu pramātaiva /
GSP29nystik_u:2858: yathā rūpādijñāne 'numānādijñāne vā na tatra jñānaṃ mānasamiti vā ātmajñānamiti vā vyapadeśaḥ sa kasya hetāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2862: yadā hi nāgarayoṣitaḥ kutūhalāt praṇihitamanaso vikasitaniḥspandanayanotpalāḥ saudhamālāgavākṣakairavanipatiṃ sabalavāhanamaticiraparāvṛttaṃ gopureṇa niviśamānamālokayanti,
GSP29nystik_u:2863: tadā khlvāsāmekenaivendriyamanaḥsaṃyogena kramavadanekendriyārthasannikarṣasahakāriṇā bhinnāni kramavanti hāstikāśvīyādipratyakṣajñānāni jāyante /
GSP29nystik_u:2866: yadā hi mandaṃ gacchati gavi dūrataḥ saṃyuktasamavāyenendriyārthasannikarṣeṇa śuklo gaurityajñāsīt,
GSP29nystik_u:2867: atha pratyāsīdan gacchatītyapi vijānāti tenaiva saṃyuktasamavāyena sannikarṣeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:2868: tena pratyakṣajñānasya śukla iti ca gacchatīti ca bhede 'pi indriyārthasannikarṣo na bhidyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2873: nanu bhavatūktamuttaraṃ bhede 'bhedādityasyākṣepaḥ samādhātavyaḥ ityata āha--anabhyupagamācca /
GSP29nystik_u:2876: tat kimidānīṃ bhidyamānasya pratyakṣajñānasya nāyaṃ bhidyata iti samānatvānnokta iti bhāṣyam anupapannameva?
GSP29nystik_u:2883: pratyakṣajñānasya rūpajñānasya rūpajñānamiti vā cakṣurvijñānamiti vā vyapadeśena bhidyamānasya ātmamanaḥsaṃyoga iva ayam indriyamanaḥsaṃyogo na bhidyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2887: na tvasti indriyamanaḥsannikarṣādhārābhyāmindriyamanobhyāṃ pratyekamasya vyapadeśo yathendriyārthasannikarṣādhārābhyāṃ indriyārthābhyāṃ vyapadeśo rūpajñānamiti cakṣurjñānamiti vā /
GSP29nystik_u:2891: lakṣaṇaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ bhavati yathā dhūmo vahneḥ na cātīndriyadvayādhārasannikarṣastathā prasiddho yathendriyārthasannikarṣo 'rthasya saṃbandhina ekasnaya prasiddhatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:2896: tadanenātīndriyādhāratvaṃ svarūpeṇoktvā tadevaṃ viṣayāvṛttitvamanovṛttitvābhyām atīndriyādhāratvaṃ sāmānyamāha--viṣayāvṛttitvaṃ veti /
GSP29nystik_u:2902: cakṣuṣastatra prāpterityata āha--na tu cakṣuṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2905: tasya prasāda indriyāvyavadhāyakatvam kuḍyādibhyo viśeṣaḥ yaḥ khalu kācābhrapaṭalādiṣu svaccheṣu samasti /
GSP29nystik_u:2910: etaduktaṃ bhavati--bhūtaviśeṣaḥ karmāpekṣo rūpaṃ caṣṭa iti cakṣurityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2911: karmakṣāyāt tu prasannāndhasya na rūpaṃ caṣṭa iti na cakṣuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2915: kecit tu sāntaramiti grahaṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ hentu bruvate,
GSP29nystik_u:2917: sādhyaviparyayādasya vyatirekaṃ darśayati--na hi prāpyakāriṣviti pakṣadharmatāmāha--dṛṣṭaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2923: mā bhūt sarvatra rathādīnāṃ tatsaṃyogādīnāṃ copalabdhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2924: tena yāvanmātra rāṣṭravanādergolakena vyāptaṃ tāvanmātrasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2928: yadyapi gatikṣaṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ spāśrayasya deśāntaravibhāgasaṃyogopajananaṃ prati kṣipratayā na viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2929: svāśrayapratyāsattau cāviśeṣaḥ tathāpyā cāpādānavibhāgāt ā ca prāpanīyadeśaprāpterantarālavartī yāvān gatikṣaṇapracayaḥ pūrvāparībhūto gatiriha vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2930: tasya sāntaratvaṃ mandatvaṃ vilambaḥ nairantaryaṃ tu pāṭavaṃ kṣipratā /
GSP29nystik_u:2931: tāmimāṃ gatimabhindad nairantaryeṇa kurvadapi sannikṛṣṭamāśu prāpnoti /
GSP29nystik_u:2935: sāntaragrahaṇaṃ na syāt prāptau jñāne 'dhikasya ca /
GSP29nystik_u:2942: yadi ca syāt tadā paśyedapyunmīlya nimīlanāt //
GSP29nystik_u:2943: yadi ca syāt unmīlya nimīlitanayano 'pi rūpaṃ paśyet,
GSP29nystik_u:2945: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sāntaragrahaṇāditi hetuṃ vikalpya dūṣayati--yat tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:2951: yat tu prasādasvabhāvaṃ tejaḥ tanna gṛhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:2952: kiṃ tu tasya rūpamātraṃ visphāritākṣaṇa dṛśyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2956: mā na bhūtāṃ ca nirantare dravye,
