GSP29nystik_u:2958: na cāpātajanmālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā dravyānumānaṃ pratīkṣate yena rūpajñānānumitaṃ dravyam indriyarthayordravyayorantaraṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2959: api ca rūpamātramagṛhyamāṇe dravye svatantraṃ gandhādivad gṛhyamāṇaṃ kathamantarā svāśrayamanumāpayet,
GSP29nystik_u:2961: tasmād viṣaktāvayavatejodravyāpratyakṣatvasamāropamātreṇa dūṣaṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ tvanyathāsiddhatvadūṣaṇaṃ pāramārthikaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2964: dūṣayati--sa svatantraśrcakṣurviṣayo na bhavati indriyaṃ cārthaṃ cāntarā abhāvo grāhyaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2966: na cendriyārthayormadhyate kasyacit saṃyuktasya vā samavetasya vā grahaṇamasti,
GSP29nystik_u:2969: mā bhūdāntarālikaṃ saṃyuktaṃ vā samavetaṃ vā viśeṣyaṃ gṛhyamāṇameva tu rūpādiviśeṣyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2972: pratīyate hi tvagādibhiḥ apīndriyaiḥ prāpyakāribhirauṣṇyābhavaviśeṣaṇa śiṣirataraṃ pāthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2980: ye tu sāntara iti grahaṇamiti hetumāhuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2984: tatra ya eva śarīrāsaṃbaddha ityanubhūyate tameva sāntara iti manyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2987: śarīrasaṃbandhena tasya sparśādau na sāntaratvābhimāna ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2995: na caitat niryatā vinā pṛthvagratāṃ bhavatīti pṛthvagratā sūcitā /

GSP29nystik_u:3006: sa ca tādṛgālokāvayavī pratyakṣo 'nyathā na rūpamātreṇa tadanumānaṃ śakyamityuktam /

GSP29nystik_u:3014: tādṛśaṃ cākṣuṣamapi teja iti krameṇāpi gacchad yugapattatra tatra lakṣyate /

GSP29nystik_u:3022: na cāyamasati bādhake mithyeti vaktuṃ śakyaḥ /

GSP29nystik_u:3095: na khalu yaiva candanasparśajñānasyotpattau sāmagrī saiva sukhasyāpīti /

GSP29nystik_u:3107: yatrāpīndriyārthasannikarṣastatrāpi jñānamastīti tadeva sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kāraṇaṃ kluptasāmarthyāt /

GSP29nystik_u:3117: hantar, iśvarasyāpyasti tatrabhavato yogarddhisaṃpannānāṃ ca mahādhiyāṃ samastavastusākṣātmāra iti teṣāmapi sukhaduḥkhotpādapracayaḥ prasajyet,
GSP29nystik_u:3120: sa ca satyapyarthasākṣātkāre nāsti siddhānāmiti na teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhotpādaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3121: api ca caramabhāvi kāraṇaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvabhāvināmakaraṇatvāpādane tantvādīnāmapi paṭādīn pratyakāraṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3122: saṃyogabhedādeva tādṛśapaṭātpatteḥ tantvādīnāṃ ca saṃyogabheda evopayogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3127: tatrobhayyapi indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamavyabhicārīti lakṣaṇena saṃgṛhītāpi svaśabdenopāttā,
GSP29nystik_u:3133: tadyathā ḍittho 'yaṃ gaurayaṃ śuklo 'yaṃ kamaṇḍalumānayaṃ gacchatyayamiti sarvaṃ hi savikalpakaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena vastuṣu pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:3135: na tu jātyādīnāṃ mitho viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāvagāhīti yāvat //
GSP29nystik_u:3136: tatra nāmarahitamavikalpakaṃ nāstīti ye vipratipadyante tanmatamapacikīrṣurūpanyasyati bhāṣyakāraḥ yāvadarthaṃ vai nāmadheyaśabdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3138: nāsti so 'rtho yaḥ kadācit kvacit kathañcit nāmadheyena viyujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3141: arthā hi pratīyamānāṃ nāmadheyairūpetāstatsāmānādhikaraṇyenāvagamyante gaurityartho 'śva ityartha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3145: na hi bhavati dhūmo 'yaṃ vahinariti kiṃ tu dhūmo 'yaṃ dhūmatvāt vahinamāniti /
GSP29nystik_u:3146: api cāśabdopāye 'numeyādau na śabdasaṃbhedenādhigamo bhavet, asti tu /
GSP29nystik_u:3147: tasmāt tairnāmadheyaiḥ saha samānādhikaraṇasyārthasya pratyayo yata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3149_0: kiṃ ca gavādiṣu ṣaḍjādiṣu ca śabdāpakarṣe 'rthapratyayāpakarṣāt tadutkarṣe tvarthapratyayotkarṣāt
GSP29nystik_u:3150: tadidaṃ samaḥ prayojanaṃ saṃpratyaya iti samadhikaḥ pratyaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3153: asti hi purovartidravyasāmānādhikaraṇyena rajatapratyayo na caitāvatā śuktī rajatātmikā bhavatītyata āha---arthasaṃpratyayācca vyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3155_1: viṣayajñānaṃ rūpamiti vā rasa iti vā evaṃ rūpādyarthasāmānādhikaraṇyena bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3158: uktamapi vyapadeśaṃ savyākhyānamāha--rūpamiti jānīte rasa iti jānīte iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3159: tathā cārthānāṃ nāmadheyātmakatvāt tadgocaramālocanamapi nāmadheyagocaramityarthavat nāmadheyena vyapadiśyamānaṃ śābdaṃ prasajyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3165: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte /
GSP29nystik_u:3172_1: iti parīkṣāparvaṇi vacanārhamapi subhāṣitarucitayā tadvilambamasahamāno bhāṣyakāro
GSP29nystik_u:3177: sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdātmakatvaṃ rūpādīnāmabhidhīyānaṃ śabdabrahmātmakatvaṃ vocyeta śreyamāṇagaurityādipadabhedātmakatvaṃ vā?
GSP29nystik_u:3180: na salvasmadādisamastadarśanapathātivṛttena śabdabrahmaṇā rūpādīnāmasti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītiḥ laukikānām /
GSP29nystik_u:3181: śrūyamāṇaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena tu tādātmyaprasādhane anupayuktaśabdasaṃbandhasya bālamūkādeḥ rūpādijñāneṣu nāsti śrūyamāṇaśabdagandho 'pi,
GSP29nystik_u:3183: na ca teṣāmapi prāgbhavīyaśabdabhāvanānugamena tatsāmānādhikaraṇyamiti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:3184: na khalu rūpādyātmanaḥ śabdasya rūpādivaiśadyaināvaiśadyaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3188: na ca tādātmyādanyad vācakatvaṃ śabdānāṃ yatra saṃbandhagrahāpekṣā bhavet /

GSP29nystik_u:3195: ārddhekta eva sāmānādhikaraṇyanirāsāya saṃbandhagrahaṇasvarūpamāha--asthārthasya sāsnādimadrūpasya ayaṃ gakarādyokāro nāmadheyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3197: tathā ca yo ḍittho nānādeśakālāvasthāsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ piṇḍabhedaḥ so 'yamiti sannihitadeśakāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3198: na tvayaṃ piṇḍo ḍitthaśabda iti pratyayaḥ /

GSP29nystik_u:3206: tena vyutpannasya nirvikalpakāt parāñcaḥ pratyayāḥ śabdānupāyā api śabdapuraḥsarā jāyante /

GSP29nystik_u:3213: yato na viśiṣyate tasmāt tadarthajñānaṃ tādṛgeva bhavati /

GSP29nystik_u:3217: tasmāt punarapi tādātmyaṃ prasaktamityata āha--tasya tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:3218: arthākārameva tu jñānamarthavyapadeśena vyapadiśyate anyathā aśakyatvādityarthaḥ /

GSP29nystik_u:3239: aśabdatve vā sa evāsyārthaḥ śabdād bhinnaḥ prasajyate /

GSP29nystik_u:3261: yadyapi sāmānyalakṣaṇenaiva vyabhicāriṇo nirastāḥ pratyayāḥ tadapekṣaṃ ca viśeṣalakṣaṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:3269: na khalvagṛhītaṃ liṅgaṃ vā śabdo vā āgamasahitaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vā yathāviṣayam ādadhāti pramām /

GSP29nystik_u:3278: evaṃ yathā mudgastambastathā mudgaparṇīti āptavākyaśravaṇādeva mudgastambasādṛśyajñānasyānupajanitaphalasyāpi śakyaṃ tadarthāvyabhicāritvaṃ niśrcetum /
GSP29nystik_u:3279: pratyakṣasya tu pramāṇasyātyantaparokṣasvarūpolambha eva tāvat pramopajananāt prāg durlabhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3281: yadyapi ca saṃvedanaprāmāṇyapakṣe 'pi tatsaṃvedanaṃ manasā sulabham,
GSP29nystik_u:3283: api tu asādhāraṇendriyārthasannikarṣasahāyamiti tatsahāyasya tasya parokṣatvameva /
GSP29nystik_u:3285: na svarūpataḥ ityetat pramāṇāntarebhyo vyāvṛttamasādhāraṇaṃ pratyakṣasya rūpamādarśayitumavyabhicāripadopādānam /
GSP29nystik_u:3287: na hyasti saṃbhavo 'vyabhicaritapratyakṣagṛhītapakṣadharmatākaṃ tarkasahāyapratyakṣagṛhītāvinābhāvaṃ cānumānaṃ vyabhicāratīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3289: tadapi yadyapi prathamaṃ vyāptigrahaṇadoṣeṇa na khaṇḍitam,
GSP29nystik_u:3291: tathā ca vyāptigrāhi pratyakṣaṃ tatrāpi vyabhicārīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3292: evamāgamo 'pi sākṣāt kvacit pāramparyeṇa pratyakṣapūrvakastadvyabhicāreṇaiva vyabhicarati /
GSP29nystik_u:3294: tadevaṃ pratyakṣāvyabhicāre pramāṇānāmavyabhicāro 'stīti pratyakṣasyaiva viśeṣaṇamavyabhicāripadaṃ cakāra,
GSP29nystik_u:3303: tasmāt suṣṭhūkaṃ grīṣme marīcaya iti bhāṣyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3314: indriyeṇālocya marīcīn uccāvacamuccalato nirvikalpakena gṛhītvā paśrcāt tatropaghātadoṣād viparyeti,
GSP29nystik_u:3321: no khalu saṃśayajñānaṃ vikalpyamānavastugocaraṃ tadrūpaṃ vastu prāpayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3327: na ca tadevāsya preṣiturvi dhitsitam, tathehāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:3329: tathā hi vyavasāyo viniśrcayo vikalpa ityanarthāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:3330: sa evātmā rūpaṃ yasya tat savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3331: tadetadatisphaṭatvāt śiṣyairgamyata eveti bhāṣyavārttikakārābhyām avyākhyātamapi asmābhiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3337: na cendriyārthābhyāṃ labdhajanma vijñānamarthāvabhāsaṃ śakyamabhilāpena yojanayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:3344: na hi rūpāt jāyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ rasasahitametadādarśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3357: tathā hi yadabhilāpakalpanānugataṃ na tadarthasāmarthyajaṃ yatheśvarapradhānādivikalpavijñānam /
GSP29nystik_u:3358: tathā caite vivādādhyāsitā vikalpā iti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3359: niṣedhyamarthasāmarthyajatvaṃ tadabhilāpakalpanānanugatatvena vyāptaṃ tadviruddhaṃ ca sadanugatatvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3361: arthasāmarthyena hi tadutpadyamānamartharūpam anukuryād na śabdarūpam /
GSP29nystik_u:3362: na hyarthe śabdāḥ santi tadātmāno vetyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3365: yatra tarhi te kṛtasaṅketāḥ tadeva smārayedetān /
GSP29nystik_u:3366: tatraiva ca te kṛtasaṅketā yadanugataṃ sāmānyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3372: tasmād yad dṣṭaṃ na tena śabdānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3374: api ca dṛṣṭasya śabdavācyatve darśanādiva vahinaruṣṇa iti vākyādapi pratīyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3375: tathā ca śabdādapi tasmin pratīte śītāpanopanaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3377: tādṛśaṃ ca taddarśanasya kāraṇamiti nirvikalpakena prathamākṣatannipātajanmanā jātimadvastuvedanāt tatropalabdhacarasaṃbandhasya śabdasya smaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:3378: tathā ca tacchabdābhidheyajātiviśiṣṭadravyāvagāhīndriyārthasannikarṣajanmā vikalpapratyayo gaurayamityevamākāro jāyata iti cet? yathāhuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3385: na hi jātijātibhantau vā kriyākriyāvantau va guṇaguṇinau vā tatsamavāyo vā vivekena cakāsati /
GSP29nystik_u:3386: na ca vivekenāpratibhāsamānaḥ śakyā mitho yojayituṃ kṣīrodakavadatadvedinā /
GSP29nystik_u:3395_0: api ca vastuniveśe jātyādīnāmupādhīnāmekasya vastunaḥ sattvaṃ ca dravyatvaṃ ca pārthivatvaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3395_1: ca vṛkṣatvaṃ ca śiṃśapātvaṃ copādhaya iti dūrādekopādhiviśiṣṭasya grahe sarvopādhiviśiṣṭagrahaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3397: patanadharmaṇo hi badarasyottarasya kuṇḍamadharaṃ pratayāsannamapatanadharmakaṃ badaraṃ vidadhadādhāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3401: tasmāt svabhāva eva svakāraṇādhīnajanmā dravyasya sa tādṛśo yena bahūnāmupādhīnāmupakarotīti vācyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3402_0: tathā ca sattvopakārasamartheṃ tasmin dravye gṛhyamāṇe dravyatvādyupakārasamartho
GSP29nystik_u:3402_1: 'pi sa evāsya svabhāva iti tatsvabhāvāvacchinnāḥ sattvavikalpakena paramārthasaddravyāvagāhinā
GSP29nystik_u:3402_2: sarva eva dravyatvapārthivatvavṛkṣatvaśiśapātvādayo viṣayīkṛtā iti vikalpāntarāṇāmānarthakyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3410: asmākaṃ tu anādivikalpavāsanopādānā vikalpā yacca gṛhṇanti,
GSP29nystik_u:3411: yacca adhyavasyanita tayorūbhayorapyanyanivṛttirūpatayā avastutvāt matāgapi na paramārthasad vastu gāhante,
GSP29nystik_u:3412: pāramparyeṇa tu vastupratibandhāt tatra pravartayantaḥ prāpayantaśca na visaṃvādayanti lokam /
GSP29nystik_u:3414: api cālocite vastunīndriyeṇa tadanantarotpannaṃ śabdasmaraṇavyavahitavyāpāramindriyamarthaśrca na savikalpikāmapi dhiyamupajanayitumarhataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3418: na ca yadevālocanamajījanadindriyaṃ tadeva smaraṇasahakāri vikalpapratyayamādhatte /
GSP29nystik_u:3431: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca saṃbandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim /
GSP29nystik_u:3435: jātiguṇakriyāvatāṃ caitanna saṃbhavatyeva rūpavivekasaṃbandhayorapratibhāsanena ghaṭanāyogāt kṣīrodakavadatadvedinetyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3443: tena tajjanitaṃ jñānamarthasāmarthyajaṃ cābhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3445: na ca dravyādyabhinnaṃ jātyādi bhinnaṃ kalpayanto vikalpā nārthasāmarthyajanmāna iti sāṃpratat /
GSP29nystik_u:3447: yathā ca bhede 'pi teṣāṃ tadvācakānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tathopapāditamadhastāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3448: na ca bhinnena śabdena ḍittho 'yamityabhedakalpanādarthasya vikalpānāmanarthajatvamiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3454: śabdastu saṃpātāyāto na niveśayatyātmānam indriyaje vikalpe /
GSP29nystik_u:3457: cakṣuṣāpi sa evāyaṃ piṇḍaḥ saṃprati dṛśyate //
GSP29nystik_u:3461: saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na bādhate /
GSP29nystik_u:3466: na ca prāgavasthāsmaraṇasāpekṣatayā nendriyārthasannikarṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ vikalpasyeti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:3472: na hi nājījanat kuśūlasthaṃ bījamaṅkuramiti na samavahitakṣityādisahakārigrāmamapyasyājanakaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3473: na ca janakatvājanakatvalakṣaṇo viruddhadharmasaṃsargo bhedaheturityupapādayiṣyate kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge //
GSP29nystik_u:3476: na ca vartamāno 'rthaḥ smaraṇagocaraḥ smaraṇasyānubhavajanitasaṃskārodbodhajanmanaḥ pūrvānubhavagocaraṃ prati niyamāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3478: na hi rūpaviṣayāḥ sahasramapi nayanapradīpādayaḥ śabdaviṣayasya śravasaḥ sahakāritāmāpadyanta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3479: tat kiṃ bhavatāṃ yatra gandhajñānānantaraṃ cākṣuṣaṃ rūpajñānaṃ jāyate tatra gandhajñānam na samanantarapratyayaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:3480: tatrāpi hi cakṣūrūpaviṣayaṃ na gandhaviṣayasya jñānasya sahakāri bhavitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:3486: tathā satyākāśaparamāṇvādayo 'pi tatsaṃyuktā iti te 'pi pratyakṣāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:3504: yathā hyekasmin padmarāgamaṇau gṛhyamāṇe tadabhāvo vyavacchidyate,
GSP29nystik_u:3505: yadi punarnaṃ vyavacchidyeta tadā bhāvo na paricchidyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:3507: tadabhāvāvinābhāvinaśrca puṣparāgādaya iti te 'pi sarve vayavacchinna bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:3509: sa eva puṣparāgādyatmeti tadavinābhāvī padmarāgābhāvaḥ padmarāgaśrca syāditi durghaṭamāpadyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3516: tasmāt pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhādanyo 'paradeśakālasaṃbandha iti siddho viṣayabheda iti //
GSP29nystik_u:3523: tasmād viṣayabhodāt virodha iti cet---na tvihāpi tadekaṃ jñānaṃ tasyaivaikasya vastunaḥ pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhe parokṣamaparokṣaṃ vā paradeśakālasaṃbandha iti ko virodhaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:3526: yato yuktaṃ yat padmarāgasvarūpagrahe tadabhāvo vyavacchidyata iti,
GSP29nystik_u:3531: tayoḥ kadācidapi tādā tmyenānupalambhāditi cet---yatra tarhi tādātmyamupalabhyate na tatra tadabhāvāvinābhāvaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3532: tathā ca pūrvāparadeśakālasaṃbaddhastādātmyenānubhūyamāna indriyajena vikalpena padmarāgo na bhinno bhavitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:3533: tasmāt parvāparadeśakālau tatsaṃndhau vā kāmaṃ bhidyeyātāṃ parasparābhāvāvinābhāvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:3539: na cendriyārthasannikarṣābhāve 'pi pūrvāparāvasthāparāmarśātmano vikalpasya bhāvādanindriyajayatvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP29nystik_u:3540: tathā satyavikalpakamapi kāmāturasya kāminīṃ bhāvayataḥ tadviṣayamindriyārthasannikarṣaṃ vināpi dṛṣṭamiti nīlādyanubhāvātmāno 'pi avikalpakā anindriyajāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:3541: yadi tu nīlādyanubhavānāṃ kāminyanubhavāt kathañcid viśeṣaṃ brūyāta,
GSP29nystik_u:3542: tadā asmākamapi anindriyajebhyo vikalpebhya utprekṣāvyāpārebhyo 'stīndriyajānāṃ darśanavyāpārāṇāṃ bhedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3543: na ca vikalpagato darśanavyāpāro 'nubhūyamānaḥ sati saṃbhave nirvikalpakopādhiriti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3544: sarvā eva hīndriyajā buddhayo vikalpikā avikalpikā vā dhārāvāhinyo 'mahamikayā parasparānapekṣā ekamarthamavagāhamānā udayante vyayante ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3546: tasmāt indriyārthasannikarṣalabdhajanmāno vikalpā darśanavyāpārā nānya iti yuktamutpaśyamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3547: na ca śabdapratyakṣayorvastugocaratve satyapi pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3550: na caikopādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte upādhyantaraviśiṣṭatadgrahaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3552: na tūpādhayo va tairviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3553: na ca yat svabhāvasaṃbandhi sa svabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3556: api ca rūpajñānaṃ viṣayagrahaṇadharma nānāparamāṇuviṣayaṃ na paramāṇusvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3557: tatsvabhāvatve vā teṣāṃ sarvān pratyaviśeṣāt sarvaireva te paramāṇavo viditāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3558: na cāsaṃbaddhā eva svajñānena rūpaparamāṇavo viṣayāstasyeti vācyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3560: svabhāva evārthajñānabhedayoḥ saṃbandho yadartho viṣayo jñānaṃ ca viṣayīti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:3561: hantopādhyupādhimatorapi svabhāva eva saṃbandho 'stu tathāpi vijñānārthavanna svarūpābhedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3572: na tvasti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo vāstava iti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:3577: tathā sati darśanavyāpāratvamasya sākṣāt samarthitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3580: hanta bhoḥ kiṃ mānasamapi jñānaṃ saṃkalayitumarhati?
GSP29nystik_u:3584: asmākaṃ tu manaḥ sarvaviṣayamapi acetanatayā na vicārakam /
GSP29nystik_u:3585: tasmādātmaiva sakalajñānatajjanitavāsanādhāraḥ smartā ca pratisandhātā ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3587: ātmanyeva sthitaṃ jñānaṃ sa hi boddhātra gamyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3588: smaraṇe cāsya sāmarthyaṃ sandhānādau ca vidyate //
GSP29nystik_u:3589: # ślo. vā. pratyakṣa. 122 # sa salvindriyārthasannikarṣādālocya jātimantaṃ saṃmugdhamartham udbuddhasaṃskārasamupajātapūrvapiṇḍānusmṛtisahāyaḥ prāgeva cakṣuṣā vikalpayati,
GSP29nystik_u:3592: karaṇaṃ cendriyaṃ buddheḥ kartā cātma sacetanaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3597: arthau hi rūparūpibhāvena sthitāvapi nāpātajanmanā jñānena tathā gṛhītau,
GSP29nystik_u:3601: savikalpakaṃ tūktasāmagrījanma jātyādirūpatayā dravyaṃ ca rūpitayā kalpayat paścājjāyamānamapīndriyārthasannikarṣaprabhavatayā pratyakṣaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP29nystik_u:3603: tat siddhametad vivādādhyāsitā vikalpāḥ svagocare pratyakṣā avyabhicāritve sati indriyārthasannikarṣajatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3604: yo ya evaṃbhūtaḥ sa sarpaḥ pratyakṣo yathālocanam,
GSP29nystik_u:3611: nanu satīndriyārthasannikarṣe purovartini dravye dhūma iti vā reṇuriti vā jñānamutpadyamānaṃ kathamanindriyajamityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3613: saṃpūrvo hi śīḍ bhāvapratyayānto viśeṣāpekṣe vimarśe vartate sa caikādhikaraṇau smaryamāṇau mitho viruddhau dharmāvāropayan anyatarannāvadhārayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3616: ata eva visphāritākṣāḥ saudāminīsaṃpātāt sakṛdālocya kañcit samānadharmavantaṃ dharmiṇaṃ samandhakāre sandigdhe,
GSP29nystik_u:3617: tasmānmānasa evaiṣa saṃśayo na tvindriyaja ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3618: tadetat pariharan na caitadityādi bhāṣyaṃ vcācaṣṭe---tacca naivam /
GSP29nystik_u:3624: indriyeṇopalabdhaṃ sannikṛṣṭaṃ sannikarṣapūrvakatvāduparladheḥ manasopalabhate jānīte cakṣuḥsahāyenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3625: atra bhāṣyaṃ yacca tadindrayānavadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ manasānavadhāraṇaṃ tadviśeṣapekṣaṃ vimarśamātraṃ saṃśayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3632: yaduparatendriyavyāpārasya saṃśayajñānaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayā hṛdi sthitaṃ śaṅkiturityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3636: nanu smaraṇavyavahitavyāpāramasya kāraṇaṃ nendriyamityata āha--tasya hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3637: upapāditametadadhastāt yathā smaraṇaṃ nendriyavyāpāraṃ vyavadhatta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3640: syādetat, mana evendriyānapekṣaṃ bāhye pravartate ityabhyupeyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3641: anyathā ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti jñānaṃ nirnimittaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3647: yadi ca ghaṭādau bāhye na manaḥ pravartena,
GSP29nystik_u:3652: tathā ca sarva eva saṃśayo mānasa ityāśaṅkyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3656: tathā ca saṃśayajñānotpāde apīndriyārthasannikarṣo 'pekṣaṇīya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3664: āntaraṃ ca mana ityata āha--pṛthak ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3668: tat kimatra prameyārthena pramāṇena ityata āha---na ca teṣāmiti nanūktaṃ svasaṃvedanatayā na pramākarmabhāva eṣāmityata āha--na cānyā gatiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:3675: na sukhādi prameyaṃ vā mano vāstvindriyāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:3698: api ca vaidharmyāt manovat śrotramapi na vaktavyamityāha--śrotre ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3703: darśayiṣyati hi vārttikakāro yathā svārthiko na kaśrcidapi pratyaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3706: tadadena sati cendriyārthasannikarṣe ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:3707: yaccāparaṃ vaidharmyaṃ ghrāṇādibhyo manasa uktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa tadapi siṃhāvalokanena dūṣayati---saguṇānāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3708: ghrāṇādīni yathā svasvaguṇena gandhādinā bāhyaṃ gandhādi bodhayanti ,
GSP29nystik_u:3709: naivaṃ svaguṇena śabdena śrotraṃ bāhyaṃ śabdaṃ bodhayati,
GSP29nystik_u:3712: bhūtatvābhūtatvalakṣaṇaṃ vaidharmyaṃ na bhautikatvābhautikatvagrahaṇena śakyaṃ vaktumityavadhāraṇābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3715: tabhdāvānavagame ca nendriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ sukhādijñānaṃ śakyaṃ vaktumityata āha--tantrāntareti /
GSP29nystik_u:3716: tantryate vyutpādyate anena tattvamiti tantraṃ śāstram /
GSP29nystik_u:3723: sarvasya tantrāntare loke ca siddhatvādavaktavyatāyāṃ svamatamiti nāsti /
GSP29nystik_u:3724: vacanaliṅgaṃ hi matājñānaṃ na cānanumate niṣedhamātraṃ śakyaṃ vaktum,
GSP29nystik_u:3731: indriyārthasannikarṣotvannaṃ jñānamavyabhicārīti hi pratayakṣalakṣaṇamanavayavena samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyāvṛttaṃ śakyameva lakṣayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:3732: na khalvayamasāvaśva iti jñānamindriyajaṃ śabdajaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3736: tatra dravyamaindriyakameva na śābdamityaśakyaṃ hi jñānaṃ vyavacchettum,
GSP29nystik_u:3743: atha na vācyatvaṃ nāma mīmāṃsakānāmiva kiñcidatīndriyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3752_0: vyavasāyātmakapadena tu savikalpake jñāne 'varuddhe nirvikalpakasyāpratyakṣatā mā
GSP29nystik_u:3757: dvipadaparigraheṇa daśa--indriyārthasannikarṣotpannapadaṃ dhravaṃ kṛtvā jñānādyekaikapadasaṃbandhena carastraḥ koṭayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3758: jñānaṃ ca ghavaṃ kṛtvā avyapadeśyādi ekaikapadasaṃbandhena tistraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3759: evamavyapadeśyapadaṃ dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādyekaikapadasaṃbandhena dve koṭī,
GSP29nystik_u:3762: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyapadeśyādyekaikapadasaṃbandhe tistraḥ koṭayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3763: jñānamavyapadeśyamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādipadasaṃbandhena dve koṭī,
GSP29nystik_u:3765: avyabhicārivyavasāyātmakapadayostu dhruvayorindriyārthasannikarṣotpanna padena jñānapadena ca pratyekaṃ saṃbandhe koṭidvayam,
GSP29nystik_u:3768: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamavyapadeśyamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādyekaikasaṃbandhe dve koṭī,
GSP29nystik_u:3773: na hyatra tadvyavacchedavācakaḥ kaśrcidasti śabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3779: tadevaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ samarthya vāsubandhavaṃ tāvat pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitum upanyasyati--apare punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:3782: yadi tata eva tabhdavati nārthāntarād vyapadeśāsaṃbandhinaḥ tat pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3783: ata eva vyapadeśāsaṃbandhino 'rthāntarāt śuktirūpāt rajatena vyapadiśyāmānaṃ śuktijñānaṃ na pratyakṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:3786: etasya pratyakṣābhāsasya vyāvṛttiḥ suprasiddheti tāmupekṣyānumānavyāvṛttim āha--eteneti /
GSP29nystik_u:3787: kutaḥ? na hi tata eva vyapadeśakādeva vahneḥ tad vijñānamanumānaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:3789: tataśca yatra tu dṛṣṭamātra eva vahnerūparamāduparato dhūmaḥ tatrānyataśrca tabhdavati smaryamāṇād dhūmādasati vyapadeśake vahnau /
GSP29nystik_u:3790: tato 'rthāt ityatra hi arthaviśeṣaṇaṃ tata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3795: na hi jñānavyapadeśa ātmanā vā indriyeṇa vā saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3800: asati cārthapade kasyedaṃ viśeṣaṇam iti viśeṣaṇasaṃgato naivakāro 'yogaṃ vyavacchindāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3803: anyathā abhidhānāparyavasānād yasya tad vyapadiṣyata iti vyapadeśasaṃbandhī viśeṣyaḥ prāpyata eveti sidhyatyeva viśeṣaṇatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:3812: tathā cānumānādyapi liṅgajñānādestata upajāyate iti pratyakṣaṃ prasajyeteti tannivṛttyarthamarthāditi vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3816: yasya tad vyapadiśyate ityapekṣya tataḥśabdasāmarthyenānumānādivyudāso 'pi pratyuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3820: tat pratyakṣaṃ tato ghaṭa ityapi jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasajyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:3823: tasya vicārāsahatayā paramārthasattvābhāvena saṃvṛtisato vijñānaṃ prati kāraṇabhāvābhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3827: rūpādiparamāṇava eva nirantarotpādāḥ paramārthasanto bhinnāḥ svavijñānasyāvikalpakasya janakāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3828: teṣāṃ tu nānātvaṃ svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛṇvatī nirvikalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvinī ghaṭa iti vikalpikā buddhiḥ tāneva rūpādīn ekodakāharaṇādikriyākāriṇo bhedina iva darśayantī saṃvṛtirityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3831: nirākaroti--manomodaketi bhavantu vyatiriktāḥ kimetāvatāpītyata āha--sarvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3832: yatsaṃvṛtitvena bhavatāmabhimataṃ yaccāvikalpakaṃ tatsarvaṃ svaviṣayād bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3835: mithyājñānanivṛttyarthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti codayati---nanu ca mithyājñānamatasmādapi bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3836: yathā purovarti dravyamidamiti vyapadiśyate rajatamiti na,
GSP29nystik_u:3838: tena yadyapi sāmānyarūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate jñānam,
GSP29nystik_u:3840: tathāpi yena viśeṣaṇarūpeṇa tasya vayapadiśyate na tatastabhdavati iti atasmādapītyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3841: tasmāt tata eva yabhdavati tat pratyakṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:3844: pariharati--na hyatasmāt āropitādrūpāt tatrāsataḥ tat mithyajñānaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:3846: yasya sāmānyarūpasya vyapadiśyata idamiti tata eva /
GSP29nystik_u:3852: yato bhavati jñānaṃ sa grāhyo 'rthaḥ kāraṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:3854: tayorayugapabhdāvāt vartamānābhaṃ jñānamatīte mithyeti na pratyakṣaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3858: kṣaṇikatvād bhāvānāṃ kāraṇasaya nāśaḥ kāryasyotpāda ityekaḥ kālaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3862: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3874: tathā sati jñānametasmin mithyeti kathaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:3878: na ca gauṇamukhyalakṣaṇā girāṃ gatayo jñāneṣuśakyā niyojayitum bhinnaprasthānatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3879: tasmāt nirākāraṃ jñānamātmano bhinnaṃ gocarayatīti vācyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3880: sa cet kāraṇaṃ vinaṣṭasya pratyakṣateti tathā ca vartamānābhamavartamānaṃ gocarayati mithyātvamapratyakṣatvaṃ ca syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3887: yadṛcchāśabdeṣu hi nāmnā viśiṣṭo 'rtha ucyate ḍittha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3892: seyaṃ kalpanā yatra jñāne nāstyarthataḥ svarūpato vā tatkalpanayā apoḍhaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3893: tadidamāha--yat kila na nāmnā abhidhīyate arthataḥ svarūpataśrca na jātyādibhirvyapadiśyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3906: tasmānna avikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ tadgocaraṃ vā paramārthasad gocarayanti vikalpāḥ śabdāścetyayamabhisandhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3911: na hi yathā samyagjñānam adhikṛtya pratyakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ kīrtinā tathā dignāgena yenādhikārāt jñāne vyavatiṣṭheta kalpanāpoḍhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3912: nanu yadi svarūpato nābhidhīyetānabhidheyaṃ tarhi vastu prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3913: tathā cāvāstavaḥ syāt śābdo vyavahāra ityata āha--sarvasya ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3923: athāścakarṇādivadavyutpannaḥ kalpanāpoḍhaśabdaḥ pratyakṣasvarūpasya vācaka iti śaṅkate--atheti /
GSP29nystik_u:3925: bhavatu kalpanāpoḍhaśabdaḥ avyutpanno mā vā bhūt,
GSP29nystik_u:3934: asti ca mithyājñāne 'pi bodhyena saṃbandha indriyāṇām,
GSP29nystik_u:3936: atha yathā bodhyaṃ tādṛśo nāsti saṃbandha indriyāṇām,
GSP29nystik_u:3941: api ca prābhākare darśane anumānādijñānamātmani pratyakṣaṃ na bhavet,
GSP29nystik_u:3949: NyS_1,1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavaccheṣavatsāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ca //
GSP29nystik_u:3951: atrānumānamiti sidvavat pramāṇāviśeṣarūpalakṣyānuvāda eva nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamityaprāmāṇyamanumānasya sudūdaṃ pratikṣipati /
GSP29nystik_u:3952: dṛṣṭaprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyavijñānavyaktisādharmyeṇa hi kāsāṃcid vyaktīnāṃ prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ vā vidadhīta /
GSP29nystik_u:3953: dṛṣṭasādharmyaṃ cānumānam eveti kathaṃ tenaiva tasyāprāmāṇyam?
GSP29nystik_u:3954: api cānumānamapramāṇamiti vākyaprayogo 'jñaṃ vipratipannaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā puruṣaṃ pratyarthaṃvān /
GSP29nystik_u:3955: na ca parapuruṣavartino dehadharmā api sandehājñānaviparyāsā gauratvādivat pratyakṣamīkṣante /
GSP29nystik_u:3959: jāno nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka ityunmattavadanavadheyavacanaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3973: anumānādipūrvakaṃ cānumānaṃ na pratyakṣapūrvakamiti nānumānaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:3977: tatra prathame vigrahe tānītyanantaraṃ sūtram uvallaṅghya vibhāgasūtragatāḥ pratyakṣādayaḥ saṃbandhanīyāḥ yogyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3986: te iti vigrahe anantarasūtragatameva pratyakṣapadaṃ saṃbadhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3987: yathā ca dve pratyakṣe pūrve yasya pratyakṣasya liṅgaparāmarśajñānasya pratyakṣaphalasya /
GSP29nystik_u:3995: atha tadarthaviṣaye dvitīye pratyakṣe sati yā tatpadaviṣayā smṛtirutpadyate sāpi pratyakṣadvayapūrvā /
GSP29nystik_u:3996: evaṃ liṅgalliṅgsiṃbandhasmṛtirapi pratyakṣadvayapūrveti tadavasthaivātivyāptirityāśayavān pṛcchati--- katare dve iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4001: vyāptisaṃskārobdodha samayajanmanā svajanitena saṃskāreṇāsya vyāptismaraṇasamaye vināśāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4002: vinaśyadavasthasya dvitīyaliṅgadarśanasya vyāptismaraṇena saha yaugapadye 'pi tayoḥ parasparavārtānabhijñatayā mitho ghaṭanāyogaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4006: tasmād ubhābhyāmutpannaṃ parāmarśajñānamindriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratyakṣam eṣitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4013: tatra yo buddhau sākṣādātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ niveśayati sa pratyakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4014: sa hi svaviṣayāyā buddheḥ janaka iti tamantareṇa buddhirātmānamanāsādayantī tasya sattā niścāyayatīti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4019: sa hi pratibaddhasvabhāvo yathāvidhaḥ siddhaḥ tathāvidhasannidhānaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:4021: tathā sati sa śyāmo maitanayatvāt paridṛśyamānamaitratanayastomavadityapyanumānaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4024: yathāha kāryakāraṇabhāvād vā svabhāvād vā niyāmakāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4026: tathā ca liṅgavikalpaṃ vinā na liṅgivikalpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4029: na cāvinābhūtaṃ liṅgaṃ vinā liṅginamiti liṅgisvalakṣaṇāpratibhāsyapi pāramparyeṇa tatpratibandhāt tatrāvisaṃvādako 'numānavikalpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4031: asmin sati bhavati satsvapi tadanyeṣvasminnasati na bhavati evamākāro nānvayavyatirekābhyāmatiricyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4033: tathā hi satyagnau dhūma iti pratyakṣameva vikalpānugatavyāpāramadhyavasyati /
GSP29nystik_u:4034: asati cāgnau na dhūma ityapi pratyakṣameva,
GSP29nystik_u:4038: yathā sattvasya kṣaṇikatayā saha tādātmyaṃ vipakṣai'kṣaṇike kramākramayorvyāpakayoranupalambhanniścīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4042: tasya yatra pratibandhaḥ tadvidastasya tadgamakaṃ tatretyanujānīmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4043: sa eva tu pratibandho na tāvat tadutpattyā saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4046: sa tādṛśo 'sti rāsabhasyāpīti tatpratibaddho 'pi dhūmaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4048: na ca rāsabhānantaraṃ bhavannapi tadanantarameva bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:4050: asatyapi tasmin sati ādrendhanavati vahnau tadbhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4051: atha yadyapi dhūmasya vahnibhāvābhāvānuvidhānaṃ tatropalabdhaṃ tathāpi deśāntarādiṣu tadbhāvo 'sya kutastyaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:4052: tathā hi bhūyo bhūyo rāsabhe dṛṣṭe dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4055: tajjātīyasyaiva dhūmasya rāsabhaṃ vinā sati vahnau bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4056: evaṃ satyapyagnau piśācena janito dhūmaḥ kvacit deśādau tajjātīya eva rāsabhavad vahnyabhāve 'pi piśācādeva bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP29nystik_u:4063: yo yo dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ sa sarvastāvadārdrendhanasahitavahnyanantarameva na piśācānantaram /
GSP29nystik_u:4064: sa ca kādācitkatayā nimittamapekṣamāṇo yadanantarameva gamyate tadevāpratītavyabhicāraṃ nimittīkaroti,
GSP29nystik_u:4067: yadi na tannimittaṃ kasmāt vināpi vahni kvacid dhūmo nopalabhyate?
GSP29nystik_u:4069: tathā satyādrendhanavat kathaṃ vahnirapi na kāraṇam?
GSP29nystik_u:4071: akāraṇasya hi kāryasya nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4076: vahnyanantarameva bhāva iti hi dhūmasya vahnikāryatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:4077: sa cet avahnerapyanantaraṃ naivakārārthaḥ syāditi na vahneḥ kāryam /
GSP29nystik_u:4084: tadeva tu tadanantarameva bhāva ityevaṃrūpaṃ nāsti /
GSP29nystik_u:4085: yadyapi ca vinā vahni nopalabdho dhūmo yadyapi ca piśācānantaraṃ nopalabhyate teṣāmanupalabdheḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4086: tathāpi piśācakārya eva dhūmasyatra tatra vahniḥ kutaścit svahetorūpanipatito rāsabha iva na tu dhūmasya janamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4087: tena tadabhāve 'pi tajjātīya eva kāraṇabhedajanmā kadācit kādācitko dhūmaḥ syāditi anivṛttireva śaṅkāyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4088: na dṛṣṭasaṃbhave nādṛṣṭaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktamiti śakyaṃ bhavadbhirvaktum,
GSP29nystik_u:4092: na ca yad yadanyasahitānantaram mupalabdhaṃ tat tadanyarahitāt tasmād bhavad bhinnajātīyaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4093: uktaṃ hi rāsabhasahitād vahneryādṛśo dhūmaḥ tādṛśa eva tadvirahitād vahneriti /
GSP29nystik_u:4094: tasmādevaṃvidhā śaṅkāpiśācī svanivārakaṃ tadutpattiniścayamāskandantī na śakyā nivārayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:4096: tathāpi kasmāt kāraṇamantareṇa na kāryaṃ bhavati?
GSP29nystik_u:4101: astu tarhi saṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikatayā anyānapekṣo 'vyabhicārī gamakāṅgam /
GSP29nystik_u:4102: sa ca yo vā sa vā bhavatu,
GSP29nystik_u:4105: api ca kāryāt kāraṇamanumīyamānaṃ tataḥ pūrvamevānumīyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:4109: na hi nadīpūrabhedaḥ svasattāsamayavarti varṣaṃ gamayatyapi tu tatpūrvakālam /
GSP29nystik_u:4111: ata eva sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena tatkālavartina varṣe sandihānā na tadarthinaḥ pravartante /
GSP29nystik_u:4114: tathā ca sati na tadarthinaḥ tatra niḥśaṅkaṃ pravarteran /
GSP29nystik_u:4116: na cānayorasti kā kāraṇabhāvaḥ tādātmyaṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:4118: sa svakāraṇaṃ pūrvarūpakṣaṇamanumāpayan yādṛśā tena janitaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4120: sa cānumāpakarasakṣaṇasamānakālarūpakṣaṇāntarajanaka eva svakāraṇam iti tādṛśameva gamayati /
GSP29nystik_u:4129: sa kiṃ tajjanakasya rūpakṣaṇasya svabhāva ata tatsvabhāvāvacchedako 'svabhāvabhūtaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:4135: nanu naitāvatāpyasya tulyakālasya rūpasya kāraṇabhāva iti kathaṃ kāryaṃ hetorgamyeta?
GSP29nystik_u:4138: sa kiṃ kāraṇānumiteḥ prāgathānumitisamaye paścād vā?
GSP29nystik_u:4139: na tāvat prāk na hi sattāmātreṇa kāraṇaṃ tad gamayatyatiprasaṅgāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4146: tathā ca rasāt kāryāt tatkāraṇaṃ rūpamanumātavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4147: tathā ca kāraṇāt kāryānumānaṃ tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmanyata iti nābhyāmeva pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4151: na ca lakṣaṇānurodhena lakṣyasyānyathākaraṇaṃ yuktaṃ parīkṣakāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4163: na hi tadeva karma ca kartṛ ceti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4165: yadyapi ca vṛkṣatvaśiṃśapātve paramārthato na bhinne tathāpi bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepābhyāṃ kalpitabhedayorgamyagamakabhāva iti cet---na,
GSP29nystik_u:4167: api ca kālpanikamapi rūpaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ na yathā bhinnamevamabhinnamapi na bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:4178: uktaṃ hi yathā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na bhāvānāmabhedasādhakam /
GSP29nystik_u:4179: jātyādiśabdā hi jātyādīn nimittīkṛtya dravye vartante /
GSP29nystik_u:4183: tasmād yatra gamyagamakabhāvo na tatra tādātmyam,
GSP29nystik_u:4184: yatra tādātmyaṃ na tatra gamyagamakabhāva iti saddhim /
GSP29nystik_u:4186: tasmāduccatvameva vṛkṣaśabdapravṛttinimittamiti manyamānaṃ mūḍhaṃ prati śiṃśapātvena vṛkṣavyavahāramātraṃ sādhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4189: tatrāpi ced vyavahāraḥ sādhyaḥ sa śiṃśapāyā bhinna iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4196: asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃbandhyekāryasamavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikam # vai. sū. 9/2/1 # //
GSP29nystik_u:4197: iti, atrāpi saṃbandhipadenaiva sarvāpasaṃgrahāt śeṣābhighānaṃ vyartham /
GSP29nystik_u:4199: tathā sati śeṣapadānyeva santu kṛtaṃ saṃbandhipadena,
GSP29nystik_u:4204: api ca bhūtaṃ varṣam abhūtasya vāyvabhrasaṃyogasya kathaṃ virodhi?
GSP29nystik_u:4205: taddhi tadanukūlameva evam abhūtam varṣaṃ bhūtasya vāyyabhrasaṃyogasyāpratikūlam /
GSP29nystik_u:4206: evaṃ bhūto nakulajayo na bhūtasya sarpaparājayasya virodhī /
GSP29nystik_u:4214: tasmād yo vā sa vāstu saṃbandhaḥ kevalaṃ yasyāsau svābhāviko niyataḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4215: sa eva gamako gamyaścetaraḥ saṃbandhīti yujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4222: tato na niyataḥ svābhāvikastu dhūmādīnā vahnyādisaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4224: kvacid vyabhicārasyādarśanāt māno 'pi darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhovana sandihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatva pratibadhnātīti sāṃpratam //
GSP29nystik_u:4226: iti dattāvakāśā khalviyaṃ laukikapramāṇāmaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāśicī labdhrapasarā na kvacit nāstīti nāyaṃ kvacit pravarteta /
GSP29nystik_u:4235: tasmādupādhi prayatnenānviṣyanto 'nupalabhyamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4237: anyenānyasya sahakāreṇa cet svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhavet,
GSP29nystik_u:4247: nanveṣa svabhāvānāmanuyogo bhinnānāmakāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi svabhāvapratibandhe tulya eva /
GSP29nystik_u:4249: kaḥ punaḥ pramāṇena svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate?
GSP29nystik_u:4252: yadā tāvat prathamaṃ vahnidhūmayoḥ sahādrendhanayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ paśyati tadā dvayorapi kiṃ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha aupādhiko vā?
GSP29nystik_u:4254: vahnervaupādhiko dhūmasya tu svābhāvika iti na śakyaṃ nirdhārayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:4255: tatra vahneranārdrendhanasya vinādhūmamayogolakādau darśanād ādrendhanopādhirasya dhūmena saṃbandho,
GSP29nystik_u:4257: dhūmaviśeṣasya tu vinā vahnimanupalabhbhād upādhibhedasya cādṛśyamānasya kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvād viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣasya ca saṃśayasyānupalabdhapūrve anutpādāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4258: utpāde vā atiprasaṅgāt prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyucchedāt svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ avadhāryate /
GSP29nystik_u:4262: na hi mano nimittam ityeva mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4265: tattadasādhāraṇakāraṇāpekṣayo tu tatpramāṇavyapadeśe atrāpi bhūyodarśanam asādhāraṇamiti pramāṇāntaraṃ jātam /
GSP29nystik_u:4267: evaṃ mānāntaraviditasaṃbandhiṣu mānāntarāṇyeva yathāsvaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyāni svābhāvikasaṃbandhagrahaṇe pramāṇamunnetavyāni /
GSP29nystik_u:4268: svabhāvataśca pratibaddhā hetavaḥ svasādhyena yadi sādhyamantareṇa bhaveyuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4269: svabhāvādeva pracyaveranniti tarkasahāyā nirastasādhyavyatirekavṛttisandehā yatra dṛṣṭāḥ tatra svasādhyamupasthāpayantyeva /
GSP29nystik_u:4271: annapānapariṇatibhedasyopādheḥ śyāmatāyā maitratanayasaṃbandhaṃ prati vidyamānatvena maitratanayatvasyāgamakatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4272: etena pakvānyasya vṛkṣasyāgravartīni phalāni etadvṛkṣaprabhavatvāt patitaphalavadityādayo 'pyaupādhikasaṃbandhā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4274: nanvantimapratyakṣamatītābhyāṃ pratyakṣābhyāṃ kathamanugṛhyate ityata āha---smṛtyā ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4279: saṃbandhasamṛtisahakāriṇā indriyeṇa svasādhyāvinābhūtaliṅgavijñānaṃ yadupajanyate tat parāmarśa
GSP29nystik_u:4281: tathābhūtaliṅgagocara eva caturtho vākyāvayava upanaya ityākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4287: sa ca liṅgaviṣayaḥ kriyā ca liṅgiviṣayeti viṣayavaiṣamyāt na kriyākaraṇabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4293: vṛkṣoddeśena pravartitaḥ paraśuḥ kartrā na tadavayavoddeśena,
GSP29nystik_u:4301: na kevalaṃ samānaviṣayatvāniyamaḥ kartuḥ karaṇaṃ bhinnamityapi niyamo nāstītyaniyamābhidhānaprasaṅgenāha-kvacit punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:4302: sthitiḥ sāvayaveṣu samavāyo vā pradeśaviśeṣe saṃyogo vā /
GSP29nystik_u:4303: evamaniyamaṃ dṛṣṭānta uktvā dārṣṭāntike yojayati---evamanyaviṣayasyeti dhūmaviṣayasya pramāṇasyāgniviṣayā kriyā pramitiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4304: yadā agniviṣayameva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatrāha---kvacit punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:4311: yadi anyaviṣayaṃ karaṇamanyaviṣayā kriyā bhavet tataśchedane khadiraṃ prāpte panasādāvapi cchidā syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4312: yadyapi vṛkṣoddeśena kartrā paraśuḥ prayuktastathāpyayaṃ vṛkṣamiva tadavayavānapi prāpta iti tadviṣayo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4313: tena tadavayavadvaidhībhāvamukhena vṛkṣaviṣayāmapi dvaidhībhāvakriyāṃ janayatīti na vaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ karaṇaphalayoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4317: na tu liṅgajñānaṃ liṅginaṃ vinā na nirūpyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4318: tasmāt pratipattayanubandhitayā viṣayo na liṅgajñānasya liṅgī,
GSP29nystik_u:4328: sthitau tu bhedo darśayiṣyate kartuḥ karaṇasya ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4329: tadevaṃ tāni te iti vigrahadvayaṃ parasparāpekṣamupapādya tāni taditi vigrahadvayaṃ parasparāpekṣamupapādayati---yadā punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:4330: liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhadarśanaṃ ca anantaraliṅgadarśanaṃ ca tatsmṛtiśceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4333: nanu yadi pramāṇaphalayorekaviṣayatvaṃ tarhi parāmarśajñānaviṣayīkṛta evārtho viṣayīkartavyo nānyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4334: sa ca pratyakṣapramāṇaviṣaya eveti kṛtamanumānenetyāśayavān pṛcchati---kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:4337: pratyakṣapramitāt liṅgādanyo liṅgī tadviṣayatvaṃ ca liṅgaparāmarśasyoktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4341: na tvanumitiranumānaṃ pramāṇavyāpāratvenātannimittatvāt karaṇakārakādanyatvād atatpūrvakatvācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4348: saṃbhavati hi tasyāpi siddhasya phalabhāvanāyāṃ nimittatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:4350: etasmiśca kalpe tatpūrvakamityatra tadā hānādisaṃbandhāvadhāraṇasamaye prathamaṃ vahnitvasya liṅgasya darśanam,
GSP29nystik_u:4353: tatpūrvako hi tathā cāyamanumīyamāno vahniriti liṅgaparāmarśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4368: tat kimidānīṃ nāstyeva guṇapradhānabhāva ityata āha---pradhāneti /
GSP29nystik_u:4369: nānvayavyatirekāvatra prabhavato na tu nyāyāntaramiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4383: na ca saṃskāraḥ pratyakṣapūrvo 'pi tādṛśajñānakāraṇamiti na tasya prasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4385: vibhāgasūtrākṣiptapramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇapūrvakaṃ viśeṣapramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ tadapekṣaṃ pravartamānaṃ nānupajanitaphale 'pramāṇe nirṇayamātre pravartitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:4394: anvayimātrāt vyatirekimātrācca vyāvṛtto 'nvayavyatirekī darśanīya iti hetutrayasādhāraṇe abādhitaviṣayatvātsatpratipakṣatve satī api heturūpe na darśite /
GSP29nystik_u:4401: tathā cāyaṃ nityebhya ākāśādibhyo ghaṭādiṣu cānityeṣvanvita iti bhavatyanvayavyatirekī /
GSP29nystik_u:4406: tena hetoryato vipakṣānnivṛttiḥ sa eva nāstīti kuto nivartatām,
GSP29nystik_u:4411: yasyābhāvādhikaraṇatvamapi na saṃbhavati nirūpākhyasya tasya bhāvādhikaraṇatvaśaṅketi subhāṣitam /
GSP29nystik_u:4412: na khalu mumurṣosatoyābhyavahāre 'pyasamarthasya śaṣkulībhakṣaṇaṃ śaṅkate cetanaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4413: tat kimidānīṃ bhāvābhāvau na parasparābhāvātmānau yadekaniṣedhenānyavidhiḥ syāt?
GSP29nystik_u:4414: satyam, yatraikatara etayorniṣidhyate vidhīyate vā tatra taditaravidharniṣedho vāvaśyaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:4417: nanu nirūpākhyo niṣedhādhikaraṇamiti ca vacaḥ svacaritaviruddham /
GSP29nystik_u:4418: na caitat tattvato nirūpākhye hetorvyatirekaṃ vā hetuṃ vā vyāsedhāmo nāpyanvayaṃ vidadhmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4422: atha nirūpākhye hetorvyatireka ityasya bhavadbhāṣitasya ko 'rthaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:4423: ahṛdayavācāṃ khalayahṛdayā eva prativāco bhavanti bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:4428: svābhāvikarūpasaṃpannaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ tattvajñānarūphalāya kalpate na kalpitarūpasaṃpadā,
GSP29nystik_u:4431: tasmādanupākhye vipakṣe hetorvyatirekanivṛttau vā vyatireke vā hetupravṛttau vā sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataivocitā /
GSP29nystik_u:4437: vipakṣasaṃbhave tu tatrāpi hetuvṛttiśaṅkānirākaraṇāya vyatirekagrahaṇam upāsanīyamiti sarvamavadātam //
GSP29nystik_u:4440: paramāṇvākāśādayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ prameyatvāt ghaṭavadityādayo draṣṭavyāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4443: tamimaṃ vyatirekiṇaṃ hetvavayavalakṣaṇavyākhyānāvasare vārttikakṛd upapādayiṣyatīti nehopapāditaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4444: tadevaṃ trividhamityavacchidya vyutpādya saṃprati pūrvavadityādinā ekavākyatayā vyācaṣṭa---atha vā trividhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4445: tisṛṣvapi vidhāsu sādhyavacanasya pūrvamapapādanāt pūrvaṃ sādhyaṃ tad yasyāstyadhikaraṇatayā tatpūrvavat /
GSP29nystik_u:4446: tathāpyanityāḥ paramāṇavo gandhavattvād ghaṭavadityapi hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4449: asti gandhavattvasya sādhyaṃ na tu vyāptyā,
GSP29nystik_u:4457: tathā ca bādhitaviṣayaṃ prakaraṇasamaṃ cānumānaṃ syādityata āha---caśabdāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4460: nanvevaṃ trividho 'pi hetuḥ pañcalakṣaṇaḥ syādityata āha---evamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4461: etaduktaṃ bhavati abādhitaviṣayamasatpratipakṣaṃ pūrvavaditi ca dhruvaṃ kṛtvā śeṣavadityekā vidhā,
GSP29nystik_u:4467: tadevaṃ svamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya bhāṣyakṛnmatena vyācaṣṭa---atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:4470: tad yasyāsti viṣayatayā parāmarśajñānasyānumānasya tat pūrvavadityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4478: kiṃ tarhi abhyupeyate ityata āha--kāryaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:4486: tathāpi yādṛśaṃ na vyabhicarati tatra nipuṇena pratipatrā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4487: anyathā dhūmamātramapi vahnisattāṃ vyabhicaratīti na dhūmaviśeṣo gamako bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:4489: api cāntyatantusaṃyogānantaraṃ paṭo jāyate tatrāpi śakyaṃ kāraṇāt kāryānumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4490: yadā khalvayamanyata evodbuddhasaṃskāro vyāptismṛtimān aviraleṣvitareṣu tantuṣu antyatantāvutpannāyāṃ kriyāyāmindriyasannikarṣāt prathamameva parāmṛśati tathā ceyamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:4493: tadā parāmarśāt tasmādavaśyaṃbhāvipaṭaviśiṣṭeyaṃ kriyetyanumānotpāda ityekaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4497: atha pratyakṣadarśanam ityanumānotpādasya parastāccaturthe kṣaṇe pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:4499: tathāpi tṛtīye kṣaṇe pratyakṣasya utpāda iti nānavasaramanumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4500: api ca badhiro murajamukhamabhihatya svapāṇinābhighātādeva śabdakāraṇāt tatkāryaṃ śabdaṃ niḥśaṅkamanumimīte /
GSP29nystik_u:4506: na tu vṛṣṭiranumīyamānā pūraviśeṣāt nātītā śakyānumātum,
GSP29nystik_u:4511: kāraṇasya hi kāryāt pūrvakālatā śakyā niścetum kāryeṇa liṅgena /
GSP29nystik_u:4514: sa ca kāryasya purastāt tato niścayavyāpta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4517: atrāpi kāryeṇa saviturdeśāntaraprāptyā tatkāraṇasya vrajyāyā anumānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4521: sādhyadharmāvinābhāvinā viśeṣaṇena sādhanadharmeṇa viśiṣyamāṇo dharmo gamyate gamakatvena /
GSP29nystik_u:4525: sa eva cobhayātmāṣa gamyo gamaka iṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4530: sāmānyenāvinābhāvinā hetunā avacchinnaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dharmirūpamanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭamanumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4532: tadetat pūrvavaccheṣavatorapi prāpakamapi tatpadasannidhānāt gobalīvardanyāyena te parityajyānyatra niviśate /
GSP29nystik_u:4540_0: deśāntaraprāptimānādityaḥ dravyatve sati kṣayavṛddhipratyayāviṣayatve ca prāṅmukhopalabhyatve
GSP29nystik_u:4540_1: ca tadabhimukhadeśasaṃbandhād anutpannapādavihārasya parivṛtya tatpratyayaviṣayatvāt maṇyādivat,
GSP29nystik_u:4542: so 'pi hi pratyabhijñāviṣayo bhavati tatraiva sthitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4555: mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ tvastācalacūḍāvalambi na prācyāṃ kasyacidupalambhagocara iti vaiṣamyam,
GSP29nystik_u:4556: tathāpi yadi draṣṭaiva puro 'vasthitasya paścimābhimukhasaya prāsādasya svayumupanipatya pṛṣṭato bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:4561: tamuddiśya khalvayaṃ padbhyāṃ saṃcaramāṇaḥ prāsādasya pṛṣṭato bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4571: anyathāsiddhatayā aṅgulyā nirdeśasya dikpratyakṣatvena na svābhāvikaḥ pratibandha ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4573: apratyakṣāyāṃ diśi digdeśasaṃbandhiṣvityetadeva kuta ityata āha---ādityeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:4575: tat punaridaṃ pratyakṣam ā codayāt ā cāstamayād deśāntaraṃ sañcaraṇaṃ mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasya anākalitadravyatve satītyādidaṇḍakānumānānāmindriyavyāpārāntaramupajāyamānatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4577_1: mayukhabhāgabhedāḥ pratyakṣadeśā iti teṣāṃ pratyakṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa savitṛmaṇḍalena
GSP29nystik_u:4578: idaṃ tvatisphuṭatayā nābhidhāya śiṣyavyutpādanāyākṣuṇṇaṃ mārgāntaraṃ darśitamiti mantavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4580: śiṃśapātvena śrutena vṛkṣatvānu mānamityādi sāmānyatodṛṣṭena saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:4585: yadyapi avinābhāvaḥ pañcasu caturṣu vā rūpeṣu liṅgasya samāpyate ityavinābhāvenaiva sarvāṇiliṅgarūpāṇi saṃgṛhyante,
GSP29nystik_u:4586: tathāpīha prasiddhasacchabdābhyāṃ dvayoḥ saṃgrahe gobalīvardanyāyena tat parityajya vipakṣavyatirekāsatpratipakṣatvābādhitaviṣayatvāni saṃgṛhṇāti /
GSP29nystik_u:4587: atrāpi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ caturṇāṃ pañcānāṃ vā rūpāṇāṃ liṅgeṣu saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4593: tannirākaraṇāya traividhyamanumānasya ucyate iti trividhapadasyatātparyāntaramāha--atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:4600: yathā paramāṇvādayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ prameyatvād ghaṭādivaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4601: tathā sapakṣe sadasad yathā tatraiva sādhye sattvād ghaṭādivaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4616: evaṃ sādhyadharmiṇi anyataradharmadarśanena sādhanadharmadarśanenānyatarasya sādhyadharmasyānumānamanumiti darśanamiti bhavati kriyātulyatā /
GSP29nystik_u:4618: atra dignāgena dhūmādagnirūpadharmāntarānumānam agnideśayoḥ saṃbandhānumānaṃ ca dūṣayitvā agniviśiṣṭadeśānumānaṃ samarthitam /
GSP29nystik_u:4622: liṅga dharme prasiddhaṃ cet kimanyat tena mīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4624: saṃbandhe 'pi dvayaṃ nāsti ṣaṣṭhī śrūyeta tadvati /
GSP29nystik_u:4630: tatra dignāgadūṣitān kalpān anyāṃśca vikalpān dignāgasamarthitaṃ ca kalpamupanyasya dūṣayati---anye punariti dharmadharmibhāvānupapatteriti /
GSP29nystik_u:4639: yaḥ kaścidagnimattayā deśaḥ sādhyate na tasyāvaśyaṃ dhūmo dharma ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4646: na hyayamevaṃvādī dignāgo dhūmādhāraṃ deśaviśeṣaṃ paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:4647: na hyasya mate parvato nāma kaścidavayavī yadādhāro dhūma upalabhyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:4648: kiṃ tu paramāṇavaḥ paramasūkṣmā atīndriyāḥ parvataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4661: na hi yadā yatra vā paṭaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4664: na hi yadā yadā saṃyogastadā karma /
GSP29nystik_u:4672: yadi hi vahnimābhyāmeko 'rthaḥ kaścit ārabhyeta tato 'sau tayoḥ samaveyāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4688: na hi bauddharāddhānte dravyaṃ nāma kiñcidasti yatra rūpasparśai samavetau,
GSP29nystik_u:4697: yatra tāvat parvatanitambavartinī dhūmalekhā santatamudgacchantī dṛśyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4698: tatrāsau deśa eva tadviśiṣṭo 'numīyate iti lokaprasiddhameveti kimatra vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4699: yatra tu bhūyiṣṭhatāyā tasya dhūmasya dūratvena deśo na dṛśyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4701: tatra deśānumānaprayāsālasatayā dṛśyamāno dhūmaviśeṣa evāgnimattayā sādhyate dhūmatvaikārthasamavāyibhiḥ tadgataiḥ saṃtatyerdhvagamanādibhirityāha--dhūmaviśeṣeṇa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4703: tena dhūmamātrād vahnivyabhicāriṇo vahnyavinābhāvī dhūmo viśeṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4706: dravyatvakarmatvayoḥ śabde nirākāryatvena upayuktatvāt tābhyāmanyad guṇatvaṃ śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4729: na ca vaktṛvaktrāvaruddhaṃ nabhaḥpradeśaṃ tat prāpnoti /
GSP29nystik_u:4730: na cādravyaṃ śabdo gatvā śrotreṇa saṃbadhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4731: tasmād vīcītaraṅgarītyā svadeśānantaradeśe śabdāntarārambhaṇaparamparayā śrotradeśotpannaṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇātīti siddhaṃ sajātīyārambhakatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4734: eṣa punaranvayavyatirekī dravyakarmānyatve sati sadādyabhedasya sapakṣe rūpādau sattvād,
GSP29nystik_u:4744: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe nānupalabdha iti vyāghātaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4746: viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣo hi saṃśayo nātyantānupalabdhapūrvadharmavattayā kvacid bhavitum arhati /
GSP29nystik_u:4747: na khalu saptamarasavattayā kecid dravye saṃśerata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4749: na tāvat svarūpeṇānumīyate yena nānupalabdha iti vyāhanyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:4753: tajjātīyena tu dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇordṛṣṭena pratyakṣato vā mānāntarād vā sādhanadharmasya svābhāvikapratibandhagrahasaṃbhādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4755: tadevaṃ vibhajate--icchādayaḥ khalu dharmiṇo bhavanti mānasapratyakṣadṛṣṭāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4761: anupalabdhacaraścātmeti kathaṃ tadviśiṣṭā icchādayo nyāyaviṣayā iti śaṅkāmurīkṛtyata prayogaṃ sūcayati--paratantrā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4768: icchādīno hi bādhakairapanīte dravyāṣṭakaguṇatve guṇatvameva vyatirekī hetuḥ ātmapāratantrye pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4770: tathāpi dravyāṣṭakavyatirekādiśabdairadūraviprakarṣeṇa parāmṛṣṭaḥ śaknoti viśeṣṭuṃ dharmiṇi ca nyāyapravṛttyaṅgaḥ saṃśayam āpādayitumiti niravadyam //
GSP29nystik_u:4771: atra bhāṣyaṃ vibhāgavacanādeva trividhamiti saddhi iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4773: trividham iti vibhāgavacanādeva trividhe pūrvavadādau siddhe kimarthaṃ pūrvavadādyupādānaṃ sūtreṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4775_0: mahataḥ trividhasya mahāviṣayasya atītānāgatavartamānaviṣayasya laghīyasā sūtreṇa
GSP29nystik_u:4775_2: 'nādaraḥ sūtrakārasyeti śiṣyān vyutpipādayiṣoḥ atraiva nidarśanam--tathā cāyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4776: asya samācāraḥ---itthaṃbhūtena vakyavikalpena vaicitryeṇa pravṛtta iti yojanā //
GSP29nystik_u:4777: evaṃ tāvat lakṣaṇabhedānumānaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣād darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:4778: bhāṣyakārastu viṣayabhedādapi bhedamāha---sadviṣayaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ sadasadviṣayaṃ cānumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4784: yadyapi pratyakṣamapyatītānāgatayoḥ saṃprati niṣedhyaniṣedhayorniṣedhe pravartamānamasadviṣayaṃ tathāpi na pratiṣedhyayoḥ pravartate ityetāvatā sadviṣayamuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4785: anumānaṃ tu tayorapi pravartate ityetāvatā asadviṣayamuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4787: na hyanupalabdhasāmānye iti sāmānyata upalabdho viśeṣataścānirṇīto dharmo nyāyapravṛttāvadhikriyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4796: tathā ca na viśeṣaṇatayā gṛhyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4800: kasmāt punarasya na samavāyāntaramabhyupeyata ityata āha---atheti /
GSP29nystik_u:4810: mā bhūd gośabdasāmyena vāgādīnām api viṣāṇitvamityaparitoṣāt nyāyāntaramāha--anāśritaḥ samavāya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4814: tacceha pratyayakāraṇe ātmāni ca samavāye cāvilakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4818: bhavatu vṛtteḥ prāganāśritaṃ kāryaṃ paścāt samavaiṣyati,
GSP29nystik_u:4819: turīsaṃyuktebhya iva tantubhya utpadya paṭaḥ paścāt turyā ityata āha--samavāyaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4822: pramāṇavattvāt prāptā samavāyasya vṛttirna śakyā anavasthābhiyā parityaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4824: saṃyoge prāptitvasya nivṛttyā svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kāryatvasyopādheḥ tatprayojakasya vidyamānatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4825: atha prāptidharmo 'pi kasmāt na bhavatītyata āha---yadi punariyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4826: nanviyamanavasthā kasmād bījāṅgurādiṣvivehāpi nābhyupeyate ityata āha---na caināmanavasthāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4831: tattvamekatvaṃ samavāyasya bhāvena sattvayā vyākhyātamiti śāstramāha,
GSP29nystik_u:4835: vinaṣṭe ca tasmin yo dṛśyate sa tato 'nya utpanna iti siddhaṃ samavāyasya nānātvamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4840: kārya svāpādānena akṛtakasaṃbandhavad ādhāravattvāditi vyatirekī hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4844: na hi sahotpannau rūpasparśau mithaḥ saṃbadhyete /
GSP29nystik_u:4850: kāryāt pūrvamutpannaḥ samavāyaḥ paścādutpadyamānaṃ kāryamupādānādhārakaṃ kariṣyati kāryahetubalādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4852: tribhyo hi kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ jāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4854: kāryāt prāg jātasya ca samavāyasya na kāryaṃ kāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4857: tasmāt samavāyasya samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇābhāvat na kāryāt prāg utpāda iti suṣṭhūktam--tathāpi kasyeti vācyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4860: na ca paṭaturīsaṃyogavat samavāyasya paścāt kāryakāraṇasamavāya iti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4861: saṃyogajasya saṃyogasya kāraṇatrayasaṃbhavād asya tu samavāyāntaramantareṇa kāraṇatrayāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4864: tataśca na jñāyate kimabhipretyata asadviṣayamityuktamityākṣepa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4876: visphāritākṣo hi tadā ghaṭo bhavatīti pratyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4885: dhaṭo jāyata iti tu laukikaḥ prayogo ghaṭaśabdaṃ ghaṭārtheṣu tadavayaveṣūpacarya teṣāṃ ca siddhatayā kartṛtvādupapādanīya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4890: yathāsaṃbhavaṃ samāsaṃ vikalpya dūṣyati--nāntarīyakārtha iti ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4900_0: ityatra viśeṣaṇapadopādādamātreṇa vā viśeṣyapadopādānamātreṇa vā anyatarasyārthāt
GSP29nystik_u:4900_1: prāpterūbhayapadopādānasyaitat prayojanam---yatrobhayoḥ pratyekaṃ vyabhicāraḥ samudāye tvavyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4908: kiṃ pṛthivītvaṃ sāmānyamasya vivakṣitaṃ yathā paśunā yajeta iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4913: evaṃ dravyamityapyukte dravyatvaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ vyaktirveti vimarśe pṛthivītyetadupatiṣṭhate /
GSP29nystik_u:4914: na dravyatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ kiṃ tu pṛthivī /
GSP29nystik_u:4920: na hyasti saṃbhavo nāntarīyakaśca syāt na cārtha iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4923: na hi dignāgasya mate kiñcidasti vastu yannāntarīyakaṃ saddheturbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4925: sarvo 'yamanumānānumeyabhāvo buddhyārūḍhena dharmadharmibhāvena na bahiḥ sadasattvamapekṣate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4927: na hi vastveva nāntarīyakamasato 'pi nāntarīyakatvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4931: atastrirūpaliṅgadarśanasya siddheḥ kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadavarodhāya tadvida ityupādīyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4939: tadanena dignāgasya lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā anyeṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣitam //
GSP29nystik_u:4940: saṃprati dignāgasya svakīyalakṣaṇaprapañcārthaṃ vākyam anumeye 'tha tattulya ityādyupanyasya dūṣayati--apare tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:4943: na hi yo 'numeye saṃścāsaṃśca sa śakyaḥ sanniti vaktum
GSP29nystik_u:4946: yadyevaṃ syātad yo vipakṣe dvedhā sa vipakṣāvṛttiriti hetureva syāt na savyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4949: anumeye sadbhāva evetyavadhāraṇenānumeye sadbhāvasya niyatatvāt kutaḥ pakṣaikadeśavṛtteḥ prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4953: yathā nīlaṃ sarojaṃ bhavatyeva nātyantaṃ na bhavatīti gamyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4968: na hyasti saṃbhavo 'numeya evāsti tattulye ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4971: anumeya eva sadbhāva iti pakṣaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ dūṣayitvā anumeye sadbhāva eveti dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati---athottaramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4973: sadbhāva eveti kila viśeṣaṇasaṃgatamavadhāraṇamayogam avyāpti vyavacchindat vyāpti darśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:4975: dūṣayati---tathāpyanumeyamavadhāritaṃ saṃbhavasya vyāptyā na dharmaḥ sadbhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4979: anumeyaṃ khalvavadhāritaṃ saddhetusaṃbhavaṃ parityajya nānyatra vartate,
GSP29nystik_u:4981: hetusaṃbhavastvanavadhāritaḥ sarvatraiva tattulye ca vipakṣe ca prasṛtaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4984: tadasya hetusaṃbhavasya vipakṣe 'pi prasaktasya pratiṣedhāya yuktamasati nāstīti /
GSP29nystik_u:4985: tattulye tu prasaktamapratiṣiddhamanumatameveti tattulye sadbhāva iti vyarthamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4987: tulyahetu sadbhāvasiddhāvapi tattulye vyāptyā hotoḥ sadbhāvo bhavatvityetadarthaṃ tattulye sadbhāva
GSP29nystik_u:4989: yadi punarvyāptirvivakṣyeta kṛtakatve sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ na hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4995: pūrvapadena saha virodhe nidarśanamāha---na hi bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:4996: anumeye sadbhāva ityanenānumeye vṛttau hetārlabdhāyāṃ tattulya eva sadbhāva iti samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇaṃ vipakṣamātrād vṛtti vyavacchinatti,
GSP29nystik_u:4998: naraṃ ca nārāyaṇameva cādau svataḥ sutau dvau janayāṃ babhūva /
GSP29nystik_u:5000: samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇe hi tattulyena yathānyayogavyavacchedenaivakāraḥ saṃbadhyate tathānumeyenāpi saṃbadhyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:5002: na khalu naraṃ ca nārāyaṇameveti nipāto nārāyaṇena sahānyayogavyavacchedena saṃbadhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5005: tathā tattulye 'yogavyavacchedena saṃbandha ucyeteti śaṅkate---atha tattulya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5009: na ca yasyānumeye sadbhāva evetyanūdya tattulya eva sattvamiti vidhātuṃ śakyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5011: tathā sati tadviśeṣaṇāya prayatnāntarāsthāne sati vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5014: ityatra hi yadyapi svarūpeṇārteraśakyapratipattitvena haviṣā viśeṣaṇaṃ mṛgyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5015: tathāpi na śakyaṃ havirūbhayatvena viśeṣṭuṃ vinā prayatnāntarāditi vākyabhedabhiyā pratīyamānamapi ubhayatvamavivakṣitam,
GSP29nystik_u:5017: atha tadvivakṣayaiva vākyabhedamabhyupetya paścād vākyaikavākyatayā abhimatārthasiddhirāsthīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5021: tathā hi anumeye sadbhāva ityatrānumeya eva nānanumeye,
GSP29nystik_u:5024: evaṃ tattulye sadbhāva ityatrāpi tattulya eva nātattulye,
GSP29nystik_u:5033: yadi rūpameva cākṣuṣaṃ tato na dravyaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5036: atra hi rūpavaddravyasahitaṃ rūpameva cākṣuṣaṃ na gandharasādīti śakyaṃ samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5041: tanna saditi śakyaṃ vyavahartum asaditi vā /
GSP29nystik_u:5042: bhavatu, tathāpi kasmāt tasmānna hetoḥ vyāvṛttirbhavatītyata āha---na hyasaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5044: svarūpeṇa dūṣayitvā etadgatamavadhāraṇaṃ dūṣayiṣyannanūdya vikalpayati--kimavadhāryata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5046: tattulya eva sadbhāva ityanena gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5048: tattulya eva sadbhāva ityanena gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5054: ato vipakṣa eva nāsti ityayamapi hetuḥ syāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5059: yathānumeye sadbhāva ityucyamāne yasya tattulye nāstitā vipakṣe ca vṛttiḥ so 'pi hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5060: tattulye astītyucyamāne vipakṣavṛtterapakṣadharmasya ca hetutvaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:5062: nāstitāsatītyucyamāne yo 'pakṣadharmastattulye ca nāsti sa hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ śabdo 'sattvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5065: anumeye 'styasati ca nāstītyetāvatyucyamāne nityaḥ śabdo jātimattve sati śrāvaṇatvādityayaṃ tattulyavṛttihīno 'pi hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5066: tattulye 'sti asati ca nāstītyetāvatyucyamāne anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kṛtakatvādityayam apakṣadharmo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5073: tathāpi yatrāvinābhūte liṅge bhavata ekasmin dharmiṇi virūddhāvyabhicāriṇī,
GSP29nystik_u:5079: yadi pratyakṣaśabdo jñānavacanaḥ jñānaṃ caikatvena viśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5091: tathā ca gṛhītāvinābhāvāt liṅgāt saṃprati pratyakṣādityupapannamityata āha---na cānyā gatirasti /
GSP29nystik_u:5095: tatra prathame kalpe mā bhūd viruddhāvyabhicārī,
GSP29nystik_u:5097: dvitīye tu kalpe na sarvarūpasaṃpanno heturviruddhāvyabhicārī saṃbhavatītyekasmāditi atiricyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5103: na ca pratikṣaṇapariṇāmavāde kuṇḍavadarādīnāmapi kaścidasti saṃbandha ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5106: na hi sāṃkhyānāṃ bauddhānāṃ vā rāddhānte 'sti saṃbandhaḥ samavāyo nām /
GSP29nystik_u:5111: tathā ca yatra rūpaṃ tatra sparśa ityata āha--yatra rūpamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5117: na ca bhedābhedāvekatra saṃbhavato virodhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5119: yathā hyāsandikāṅgāni bhinnānyanauttarādharyavyavasthitānyapi parasparāśrayatayā na patanti,
GSP29nystik_u:5123: kutaḥ? na rūpaṃ sparśo rūpe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5138: sādharmyaṃ ca sāmānyamabhidadhatā na sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ nāma padārthāntaramastītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5139: sādharmyaṃ cāprasiddhaṃ na sādhyasāghanāyālamiti sādharmyaprasiddhirapi draṣṭavyā /
GSP29nystik_u:5140: sā ca yathā gaustathā gavaya ityāptavākyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5143: piṇḍasya hi gavayaśabdavācyatāṃ puruṣo 'tideśavākyasmaraṇasahakāriṇaḥ pratayakṣād gavayagatād gosādṛśyāt prajānan tena prajñāpyata iti pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ prajñāpanamuktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5144: tatra vārttikakāraḥ prathamaṃ tāvat sūtratātparyamāha---sūtrārthaḥ pūrvavat /
GSP29nystik_u:5154: bhāṣyakāreṇa hi saṃjñitayā gavayapratipattiḥ phalaṃ sādhyasādhanapadavācyamuktā,
GSP29nystik_u:5162: na hi yo yatsadṛśaṃ yaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5163: sa tasya samākhyāmapyavagacchati ityāśayavān pṛcchati---kimuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5172: pratyakṣamayī ca yathā gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'yamīdṛśaḥ piṇḍa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5174: yadyapi yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya ityetasmādapi gosadṛśasya gavayaśabdaḥ samākhyeti śakyamavagantum,
GSP29nystik_u:5179: gosādṛśyena copalakṣitaḥ piṇḍo ya iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭaḥ śakyo ghaṭādibhyo 'samānajātiyebhyo mahiṣādibhyaśca samānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinno 'vagantuṃ gavayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5180: tathāpi yāvadayamasau gavaya iti sākṣāt pratīte saṃbandhini saṃjñāṃ na niveśayati,
GSP29nystik_u:5181: tāvadayaṃ pariplutamatiḥ pramātā kaccit khalu drakṣyāmi tādṛśaṃ piṇḍaṃ yatra gavayasaṃjñā pratipatsya iti pramotsuka evodīkṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:5182: na cāsau vākyamātrasahāyo 'pratyakṣīkṛtagosadṛśagavayatvajātimatpiṇḍo 'sau gavayākhya iti pratipattumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:5186: dhik karabhamatidīrghavakragrīvaṃ pralamboṣṭhaṃ kaṭhoratīkṣṇakaṇṭakāśinaṃ kutsitāvayavasanniveśamapasadaṃ paśūnāmiti,
GSP29nystik_u:5187: tadupaśrutya dākṣiṇātya uttarāpathaṃ gatastādṛśaṃ vastūpalabhya nūnamasau karabha iti pratyeti,
GSP29nystik_u:5191: yadyucyeta nindāparaṃ vākyaṃ karabhasya tādṛśatve na pramāṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:5193: yatra tarhi tādṛktve paryavasyati vākyaṃ tatra kā gatiḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:5194: atha tatrāpi tādṛk karabha āgamāvagataḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratyabhijñāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5195: karabhaśabdavācyatā tu tasya tatpūrvaṃ tādṛkvarabhaparatve apyāgamasya prayogamātrādavagatā anumānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5196: yo hi yatra prayujyate śabdo 'sati vṛttyantare sa tasya vācakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5200: tadidaṃ prāgeva prayogānumitaṃ vācakatvamasya pratyakṣasamaye kevalaṃ smaryate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5202: upamānavākye 'pi tatrāpi vākyādavagataḥ sādharmyavān piṇḍaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5203: prayogānumitaṃ ca gavayapadasya vācakatvaṃ smaryate iti na phalāntaramavaśiṣyate yatropamānaṃ pramāṇamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:5205: na tāvadākāśādiśabdavadeṣa gavayaśabdaḥ sākṣāt piṇḍasya vācakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5206: kintu gavayatvaṃ nimittīkṛtya piṇḍe vartate iti paramārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5207: na ca yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti vākyād gavayatvamavagatam,
GSP29nystik_u:5211: na khalvanupalabdhacareṇa gavayatvena gosādṛśyaṃ saṃbaddhaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP29nystik_u:5214: tasmāt saṃbandhino gavayatvasya sarvathānupalabdheḥ kuto vākyād vā anumānād vā vācyavācakasaṃbandhāvasāyaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:5216: gavayatvasāmānyaviśeṣavati tu piṇḍe pratyakṣe yuktaḥ saṃbandhāvagamaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5217: saṃbandhino gavayatvasya pratyakṣatvāt vākyārthasya ca smaryāṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5220: vākyārthasmaraṇasahakāri gavayatvajātimataḥ piṇḍasya gāsādṛśyadarśanameva tarkasahāyaṃ gavayatvābhidhāne pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5221: tarkaśca gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭapiṇḍābhidhāne kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgaḥ tathā hi sādṛśyaviśiṣṭa piṇḍābhidhāne,
GSP29nystik_u:5223: na ca śabdādanyatastadavagama iti śabdaśya tatra vācakatvaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5224: na cāviśiṣṭaṃ sādṛśyamapi piṇḍaviśeṣe gavayapadam avasthāpayitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:5225: yasya kasyacid yena kenacit saha sādṛśyāditi tadapi gavā viśeṣaṇīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5226: na cānyato gotvasyāpi pratipattiriti tadapi gavayapadenābhidhātavyam iti kalpanāgauravam /
GSP29nystik_u:5230: ata eva bahunyudāhaṇānyuktvāpyāha sma bhagavān bhāṣyakāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5233: tadīdṛśamupamānaphalamavidvān sādṛśyaviśiṣṭavastujñānaṃ copamānaphalamiti bhrānto bhadanto dignāga ākṣipati---pratyakṣeti /
GSP29nystik_u:5243: hanta bhoḥ kimabhimataṃ sādṛśyamāyuṣmato yadapratyakṣāyāṃ gavi na pratyakṣam?
GSP29nystik_u:5248: iti cet? tat kimidānīṃ karṇatvādisāmānyaṃ gogavayagatakarṇādibhedena bhinnamityapi vaktumadhyavasito 'si? tasmād
GSP29nystik_u:5249: yathā kālākṣyāṃ gavi gotvamīkṣitavataḥ svastimatyāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānaṃ tadevedamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:5252: tasmāt na sādṛśyapratītiphalamupamānaṃ pratyakṣād vākyād vā vyatiricyate iti sūktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5260: yadi tu na tebhyo vilakṣaṇamabhaviṣyad na tadvilakṣaṇāṃ pramāmakariṣyat,
GSP29nystik_u:5271: upadiśyate 'neneti upadeśo vākyajñānaṃ vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā abhighīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5286: āptānāṃ ṛṣyāryamlecchānāmupadeśaḥ śabdo na tvanāptānāṃ māyāmohanirmitānāṃ buddharṣabhādīnāṃ pramāṇaviruddhakṣaṇikasarvadharmanairātmyavādināmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5289: sudṛḍhena pramāṇenāvadhāritāḥ sākṣātkṛtā dharmāḥ padārthā hitāhitaprāptiparihāraprayojanā yena sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5290: tathāpi tattvaṃ vidvān akārūṇikatayā vā alasatayā vā anupadiśan,
GSP29nystik_u:5291: matsaritayā vā viparītamupadiśan nāptaḥ syādityata āha---yathādṛṣṭasyārthasya cikhyāpayiṣayā prayuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5298: āpta iti prakṛtipratyayasamudāyāt prakṛti niṣkṛṣya tadarthamāha--sākṣātkaraṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5304: ārād yātaḥ pātakebhya ityāryo madhyamo lokaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5306: mlecchā api hi paripathamavasthitāḥ pānthānāmapahṛtasarvasvānāṃ mārgākhyāne hetudarśanaśūnyā avantyāptā iti pareṣāmāptalakṣaṇamavyāpakamityuktaṃ bhavati //
GSP29nystik_u:5309: ākṣeptā bhāṣyam ākṣipya sūtraṃ samādhatte tasmāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5311: apauruṣeyo vaidika upadeśaḥ svargāpūrvadevatādiviṣayaḥ svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe nirdeṣatayā yukta upapannaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5316: tasmāt puruṣasyaivāptasyopadeśa āptopadeśa iti sādhu vyākhyānaṃ bhāṣyakārīyamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5319: yogipratyakṣaṃ na svargādiviṣayaḥ pratyakṣatvāt asmadādipratyakṣavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5322: atra yāvati pakṣe yo hetuḥ siddhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5324_0: yogaje ca pratyakṣe siddhe tatsādhakādeva pramāṇāt tasya svargādiviṣayatvamapi siddhamiti
GSP29nystik_u:5324_1: dharmigrāhakapramāṇaviruddhaṃ mīmāṃsakānām anumānaṃ nodetumapyutsahate prāgeva tad bādhitum /
GSP29nystik_u:5325: asiddhe tu yogaje pratyakṣa āśrayāsiddho heturābhāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5326: asmākaṃ tu samyañco bahavaśca nyāyā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5336: na hi kadācidapyayamapūrvaṃ paśyati laukikaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5347: svābhiprāyeṇa nirākaroti---na dṛṣṭa iti brūma iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5348: śaṅkitā pṛcchati--kiṃ punastat yadi na dṛṣṭam?
GSP29nystik_u:5356: na ca kalpito 'pūrvabhadaḥ pāramārthikāya kāryāyālamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5361: aśvamedhakriyayā tāvat tadapūrvaṃ svakāla evābhivyaktaṃ phaladānābhimukhīkṛtam, abhivya/
GSP29nystik_u:5368: tat khalu pūrvaṃ sadapi phalaṃ nākārṣīt caramabhāvinyāḥ kriyāyāḥ tajjanyāyā ābhivyakteranutpādāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5369: utpannāyāṃ tu kriyāyāmabhivyaktau vā kasmāt na karoti?
GSP29nystik_u:5371: tasmādakāmenāpi tvayā asatyā eva kriyāyā vya/
GSP29nystik_u:5375: tathā sati asattāyāḥ sarvatra sulabhatvāt na kiñcidapūrvaṃ nābhivyaktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5377: atra śabdaṃ pramāṇāntaramasahamāno dignāgaḥ tallakṣaṇaṃ vikalpyākṣipati---āptopadeśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5389: tasya vacanāt kāryāt kāraṇaṃ vivakṣā anumīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5393: te ca prāyeṇa visaṃvādakā dṛṣṭā ityāptagrahaṇena teṣāmavisaṃvāditvam /
GSP29nystik_u:5399: tathā hi yad yannirdeṣasattvīyaṃ vacanaṃ tatsarvamarthavat,
GSP29nystik_u:5406: atra hi upadiśyata ityupadeśa iti vyutpattyā artha ucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5407: āptaḥ prāpta upadeśo yasmāt sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5408: etaduktaṃ bhavati yasmāt śabdādavagamyārthaṃ pravartamānaḥ prāpnoti tamevārtha sa āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5409: evaṃ ca yathā śabdena yo 'rtho darśitaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5414: āptyā hi tathātvaṃ viniścanvan arthasya nāpratipannatayā niścetumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:5431: tadidamuktam---yā śabdollekhena padārthasmaraṇāvāntaravyāpārāt śabdādevārthaṃ pratyemītyanenollekhena pratipattiḥ sāgamasyārthaḥ phalamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5432: āptatvaṃ ca na vākyārthaṃ pratyāyayati api tvāgamasyāvyabhicāritām /
GSP29nystik_u:5433: na ca yataḥ prāmāṇyamavagamyate tataḥ prameyamapi /
GSP29nystik_u:5434: tathā ca sati prāmāṇyajñānahetoranumānādeva pratyakṣādiprameyāvagatiriti pratyakṣādīnāmapramāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5441: tasmāt vaktṛjñānaviśeṣaṇāya pūrvaṃ śabdādeva kevalād vākyārthajñānam eṣitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5442: evaṃ ca kṛtaṃ vaktṛjñānānumānenārthapratipattyarthena kevalaṃ prāmāṇyajñānāya tadupayoga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5443: na cāvinābhāva eva saṃbandho yena śabdārthayorasaṃbandhena gamyagamakatvaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5449: na saṃgatigrahaṇamapi pratīkṣanta iti dūre 'numānād bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:5456: sa dvividho dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthatvāt iti sūtrasya tātparyamāha---niyamārtham /
GSP29nystik_u:5472: asyārthamāha na vigrahaṃ karoti pratyakṣata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5474: sa na manyeta dṛṣṭānāṃ vākyānāṃ prāmāṇyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5486: aparīkṣitaṃ ca na tattvanirṇayāya paryāptamiti parīkṣā vidhāyiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5487: tatparikaraśca saṃśayādaya iti yuktaṃ teṣāṃ paścāllakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5488: tadiha prameyalakṣaṇāya tadvibhāgoddeśasūtramavatārayituṃ bhāṣyakāraḥ pṛcchati sma---kiṃ punaranena pramāṇeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:5491: tadetad bhāṣyam anūdya vārttikakāra ākṣipati---kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:5495: siśiṣṭaṃ tu prameyamadyāpi na sidhyatīti tadarthaṃ praśnaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5496: sa ca viśeṣo yathāvaditi na darśita iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5510: kiṃ tu yat tattvato jñāyamānamapavargasādhanaṃ tasmin,
GSP29nystik_u:5513: nanvasmin pakṣe na kadācidapi pramāṇatā syādityasti doṣa ityata āha---kimuktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5516: anūdyata iti pramāṇāntaramūlakatvena vidhānasya dārḍhyaṃ darśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:5544: avidyamānaṃ pūrvaṃ śarīraṃ yasya tadapūrvaṃ śarīram /
GSP29nystik_u:5546: prameyatattvamaviduṣa ātmana avidyamānamuttaraṃ śarīraṃ yasya tad anuttaram /
GSP29nystik_u:5549: nanu yathā pūrveṣāṃ śarīrāṇām anāditā evamuttareṣāmapyanantatā,
GSP29nystik_u:5550: tathā ca mokṣamāṇānāṃ pravṛttayaśca tadarthāni śāstrāṇi cānarthakāni prasajyerannityata āha---uttareṣāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5552: nanu sūkhe 'pyuddeṣṭavye duḥkhamātroddeśaḥ kiṃ sukhaṃ pratyācaṣṭe?
GSP29nystik_u:5554: tadetad bhāṣyaṃ vārttikakāra ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyācaṣṭe---sukhaṃ punariti na cānyata ātmādipadāt,
GSP29nystik_u:5557: nirvidyate ityasya vyākhyānam---tāṃ copāsīnasya tayaiva virodhiguṇena tṛṣṇā vicchidyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5559: tathā ca sukhe 'sya vairāgyaṃ bhavatīti tātparyārthaḥ //9 //
GSP29nystik_u:5564: ahamiti jñānaṃ gaurādyākāraṃ śarīrāvabhāsaṃ na śakyaṃ ghaṭādijñānavad drāgātmani pramāṇayitumityabhiprāyaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5570: tataścātpoktatvānumānasiddhamapi prāmāṇyaṃ śabdasya anena tadarthasaṃvādakenānumānena dṛḍhataraṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5573: tadanena vārttikena anumānācca pratipattavya iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam icchāyā ātmaliṅgatvakathanaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ yajjātīyasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:5580: yaścāsāveko 'nubhavitā ca smartā cānumātā caiṣitā ca sa ātmā /
GSP29nystik_u:5583: nendriyam, indriyāntaragṛhīta indriyāntareṇāpratisandhānaprasaṅgāt yamaham asprākṣaṃ ta paśyāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5589: asatyapi ātmani jñātari satyapi ca buddhyādīnāṃ bhede,
GSP29nystik_u:5593: tadabhyupagame vā sa evātmeti siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5598: nanvekaviṣayāṇāṃ smṛtyādīnāṃ nānākartṛkatve ko virodha ityata āha---na hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5601: yad yasmāt nimittāt tvagindriyāt sparśamahamasparkṣaṃ tat tasmāt nimittāt cakṣuṣo rūpaṃ paśyāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5602: nānākartṛtva udāharaṇamāha---na hi bhavati devadatta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5607: tatra kimakāryakāraṇabhāvāt pratisandhānasya vyatireka uta bhinnakartṛkatvāditi sandigdhavyatirekatvādasādhanāṅgaṃ pratisandhānamityāśayavāṃścodayati---kāryakāraṇabhāvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5621: kaḥ punarasau hetuviśeṣa ityata āha---viśeṣitaṃ caitatpratisaṃdhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5622: tat kathayati--- smṛtyā saha pūrvāparapratyayayorekaviṣayatvena pratisaṃndhānam yajjātīyaṃ candanavanitādi sukhahetuṃ pratītaṃ smarāmi tajjātīyamimu pratyemīti pratisandhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5623: tadanena śālibījāṅgurasya paramparayā śālibījāntarajananalakṣaṇāt pratisaṃdhānāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamād vyavacchinatti //
GSP29nystik_u:5627: uttaram---anyena nimittena anubhūtasya anyena nimittena asmaraṇāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5628: na hi bhavati yenaiva cakṣuṣā ghaṭamadrākṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:5630: nimittabhede pratisaṃdhānābhāvamuktvā viṣayabhede 'pyāha---na hyanyena svabhāvena ghaṭatvādinānubhūtasya anyena vṛkṣatvādinā smaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5631: na hi bhavati yamahaṃ ghaṭamadrākṣaṃ so 'yaṃ vṛkṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5632: kartṛbhede pratisaṃdhānābhāvamāha---na hyanyena devadattena anubhūtamanyo yajñadattaḥ smarati /
GSP29nystik_u:5633: na hi bhavati yo 'haṃ devadatto 'drākṣaṃ so 'haṃ yajñadattaḥ paśyāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5634: na cedaṃ satyapi bhede kāryakāraṇabhāvāt pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:5635: na hi yatra sphuṭataraḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tantupaṭayorghaṭakapālayorvā dṛśyate tatra pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:5636: ye tantavaḥ sa eva paṭa iti vā yo ghaṭākṣaṇaḥ sa eva kapālakṣaṇa iti vā /
GSP29nystik_u:5637: vastutaḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtānāmagṛhītabhedānāṃ pratisaṃdhānahetubhāvaḥ sabhāgeṣu kṣaṇeṣu tathā darśanāditi cet?
GSP29nystik_u:5638: tanna, āmalakaphalasyaikasyāpanayane tatraiva sthāne āmalakāntarāvasthāpane bhavati pratisaṃdhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5640: pūrvāparapratyayayoḥ smṛtyā sahaikaviṣayatvaṃ kartari kāryakāraṇabhāvanibandhanaṃ na karmaṇīti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:5641: hanta, nairātmyasākṣātkārasātmībhāve 'pyasti vijñānānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāva iti tannibandhanaṃ pratisaṃdhānaṃ pūrvavadeva prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:5642: saiva cātmadṛṣṭirdeṣāṇāṃ nidānaṃ paramiti vyartho nairātmyasākṣātkārasātmībhāvaprayāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5643: athāsadapi pratisaṃdhānaṃ kāryavaśādāharati tathāgato naṭa iva rāmatvamātmanaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5648: sa tarhi tādṛśaḥ śālibījasyotpādaṃ vāstavaṃ na niyantumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:5650: na ca pratyayānāṃ bhedāgrahāt pratisaṃdhānamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP29nystik_u:5653: ahamiti ca sattvadṛṣṭeḥ kṣaṇikatvanirākṛtāvasati bādhake sthiravastuviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5654: tasmāt smṛtyā saha pūrvāparapratyayayoḥ ekaviṣayatvalakṣaṇasya pratisandhānasyānekakartṛkatvād vyatireko nirūpādhirekakartṛkatvaṃ sādhayati /
GSP29nystik_u:5655: sa caikaḥ kartā śarīrendriyabuddhibhyo bhinna ātmeti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:5657: tasmād yasmin pakṣe smṛtiḥ saṃbhavati tatra pratisaṃdhānaṃ nyāyyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5662: syādetat, yogicittamapi sarvajñasya cetasa ālambanapratyaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5670: tamimamasmadabhiprāyānabhijñaṃ paramanyathāpi bodhayituṃ vibhavāma iti siddhāntī anyathā smṛtyanupapattimāha---na,
GSP29nystik_u:5672: na hyajātānanvayadhyastayorasti kaścid viśeṣa iti pūrvotpanno 'nubhavaḥ kāñcana vāsanāmādhāya dhvaṃsate,
GSP29nystik_u:5674: na cāsthirā buddhiḥ śakyā vāsayitumityātmā sthiro 'bhyupeya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5678_0: nāsmākaṃ kṣaṇikavastuvādināmasti tajjagati yadavasthitaṃ vāsakena vāsyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti
GSP29nystik_u:5682: tena saha jātaḥ samānakālaḥ cenāviśeṣaḥ tadālayavijñānamityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5688: upapādayiṣyate hi bhāvānāṃ sarvajanapratītisiddhā stharatā kṣaṇabhaṅganirākaraṇena /
GSP29nystik_u:5689: tathā ca sthirasya saṃbaddhasya ca vastrādeḥ mṛgamadādinā vāsyatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nāsthire 'saṃbaddhe ca bhavitumarhatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5691: asthirayorapi jñānayoḥ samānakālatayā asti saṃbandha iti kasmāt anyataracittavāsitamanyataraccittaṃ smṛtiṃ nādhatte ityata āha---yaścāsāviti /
GSP29nystik_u:5710: sthirameva hi kuṇḍaṃ sthirasyaiva vadarasya gurutvena patato gurutvaṃ pratibadhnadadhaḥpatanaṃ nivārayadādhāro bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5713: na tu bhaviturbhavitrantarāpekṣā yuktā anavasthāpātāditi āśaṅkate---athāpīdamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5724: tathā ca na virodho nāpyanabhyupaga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5731: tathā ca smṛteḥ bhāvasya bhavitā ātmaika nityaḥ pariśiṣyate ityāśayavānāha---yadā cotpattiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:5735: yā punarnābhyāmekakartṛkā sā nābhyāṃ tathā pratisandhīyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5739: tadevaṃ vyatirekisamarthanaṃ kṛtvā anvayavyatirekiṇamatrārthe pramāṇayati---atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:5740_1: tenaiva gandha upalabhyate iti khalu mayeti smṛtyā saha pratisandhānaṃ tasmād bharatamatābhyāsenābhinaye
GSP29nystik_u:5751: asti ca teṣāmapi svagocarāvikalpotpādanadvāreṇa paraṃparayā mayeti pratisandhānahetubhāva iti yatkiñcidetadekatvaṃ tasya kalpitamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5752: tadevaṃ pratisandhānadvāreṇecchādīnāmātmaliṅgatvamuktvā saṃprati guṇatayā liṅgatā vārttikakṛd āha---atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:5755: na hyanityo bhāvo dravyāt svatantro bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5756_0: tasmād guṇatvaprasādhakādeva hetoḥ pāratantryasiddheḥ kṛtaṃ guṇatvena pāratantryasādhakeneti
GSP29nystik_u:5756_1: hṛdi nidhāya vārttikakāraḥ tadapi pūrvamuktamiti siddhena pāratantryeṇa guṇatvamapi sādhayati /
GSP29nystik_u:5759: tasmādanityatvasiddhena dravyapāratantryeṇa dravyakarmabhyāṃ vyatirecayati---na dravyaṃ karma vā icchādayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5762: tathāpi dravyakalpanamātreṇaivopapattau tadavayayavakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvena tad dravyamanavayavaṃ tāvat siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:5767: kvacidanyatarakarmaṇā kvacit svabhāvataḥ tatsaṃyogopapattau tadgatikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt siddhamasya vyāpakatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:5769: tadanayā vakroktyā nityatvaṃ paramamahattvaṃ cātmano darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5770: etacca sāmānyatodṛṣṭamanumānaṃ sūtrayatā sarvaṃ darśitamityāha---sāmānyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5771: yat tatpūrvaṃ hṛdi sthitamicchādīnāṃ dravyapāratantrye sādhye 'nityatvahetukānumānam taduddhāṭayati,
GSP29nystik_u:5782_0: ātmānaṃ lakṣayitvātmano duḥkhanidānānāmindriyādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa
GSP29nystik_u:5782_1: ca śarīramāśritya tannidānatvamiti tadevāsya duḥkhamūlakāraṇamityanantaraṃ śarīraṃ
GSP29nystik_u:5789: atra ceṣṭāśrayatvenendriyāśrayatvenārthāśrayatvena ca pratyekaṃ samānajātīyebhya ātmendriyādibhyo 'samānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇasaṃśayādibhyaḥ śarīraṃ vyavacchidyate //
GSP29nystik_u:5793: sa cātivyāpakatayā avyāpakatayā ca na lakṣaṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:5803: tathāpi mūrtāntarāprayoge satīti viśeṣaṇāt na vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5807: pāṭite pāṣāṇe tādṛśasya tadvyāpārasya darśanāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5814: yadyapi gandhādayo viṣayā na svarūpeṇa śarīramāśrayante tathāpi yadeṣāṃ sukhādyupalambhahetutvaṃ kāryaṃ prayojanaṃ tadarthamāśrayante ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5821: atra prathame pakṣe ceṣṭāśabdo vyāpāraviśeṣe spandādivanmukhyārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5822: tadetat---lokastāvadityādinā tathā cāyaṃ ceṣṭāśabda ityantena darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5827: sā ca na kriyāmātra ityanena darśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:5829: evaṃ bhāṣyānusāreṇa svamatena ca pratyekaṃ ceṣṭāśrayatvādi śarīrasya lakṣaṇamiti varṇayitvā samastamevedaṃ śarīralakṣaṇamiti ye varṇayāṃbabhūvuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5842: ghrāṇasya pārthivatvena samavāyo na viruddha iti cet---na,
GSP29nystik_u:5848: api ca yadā ceṣṭendriyārthasya samavāyena śarīratvam,
GSP29nystik_u:5849: hanta bho indriyasamavāyikāraṇeṣu paramāṇuṣu samastam etadastīti teṣāmapi śarīratvaprasaṅga ityāha---samasteti /
GSP29nystik_u:5854: cakṣurādayastu unmīlanānmūrtena śarīreṇa prayujyante iti na prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5855: śrotraṃ tu ceṣṭādhāra eva na bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5860: na ca viśeṣalakṣaṇamakṛte sāmānyalakṣaṇe śakyamiti bhāṣyakāraḥ prathamamindriyāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ nirvedopayuktamāha---bhogasādhanānīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5861: anena yaccharīrasaṃyuktaṃ satkārakadoṣavyatiriktaṃ sākṣātpratītisādhanaṃ tadindriyamiti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sūcitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5863: pāramparyeṇa ca bhogasādhanatvaṃ ghrāṇādīnām sākṣānmanasa eva tatsādhanatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:5887: atra ca ghrāṇādiśabdāḥ paṅkajādipadavadavayavārthaṃ nimittīkṛtya kvacit,
GSP29nystik_u:5891: avayavārthage 'pi ca gandhādyupalabdhisādhane sannikarṣādau ghrāṇādiśabdāprayogāt avayavārthānvitaṃ ghrāṇatvādyeva ghrāṇādiśabdapravṛttinimittam /
GSP29nystik_u:5895: na ca sannikarṣeṇa gandhopalabdhisādhanena ca vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5897: tadanena jighratītyādi svaviṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇāni ityantaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:5900: tasyāpi tvaksthāne indriye sparśopalabdhisādhane eva upacāra iti //
GSP29nystik_u:5901: bhūtebhya iti sūtrāvayavatātparyavyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ bhūtebhya itīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5905: uttaram---bhūtaguṇaviśeṣagrahaṇasādhanatvam ghrāṇenaiva hi pṛthivyā yo guṇaviśeṣo gandhaḥ sa gṛhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5907: evaṃ rasanenaivāpāṃ yo mādhuryaṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ sa gṛhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5911: evaṃ śrotreṇaiva śabdo nabhasa iti hi niyamaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5925: dravyatve sati rūpādiṣu madhye gandhasyaiva vya/
GSP29nystik_u:5929: tasya pṛthivyāḥ pāthaso vā yo guṇaviśeṣo gandho vā madhura eva vā rasabhedaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5933: na caive rasanā apāmiva pṛthivyā api rasabhedaṃ gṛhṇātīti pārthivī bhavati /
