GSP29nystik_u:5937: atra ca karṇaśaṣkulīsaṃyogopādhinā śrotrasya nabhasaḥ kathañcid bhedaṃ vivakṣitvā bhūtebhya iti pa/
GSP29nystik_u:5951: tathāpi gandhādyutpattau pūrvagandhādidhvaṃsānāṃ nimittānāṃ bhedādutpannaṃ bhedādutpannaṃ kāryanānātvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5952: tadidamuktaṃ ye pūrve rūpādayaḥ teṣāṃ svagato viśeṣaḥ pradhvaṃsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5953: atha rūpatvādisāmānyameva kasmāt svagato viśeṣo na bhavatītyata āha---evaṃ ca kṛtveti /
GSP29nystik_u:5955: pradhvaṃsānāṃ tu stokabhūyastvaṃ niḥśeṣatve nopadyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5982: etāvataiva lakṣaṇe paryavasite suhṛdbhāvena pravibhāgābhidhānaṃ pṛthivyādiguṇā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5988: yathākramaṃ pṛthivyādiṣvanilānteṣu gandhādayaḥ sparśāntāḥ catustridvyekaniyamena viniyuktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5991: yena krameṇa ghrāṇādaya indriyasūtre paṭhitāḥ yena ceha gandhādaya,
GSP29nystik_u:5993: atra vārttikakāraḥ pṛthivyādiguṇā ityatrānekasamāsapratibhāsanāt saṃśayaṃ kṛtvā dvandvasamāsamavadhārayati---pṛthivyādiguṇā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5995: nanu kaṇṭhekāla itivad vaiyadhikaraṇyena bahuvrīhirbhaviṣyati pṛthivyādīnāṃ guṇā yebhyo gandhādibhyaḥ, te tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:5997: nabhogataśca śabdo nabhasi samānajātīyaṃ śabdamityata āha---na cānyatheti /
GSP29nystik_u:6000: na ca gandhādīnāṃ pṛthivyādiguṇahetutvapratipādanaṃ kvacit nirvedādāvupayujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6024: svasaṃvedanena vā mānasena vā jñānena rūpāddhālambanaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6030: rūpādiparamāṇava eva tena tenākāreṇa utpannā ekayodakāharaṇakriyayā vyavacchinnā ghaṭa ityucyante /
GSP29nystik_u:6032: yathāha ghaṭa ityapi ca rūpādaya evaikārthakriyākāriṇastathā vyapadiśyante iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6056: yastu bhinnalokamaryādatayā brūte ādimān mithyāpratyayaḥ samyagjñānaṃ nimittīkaroti,
GSP29nystik_u:6082: na khalu saṃyujyamānānāmabhāve saṃyogaḥ śakyābhyupagama ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6086: nāpi saṃhanyamānā iti kimanayā svarūpeṇāvriyeteti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6087: tadevaṃ tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvād ityasya vyāghātadoṣaṃ darśayitvā svasāmarthyālocane na vivakṣitaliṅgābhidhāyitā,
GSP29nystik_u:6092: tannṛ tadettatadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvādityanena na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP29nystik_u:6094: pṛthivyādayaśca dharmitayā pradhānamiti ta eva parāmarṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6096: tathā ca pratijñātasteṣāṃ rūpādyabhedo na sidhyedityasaṃbaddham /
GSP29nystik_u:6100: evaṃ śabdāntareṇāpi pratijñāprayoge tulyaḥ prasaṅga ityāha---evaṃ rūpādimātramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6112: samānārthānāmapi prakṛtīnāṃ rūpabhedena tatparasya pratyayasya sāmarthyabhedāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6113: yathāptoyaśabdayostulyārthatve 'pi toyaśabdāt parā vibhaktistoyānīti toyasamavetāmeva bahutvasaṃkhyāmāha /
GSP29nystik_u:6117: tadgatarūpādayo vā bahava ityekasyāmapi pāthaḥkaṇikāyāṃ bahuvacanopapattirāpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6118: na ca sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi lokasyāvinivṛtternaivamiti sāmpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:6129: na ca nīlasya sphaṭikalakṣaṇasyotpattiriti tṛtīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:6138: nāpi yūṣajātīyaṃ toyasaṃyogi dravyaṃ kṣīrajātīyamiveti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6140: iha tu kāṭhinye na yūṣabuddhivyapadeśāviti saṃyogabheda eva toyamāṃsayoryūṣa iti nyāyyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6145: na ca parakīya sādhanadoṣodabhāvanamātrāt svapakṣasiddhiriti siddhāntinaṃ sādhanaṃ pṛcchati---atha rūpādibhyo 'rthāntare dravye kiṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6146: yato 'yaṃ paro rūpādibhyo 'rthāntaraṃ dravyaṃ pratyakṣeṇa vidvānapi svasiddhāntābhyāsāhitavyāmohāpasmāro na tathā vyavaharati,
GSP29nystik_u:6148: asti hi sarveṣāmeva laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ brāhyaṇasya kamaṇḍaluritivat candanasya rūpādaya iti vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6150: anyathā tadbuddhyabhāvādityetāvanmātre vaktavye kathamāha tadagraha iti?
GSP29nystik_u:6162: tathāpi rūpādīnāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ pradhānamityasti sāṃkhyānāṃ vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6164: tathāpi rūpādīnāṃ parasparabhinnānāmanyonyaṃ vyapadeśyavyapadeśakabhāva upapatsyata ityuktam---samastairiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6166: upalabhyasyopalabhyeneti vaktavye pratyakṣsya pratyakṣeṇeti vacanaṃ rūpāvagamasamaye 'numeyebhyo rasādibhya ekāntato vyapadeśaṃ vyāvartayitum,
GSP29nystik_u:6170: vidhīyamānaṃ pratiṣidhyamānamiti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ niṣedhasya vidhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā niṣedhyamekatvam aṅgīkāryam,
GSP29nystik_u:6182: carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti itivad ghaṭādiviṣayanimittavyatirekabhāja ityatrāpi pratyayagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6187: sā yeṣāmasti te gajavājipadātiprabhūtayaḥ sthāninaḥ pratyekaṃ mahāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6189: kvacit punaḥ svajātīyasthānyaṅgāntarasannidhāne satyupacitāḥ sahasraṃ bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:6191: na caitāvatā yatra śataṃ gajādayaḥ yatra ca sahasraṃ tayoḥ senayormahattvāviśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6194: pratyayabhedād dravyādibhyaḥ saṃkhyāyā bhedamuktvā vyapadeśādabhedādapyāha---ata eveti //
GSP29nystik_u:6196: mūrtānāṃ samānadeśatvābhāvāt na parvasu khadiraśca sthāṇuśca samavetau /
GSP29nystik_u:6198: yasya dravyasya yāvān saṃyogapracayo 'samavāyikāraṇaṃ sa tāvānutpannamātra eva tajjanakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6200: tasmāt parvaṇāṃ saṃsthānaviśeṣa eva sthāṇuriti gamayitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6221: yastu yogyapramāṇābhāvāditi viśeṣayet taṃ pratyāha---yaśca tadagraha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6231: ātmādīnāṃ buddhihetūnāṃ lakṣaṇasyānantaraṃ hetumatī buddhirlakṣaṇīyetyāha vārttikakāraḥ---atha buddheravasaraprāptāyā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6238: api tu lakṣaṇaparādayamapyarthaḥ pratīyamāno 'pekṣitaśca nopekṣaṇīya ityuktaṃ bhavati //
GSP29nystik_u:6242: paryāyaśabdāśca saṃketamātrādhīnapravṛttayaḥ kva nāma na sambhavanti?
GSP29nystik_u:6262: tadidaṃ buddhitattvaṃ jaḍaprakṛtitayā indumaṇḍalam iva svayamaprakāśaṃ caitanyamārtaṇḍamaṇḍalacchāyāpattyā prakāśate,
GSP29nystik_u:6276: tasmāt kṛpaṇadhanamivātmacaitanyaṃ na svaparopakārīti buddheḥ svābhāvikaṃ caitanyamāstheyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6283: gandhādiviṣayatayā sukhaduḥkhaviṣayatayā ceyaṃ buddhirbhāvyamānā nirvedāya kalpata iti //15 //
GSP29nystik_u:6286: bhāṣyakāraḥ kramaprāptaṃ manolakṣaṇasūtramavatārayan utsūtramanyānyapi lakṣaṇāni āha---smṛtītyādi /
GSP29nystik_u:6293: tathāpi ākāśādīnāmapi manastvaṃ māṃ bhūdityata uktam---sahakārīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6298: atra ca ya ātmano viśeṣaguṇāste sarve indriyajanmāno yathā gandhādipratyayāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6301: evaṃ ca saṃskārādiṣu na karaṇatvaprasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6304: yadā tasyaiva manaḥsaṃyuktasyendriyasya krameṇa nīlādayo 'rthāḥ sambadhyante tadā tatkramāt krama
GSP29nystik_u:6306: bubhutsākramaṃ gṛhītvā siddhānte 'pi manaḥparityāgo mā bhūditi bhiyā uktam---satyāṃ bubhutsāyāmayugapadgrahaṇa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6307: na hi kiñcitkaraṇaṃ sambaddhamapi saditi syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6309: dvitīyādijñāneṣvapi saiva sāmagrīti sakṛdeva yāvat kartavayakaraṇāt samarthasya kṣepāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6310: kṣepayoge vā paścādapi na janayet, aviśeṣāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6311: na ca karturapyayaṃ kramakāritādharmaḥ sa hyanekakaraṇādhiṣṭhānena yugapannānākāryāṇi karoti /
GSP29nystik_u:6317: tadidamapimanaḥ smṛtyādisādhanatayā bhāvyamānaṃ nirvedāya kalpata iti saddhim//26 //
GSP29nystik_u:6322: na cāpratipādite manasi śakyā darśayitumiti manaso 'nantaratvaṃ pravṛtterityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6327: tatra yā jñānotpādadvāreṇa puṇyapāpahetuḥ sā vākpravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6329: tena manasā iṣṭadevatādyanucintanaṃ cakṣurādibhiśca sādhvasādhudarśanādi sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6333: na ceyaṃ kṣaṇikā satī āmuṣmikaṃ janma sādhayitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:6339: prava---ṣāḥ //18// rāgadveṣau mohaprabhavau puruṣaṃ pravartamānaṃ pravartayataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6347: na pratyātmavedanīyeṣu samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛtteṣu sphuṭatareṣu tad yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6353: sā ca pravṛttyā kāryeṇa lakṣyata iti karmalakṣaṇā ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6354: yataḥ karmaṇā pravṛttyā pravartakarāgādiyuktāḥ puruṣā lakṣyante,
GSP29nystik_u:6359: tadetat sarvaṃ vārttikakāraḥ praśnapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe---kā punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:6361: sā punariyaṃ pravartanā pravartakānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ kathaṃ gamyate?
GSP29nystik_u:6366: mauhaikārthasamavāyo hi rāgādīnāṃ mānasa pratyakṣavedanīya ityarthaḥ //18 //
GSP29nystik_u:6371: nanvātmano notpattiḥ saṃbhavati nityatvādityata āha bhāṣyakāraḥ---utpannasya saṃbaddhasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:6385: tathāpi pravṛttidoṣajanitatvenāpi rūpeṇāmī nirvedopayogina iti tena rūpeṇa lakṣyante //
GSP29nystik_u:6387: atra ca pravṛttijanita iti vaktavye doṣagrahaṇaṃ na kevalaṃ pravṛtti prati doṣāṇāṃ hetubhāvaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6388: api tu pravṛttikārye sūkhaduḥkhe api prati iti darśanārtham /
GSP29nystik_u:6389: doṣasalilāvasiktāyāṃ khalvātmabhūmau dharmādharmabīje sukhaduḥkhe janayataḥ, nānyathā /
GSP29nystik_u:6390: na cāsti sambhavo na tatra tṛṣyati tacca tasya sukham,
GSP29nystik_u:6391: na ca tad dveṣṭi tacca tasya duḥkhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6400: nānukte śarīrādau teṣāṃ duḥkhatvaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitumiti tallakṣaṇebhyaḥ paramidanduḥkhalakṣaṇam ---
GSP29nystik_u:6401: bādha---kham //21// atra ca bādhaneti bādhanāviṣayāṃ buddhimupalakṣayati /
GSP29nystik_u:6402: tena bādhanā ca tadanuṣaṅgiṇaśca śarīrādayo gauṇamukhyabhāvena lakṣitā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:6406: vaśitayā yoginaḥ svayamupalabhante svayamupanīteṣvapi viṣayeṣu audāsīnyamupekṣābuddhirvairāgyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6412: viraktaṃmānyā mānyante na sukhaṃ nāmāsti svarūpata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6417: tathāpyadhikādhikotkarṣaphalānāṃ darśapaurṇamāsādīnāṃ sahasrasaṃvatsaraparyantānāṃ vidhāyakebhyo vacanebhyo bhāvaphala eva dharmo gamyate bhāvasyaibotkarṣaśālitvāditi //21 //
GSP29nystik_u:6421: tadar---gaḥ //22// tadityanantaraṃ gauṇamukhyabhedabhinnaṃ duḥkhaṃ parāmṛśatītyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ---tena duḥkheneti /
GSP29nystik_u:6422: mukhyameva duḥkhamiti bhramo mā bhūdata āha---janmaneti /
GSP29nystik_u:6423: anena jāyamānā duḥkhaśabdena sarve śarīrādaya ucyanate ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6427: ye tu brahmaiva nāmarūpaprapañcātmanā pariṇamata ityāhuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6432: ekadeśapariṇāme tu sāvayavatvāt ghaṭadivadanityatvaprasaṅgaḥ iti sūktam---ajaramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6443: tayā ca brahmaṇo nityatvāt tadapi nityamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6444: ātmana iti ca ṣaṣṭhī rāhoḥ śira itivat mantavyā /
GSP29nystik_u:6456: na cātmaiva vijñānasvabhāvaḥ tattadviṣayopadhānenodayavyayadharmeva bhavatīti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:6457: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti mānasyāṃ buddhau trayāṇāmapi jñānajñeyajñātaṇāṃ bhedenānuvyavasāyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6459: na caitadasati bādhake bhedajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6464: na ca tadā viṣayaśūnyaṃ svaniṣṭhamātmacaitanyamiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6467: na ca kiñcidapi sava prakāśamastīti caturthe vijñāna vādaṃ nirākurvan vakṣyati //
GSP29nystik_u:6468: tadevaṃ vyavasthite dūṣaṇa bhāṣyavārttikoktaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ yathāyamātmamanaḥsaṃyoga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6469: saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ tāvadayamātmamanaḥsaṃyogo dharmaṃ nimittamapekṣamāṇaḥ sukhajñānam ākārṣīt /
GSP29nystik_u:6470: yadi tu muktyavasthāyāṃ tadanapekṣa eva sukhajñānaṃ karoti,
GSP29nystik_u:6473: na vayaṃ viṣayamātrāpekṣāṃ brūmo yena rūpādiṣvapi jñānamutpādayet,
GSP29nystik_u:6474: api tu saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ yat sukhajñānāyānenāpekṣitaṃ tadapekṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:6475: dharmaśca tadā tenāpekṣita iti muktyavasthāyāmapi dharmamevāpekṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:6477: tathā ca na rūpādivijñāna prasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6481: evamasmanmate 'pi sukhasaṃvedanahānāya ghaṭiṣyata ityata āha---na cāyaṃ sukhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6482: asmanmate hi duḥkhahānāyaiva tadanuṣaktaṃ sukhaṃ jihāsitam /
GSP29nystik_u:6483: nityaṃ tu sukhaṃ sarvaduḥkhavinirmuktaṃ sanna duḥkhahānāya jihāsitaṃ saṃbhavati ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6485: pratyuta muktyavasthāyāmapi kalpanīyatā ityāha---nityaṃ śarīrādi iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6498: tasmāt nityānanda eva mokṣa ityata āha---yadi punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:6502: tau ca vītarāgeṇāsaktena satā śakyau bhogena kṣetum,
GSP29nystik_u:6504: sa hi saktasteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu upāttamupāttaṃ bhu/
GSP29nystik_u:6505: jānaḥ tyaktaṃ tyaktaṃ copādadānaḥ saṃsārāt na mucyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:6508_0: anyathā tu nityasukhāvadhāraṇalāliteyaṃ tṛṣṇāpiśācī labdhaprasarā viṣayasukheṣvapi
GSP29nystik_u:6508_1: pratyāsanneṣu purūṣaṃ pravartayantī mokṣamasya sūdūraṃ pratikṣipediti manāgapi prasaro 'syā na dātavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6509: tasmāt nityānandapratipādakaśrutirātyantike duḥkhaviyoge bhāktīti yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6512: tasya ca tvayā prasaro datta iti tulayo doṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6515: yathā nityasukhopādānaṃ mokṣam apratikūlayā saktyā sapratikūlaṃ naivamātyantikaduḥkhahānaṃ duḥkhadveṣānuṣaktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6519: alaṃ pratyayo hi sa ityapratikūlaṃ duḥkhahānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6520: tadanena nityaṃ sukhamātmano mokṣe 'bhivyajyate ityādi tasmin prahīṇe nāsya nityasukharāgaḥ pratikūlo bhavatītyevamantaṃ bhāṣyajātaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6523: muktasya yadi nityaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati kāmaṃ bhavatu mā vā bhūt,
GSP29nystik_u:6524: ubhayorapi pakṣayoḥ vītarāgasya pravṛttau na mokṣādhigamo vikalpyate,
GSP29nystik_u:6529: na cātmani nitye rāgādayaḥ saṃsāraṃ kartumutsahante,
GSP29nystik_u:6547: nivṛttiśceyameva tasyā yat tatsantānavartinaścetaso 'nāgatasyānutpāda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6553: sa hi antyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kiñcidārabhate na vā?
GSP29nystik_u:6557: tataḥ pūrve sarve 'pi kṣaṇā asantaḥ syuriti kasyoccheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6565: yathā cākṣaṇikasyopakāryatvaṃ tathā kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge upapādayiṣyata iti saddhim //22 //
GSP29nystik_u:6582: atra ca vimarśaḥ saṃśaya iti saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6587: tadanenāsamānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇādibhyaḥ samānajātīyebhyaśca viparyayādibhyaḥ saṃśayo nivartito bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6590: atra viśiṣṭo 'vamarśo vimarśaviśiṣṭaḥ saṃśaya iti lakṣyapadam /
GSP29nystik_u:6593: trividha eveti ye pañcavidhamācakṣate te nirākṛtāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6594: tadanavadhāraṇajñānaṃ sa saṃśaya iti saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---tatra viṣayasvarūpeti /
GSP29nystik_u:6599: jñānatvaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ saṃśayādiṣvapyastīti na virodha iti //
GSP29nystik_u:6604: guṇa eva kasmāt na karotīti praśnārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6614: na ca sadṛśo dharmaḥ sattāmātreṇa saṃśaye hetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6621: asmadāyatte hi śabdaprayoge kimityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6628: tasmād viśeṣāpekṣayā vighṛkṣālakṣaṇayeha viśeṣayoḥ purovartivastusādṛśyāt smaraṇe satyagrahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇīyam,
GSP29nystik_u:6635: tathā ca vinigamanāyāṃ ko heturityata āha---yaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:6637: tat kuto na virodha ityata uktam---svatantramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6640: yathā ca dhūmo na sattāmātreṇa hetustathoktaṃ prāgiti //
GSP29nystik_u:6642: te kila manyante vyavacchedaheturapi dharmaḥ samāno bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6643: yathā kṛtakatvaṃ sādhyadharmiṇi śabde dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi ca ghaṭādau samānam,
GSP29nystik_u:6668: viśiṣyate hyanena purūṣaḥ sthāṇoriti anupalabdhasāmānyasyāpi kvacidupalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāstīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6671: na hi tatra sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vāsti pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6674: tad yathā hastinaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsaṃbandhino sthūṇāhastipakau smarati na ca tatra saṃndigdhe //
GSP29nystik_u:6676: naudolārūḍho hi gacchan vidūre ārohapariṇāvadvastudarśane 'pi satyapi ca sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve viśeṣasmṛtyamāvāt naga iti vā nāga iti vā na sandigdhe /
GSP29nystik_u:6677: evamupalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāto viśeṣāpekṣa iti padadvaye vidhīyamāna'nyataḥ smaryamāṇād viśeṣāt sadṛśadharmavati dharmiṇyanupalabhyamāne saṃśayaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6679: no khalvanupalabhyamāne samānadharme dharmiṇi tadgatā vakrakoṭarādayo vā śiraḥ pāṇyādayo vā śakyagrahā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6686: na tu sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāva iti na saṃśete /
GSP29nystik_u:6692: viśeṣaṃ bubhutsamāna iti viśeṣāpekṣa ityasya vivaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6696: kathaṃ bubhutsamānaḥ saṃśeta ityata uktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā,
GSP29nystik_u:6699: seyaṃ sādhakabādhakapramāṇānupapattau satyā samānadharmopalabdhirvinaśyadavasthā viśeṣasmṛtyā sahāvinaśyadavasthā ekasmin kṣaṇe satī saṃśayajñānasya heturiti siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:6702: anekadharmopapatterityatra bhāṣyakṛto vyākhyāṃ grahītum ekadeśivyākhyānamupanyasya dūṣayati---aneketi /
GSP29nystik_u:6704: saṃyogajatvaṃ hi kārye dravye guṇe ca rūpādau śarīrādikriyāyāṃ cāstīti dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samānam /
GSP29nystik_u:6706: evaṃ śabdagato 'neko 'pi dharmaḥ samānatayaiva dravyatvādisandehahetuḥ triṣu,
GSP29nystik_u:6718: tadanena samānajātīyam asamānajātīyaṃ cānekamiti bhāṣyaṃ tasmād viśeṣa ityadhyāhṛtya vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:6727: tadevaṃ lakṣaṇābījadvayopanyāsena asādhāraṇo dharma iti grahaṇakavākyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:6729: ekaṃ cāneka ca tadubhayamanekaṃ tasyānekasya pratyayaheturdharmo 'nekadharmaḥ bhedābhedapratyayaheturityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6732: tadidamāha---yato vibhāgajatvāt eṣa pratyayo bhavatīdaṃ vibhāgajaṃ śabdajātam ekam /
GSP29nystik_u:6734: tatra ya eva ekapratyayahetuḥ dharmo 'bhedaḥ sa eva anekapratyayaheturviśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6738: tadidamāha---yataḥ sadādereṣa pratyayo bhavatīdamekaṃ yataśca vibhāgajatvādepa pratyayo bhavatīdamanekamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:6747: yad yena sahacaritaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tat kkacid dṛśyamānaṃ tat smārayat tadviyaruddhenāpi ca saṃbandhānaniścāyayat saṃśayaheturbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:6749: asādhāraṇastu dharmo vibhāgajatvaṃ narte śabdāt kkacit pṛthivyādau vā utkṣepaṇādau vā gandhādau vā dṛṣṭa iti kathra smārayet,
GSP29nystik_u:6750: asmārayad vā kathaṃ tatra saṃśayaṃ janayet?
GSP29nystik_u:6751: tasmāt ko 'yaṃ bhavedityayo dharmāditi jijñāsāmātramutpādayet na tvayaṃ vāyaṃ veti saṃśayamityata āha---na hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6755: nanvata evoktaṃ na saṃśayaheturityataḥ āha---vibhāgajatvaṃ saṃśarye karoti sarvato vyāvṛtteriti /
GSP29nystik_u:6757: yadyapi vibhāgajatvaṃ na dravyādau kvacid dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nystik_u:6758: tathāpi tadvyatirekaḥ pratyekaṃ dravyādau dṛṣṭa iti vibhāgajatvena sadādyaviśeṣavān śabdo dravyakarmabhyā vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ guṇaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6760: guṇadravyābhyāṃ vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ karmeti vyatirekamukhena tattat smārayan asādhāraṇo dharmo bhavati saṃśayakāraṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6767: avayavakriyā hi tadavayavāvaruddhanabhobhāgavibhāgajanikā dravyārambhakasaṃyogāpratidvandvivibhāgajanakatvena vyāptā vikasatkamalakuṅmaladaleṣu dṛṣṭā /
GSP29nystik_u:6768: na hi tatra tatra mukulitād vikāsi kamalamanyat,
GSP29nystik_u:6772: tathā ca dravyaṃ kāryamapi na naśyet /
GSP29nystik_u:6778: anabhyupagamabījaṃ ca kutaḥ punarevadevamavagataṃ padmapatrāvayavakriyā vibhāgadvayajaniketi,
GSP29nystik_u:6783: athaṃ viparyayaḥ kasmāt na bhavatīti vaṃśadaladvayakriyaiva vibhāgadvayajanikā,
GSP29nystik_u:6790: kriyāvailakṣaṇyāt tu svahetuvailakṣaṇyajanmanaḥ kāryasya vibhāgasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:6792: tathāpi caitadvailakṣaṇyaṃ kriyāyā abhyupetavyam yadekā vibhāgamekaṃ janayati /
GSP29nystik_u:6801: tasmāt hastāditaruvibhāgaḥ kriyato 'saṃbhavannaṅgulyāditaruvibhāgameva kāryaikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā nimittīkarotīti vibhāgajavibhāgasiddhiṃ manyate,
GSP29nystik_u:6804: tathāpi vibhāgajatvamīdṛśamasādhāraṇamevetyata āha---astu vā tasya abhyupagatavibhāgasya api vibhāgajatvamasādhāraṇaṃ viśiṣṭam /
GSP29nystik_u:6806: pāṭyamāne hi vaṃśe śabdotpattau vaṃśadalayormitho vibhāgo nimittakāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6821: tathāpi kāraṇamātravibhāgajavibhāgāsamavāyikāraṇakatvāditi hetuḥ bhāṣyakāreṇa vibhāgajatvāt ityanena sūcitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6827: na tu yo vyāvṛttaḥ tena sahāsyāsāhacaryāditi śaṅakāmapanetuṃ bhāṣyakārīyamuttaramāha---tulyajātīyeṣvitiṃ /
GSP29nystik_u:6830: yat khalu sadādirūpasaṃpannaṃ viśeṣavat tatsamānajātīyebhyo 'samānajātīyabhyaśca vyāvṛttam,
GSP29nystik_u:6832: abādibhyaśca dravyāntarebhyāṃ guṇakarmabhyaśca vijātīyebhyo gandhavattvena vyāvṛttaṃ dravyajātīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6835: tathāvidhaḥ śabdaḥ sadādirūpasaṃpanno vibhāgajatvena samānāsamānajātīyebhyo viśiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:6836: tasmād bhavati dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma veti saṃśaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6838: saṃprati samānaśabdaparyālocanayāpyanekapadamasādhāraṇe vartate lakṣaṇayaivetyāha---samānadharmasya saṃśayakāraṇatvena upayogād veti /
GSP29nystik_u:6839: samānaṃ hi pratigogitayā asamānaṃ buddhau sannidhāpayati /
GSP29nystik_u:6840: tatra dvayasyāpi samānaśabdena śrutyarthābhyāmupāttasya samānasya dharmasyāsamānasya ca,
GSP29nystik_u:6843: asmadāyatte śabdaprayoge kimityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6847: sā ca lākṣaṇikānekapadādhīnā nāsamānapadāt labhyata iti prayojanavallākṣaṇikapadopādānam /
GSP29nystik_u:6848: lakṣaṇaiva ceyam anekasmādvyāvṛtto dharmo 'nekadharma iti vigraheṇa nirvarṇyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6865: nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavadityekaḥ pañcarūpopapanno 'vyabhicārī hetuḥ1 anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavaditi cāyamaparaḥ pañcarūpopapanno 'vyabhicārī heturiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6868: na cāyaṃ prativādinaḥ prayogo 'pi yuktaḥ iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6876: na ca yadā nivartakatvamasyāsti tadā janakamapītyāha---na hi viśeṣadarśane satīti //
GSP29nystik_u:6878: pratyakṣameva sa evāyaṃ gakāra ityevamākāraṃ pratyabhijñāsamājñātaṃ śabdasya sthemānamākalayat,
GSP29nystik_u:6880: iti nityatvaṃ paricchetsyatītyata āha---nāyamarthaḥ pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6881: tadeva hi pratyakṣaṃ saṃśayasya nivartakaṃ yadananyathāsiddham,
GSP29nystik_u:6883: idaṃ tu sādṛśyenāpi saṃbhavāt svayaṃ sandigdhaṃ sanna saṃśayocchedāyālamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6894: tathāpi svasvasāmānyaviśeṣagatvādyupahitā gavādivyaktaya iva gotvādyupadhānāḥ śakyasaṃketā iti na nityatāmākṣipatyāgama ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6896: na khalu candramasaḥ parabhāge hariṇasadasadbhāvasandehaḥ śakyaḥ kadācidapyucchettumasmadādīnāmityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6898: sandigdhanityānityabhāve śabde kṛtakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nānityatvena svabhāvataḥ pratibaddham /
GSP29nystik_u:6909: sautrāntikamate hi rūpaṃ sapratighamiṣyate mūrtaṃ ca,
GSP29nystik_u:6910: nitya eveti vā anitya eveti vā abhilāpo nopapadyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:6911: sthāṇureveti vā puruṣa eveti vā abhilāpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6924: tathā ca bahu vyāhataṃ bhavatītyāśayavān pṛcchati---yadā punarevaṃbhūtāviti /
GSP29nystik_u:6926_0: nanu kṛtakatvasya sādhyatvāt śrāvaṇatvasya ca siddhatvāt prathamabhāvinā nityatvānumānena
GSP29nystik_u:6927: siddhamapi śravaṇatvamanumānasikatādyanityadharmasādhāraṇatayā savyabhicāraṃ sannityatvasya sādhanaṃ na bhavitumarhatoti /
GSP29nystik_u:6932: tathāpi tasyā vādiprativādigatāyā atyantaparokṣatvāt saṃśayakāraṇatvānupapatteḥ svakāryaṃ pravādaṃ lakṣayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6933_0: atra bhāṣyakāraḥ upalabdhyavyavasthāyā anupalabdhavyavasthāyāśca pṛthak saṃśayakāraṇatvaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:6933_1: matvā samānadharmopapatterityanena gatārthatāṃ pariharannāha sma---purvaḥ samāno 'nekaścetyādi /
GSP29nystik_u:6936: satyāṃ ca viśeṣasmṛtau sādhakabādhakapramāṇāsadbhāve saṃśayo bhavatītyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6940: tat kimidānī sarveṣāṃ jñātṛsthatvāviśeṣaṇa trayāṇāmapi saṃśayakāraṇānāṃ samānānekavipratipattīnāmabhedaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6944: asādhāraṇo hyadṛṣṭapūrvaḥ kvacidapi na saṃśayaṃ kartumutsahate,
GSP29nystik_u:6945: yat punarasādhāraṇavattvaṃ saṃśayahetutvenopavarṇitaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā tat samānameva,
GSP29nystik_u:6951: yacca vārttikakāreṇa sarvato vyāvṛttyā asādhāraṇasya saṃśayakāraṇatvamuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:6952: tatrāpi tadabhāvasya sādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutve kimāyātamasādhāraṇasya? yathāhuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6958: sa ca sādhāraṇe niviśate iti sūktam sarva evāyaṃ samānadharma evābhidhīyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6961: na vayaṃ sarvatra sādhāraṇamapajānīmahe anvayavyatirekavyabhicāravaktṛgatatvabhedamātramādriyamāṇāḥ kāraṇabhedena trividhaṃ saṃśayamācakṣmahe ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6964: api caitayoḥ pṛthak saṃśayakāraṇatve 'tiprasaṅgāt niścayapūrvaṃ na pravarteta lokaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6967: na cānabhyāsadaśānne upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthayāṃ saṃśaya iti vācyam,
GSP29nystik_u:6968: anabhyāsadaśāpanne hi dūrād vahnijñāne upalabdhyavyavasthāyā api na nāgo vā nago veti saṃśerate,
GSP29nystik_u:6969: kiṃ tu kiṃśukakusumanicayo vā uṣarbudho veti,
GSP29nystik_u:6973: sāmagrībhedena bhede trevidhyaṃ saṃśayasya sāmagrīniveśikāraṇabhedena tu pañcavidhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6979: upalabdhapūrvāyāṃ vyaktau saṃśaye tadgatā viśeṣāḥ susmūrṣitāḥ tajjātīyavyaktyantarasaṃśaye tvanyagatāste sāmānyadvāreṇopalabdhā eveti---sāmānyapratyakṣāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:6988: bauddhānāṃ hi rāddhānte na rūpādidharmāśrayaḥ kaścidasti dharmī /
GSP29nystik_u:6990: yadi tvāha bhavatu rāddhāntavyākopo na hi śāstrāśrayo vāda iti,
GSP29nystik_u:6998: sāmānyaviśeṣatadvadabhyupagame 'pi tadvato 'śravaṇāt sādharmyasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā iti gamyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:6999: na ca sāmānyasya viśeṣā iti viruddhārthamabhidhānaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7008: yadi tāvat saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇe sthite trīṇi viśeṣalakṣaṇāni tataḥ saṃśayatvenopagṛhītānāṃ trayāṇāṃ parasparavyavacchedakamātraṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7013: tathā cānyānyapi saṃśayakāraṇāni santīti tānyapi vaktavyāni /
GSP29nystik_u:7016: so 'yamasyātmanaḥ sannikarṣajanmā saṃśayaḥ āntarasya śamāderviṣayasyeti samādhatte---astu tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7019: tathā ca pratipattigauravaṃ syāditi tallāghavāya śeṣāpekṣā yuktā /
GSP29nystik_u:7023: vipratipanno 'pi puruṣaḥ saṃdigdhavat pratipādya evati manvānaścodayati---saṃśayavaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7025: kiṃ tu jalpavitaṇḍābhyāṃ śiṣyato nītvā sandigdha eva pratipādya ityabhiprāyeṇa pariharati---satyamiti //23 //
GSP29nystik_u:7036: na ca sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārau svarūpeṇa pravṛtti nivṛttigocarāviti tadupāyapravṛttyaiva cetanapravṛttigocarāviti darśayati---tadāptihānopāyamanutiṣṭhatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7042: tat kuto na virodha ityata āha---vyavasāyo 'rthasyādhikāra ityādi /
GSP29nystik_u:7060: yathā ca pramāṇasya pramāṇopapannatā na cānavasthā,
GSP29nystik_u:7062: na ca prasiddhataratayā na prayojanaṃ lakṣaṇīyam iti yuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:7075: yā khalu niṣprayojaneti na brūmaḥ prayojanaṃ nyāyasyāṅgamityapi,
GSP29nystik_u:7076: mukhyaṃ prayojanameva hi tanna syād yadṛte puruṣādanyārthamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7077: prayojanavāṃstu nyāyo niṣprayojanāṃ tadgatāṃ cintāmaṅgī karoti,
GSP29nystik_u:7079: tasmādanaṅgamapi prayojanaṃ parīkṣāyā mūlaṃ svarga iva setikartavyatākasya yāgādyanuṣṭhānasyeti siddham //24 //
GSP29nystik_u:7081: NyS_1,1.25: laukikaparīkṣadāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7092: tadviparītāḥ tadubhayaṃsapannāśca parīkṣakāḥ pratipādakā iti yāvat kathābahutvācca bahuvayanam /
GSP29nystik_u:7099: lakṣitaśca dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇalakṣaṇāya kalpate ghaṭate iti bhāṣyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7105: na khalvasiddhaḥ sādhyena sādhanasyāvinābhāvo dṛṣṭāntena sādhyate ityarthaḥ//25 //
GSP29nystik_u:7108: atra bhāṣyakāraḥ siddhāntasāmānyalakṣaṇamapaṭhitvaiva tātparyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---atha siddhāntaḥ ityādinā /
GSP29nystik_u:7109: tatra idamitthaṃbhūtamiti vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭe---idamiti sāmānyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7110: bhāṣye ca saṃsthitiritthaṃbhāvavyastheti sāmānyopakramasya abhyupagamasya pramāṇato viśeṣaparyantatāparisamāptiḥ saṃsthitirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7117: na khalu sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa śakyo vibhāga ityuktam//26 //
GSP29nystik_u:7123: tadevādhikaraṇam āśrayo jñāpakatvena yeṣāmarthānāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7133: sākṣācchāstre nopātto yathā manasa indriyabhāva iti //27 //
GSP29nystik_u:7145: yatra ca saṃbandhagrahaḥ sa dṛṣṭānta ityarthaḥ //28 //
GSP29nystik_u:7152: cetanā ātmanaḥ niratiśayā apariṇāmino na kenacid dharmeṇopajanāpāyadharmeṇa yujyante /
GSP29nystik_u:7153: prākṛteṣu ca dehādiṣu tatkāraṇeṣu mahadahaṅkārapañcatanmātrabhūtasūkṣmeṣu viśeṣo 'tiśaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7159: yat---ntaḥ//30// yasyārthasya sādhyasya vā hetorvā siddhau iti viṣayasaptamī,
GSP29nystik_u:7164: sa pakṣo vā bhavatu heturvā anena rūpeṇa adhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7166: atra hi pṛthivyādigatenotpattimattena upalabdhimatpūrvakatvaṃ tadgataṃ sādhyamānaṃ svasiddhyantargatānuṣaṅgisarvajñatvādyupetameva sidhyati,
GSP29nystik_u:7171: pūrvo 'rtho yaḥ sākṣāddhikṛtaḥ tasya siddhāvantargata iti bhāṣyārthaḥ//30 //
GSP29nystik_u:7184: evaṃ svamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya bhāṣyakāravyākhyānaṃ dūṣayati---śāstrānabhyupagata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7187: na ca pramāṇānadhīnābhyupagamastadanvetīti nāyamīdṛśo 'bhyupagamasiddhānto bhavitumarhatīti hṛdi nidhāyāyuktāpi darśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:7188: ajñaṃ pratyasadācāratvāt pramāṇikaṃ ca puruṣaṃ pratyaśakyatvāt buddhimato 'vajñānasyāyuktatvāt aśakyatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7193: tarhi siddhāntabhedināmarthānāṃ prāmāṇikatvena viruddhadharmasamāliṅgitā bhāvāḥ prasajyerannityata āha---tatpratyayāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7197: karmatayā vyajyamānatayā vā upādānaṃ svārthasya pakṣa iti padam /
GSP29nystik_u:7200: kriyāviśeṣayukta iti avāntaravyāpārayukte tena hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ kārakāṇāṃ vaicitryaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7204: na ca dharmiṇi anabhyupagate tadāśrayo 'bhyupagato bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7207: yathā daṇḍiśabdena daṇḍasaṃbandhopahitasīmānaḥ samānāsamānajātīyāḥ sarve saṃgṛhyante,
GSP29nystik_u:7208: tathā pakṣaśabdenāpītyarthaḥ ayaṃ tu kalpaḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntāvyāpakatvakathanenaivārthādapākṛta iti na pṛthak nirākṛtaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7210: na ca vyajyamānatvamasti nisargavyakte sarvatantrasiddhānta iti bhāva /
GSP29nystik_u:7212: pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte iti vākyasya divābhojananiṣedho 'rthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7214: sā ca na yathā pramāṇāntarulaṃ tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7223: anyaparādapi vākyāt pratīyamāno 'rtho 'pekṣita svīkriyata eveti śābdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7227: tasmāt tathāvidhārthapratyāyanameva pratijñādīnāmavayavasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ siddhamiti sūtramityanena darśitaṃ vārttikakṛtā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7235: tasya pravarttikā utpādikā jijñāsā pratyayasādhanānusaraṇadvāreṇa pratyāsattiḥ saṃśayatattvajñānayorviśeṣagatā na tu svarūpagatā,
GSP29nystik_u:7245: na syāt kṛtaka iti anityatvasya nityatvaṃ pratipakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7250: vyudasyate hi tena pramāṇābhyanujñānadvāreṇa itikartavyatābhūtena saṃśaṃya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7251: tadetad bhāṣyajātaṃ praśnapūrvakaṃ vārttikakṛd vyācaṣṭe---kathaṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:7254: svapratipādakā eva kasmāt na bhavantītyata āha---niścitatvācceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7258: tat kiṃ sarvathaivānaṅgaṃ jijñāsādaya ityata uktaṃ bhāṣyakatā,
GSP29nystik_u:7263: te ca jijñāsādaya utpannāḥ prakaraṇasyotthāpakāḥ svarūpeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:7264: na punaḥ svajñānena yena śabdapratipādyāḥ santaḥ prakaraṇe 'pyaṅgaṃ bhaveyuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7278: sa ca parvate 'gnimati sādhyamāne viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhalakṣaṇo niyamo 'rthāt sidhyati /
GSP29nystik_u:7282: atrānyayogavyavacchedaṃ vākyārthaṃ manvāno bhadantaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇamativyāptyavyāptibhyām ākṣipati---ubhayeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7283: ubhayoravadhāraṇayoḥ prāptau saṃśayena kimidamavadhāryate kiṃ cedamiti prasaktāvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7285: yata evakaraṇaṃ na tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇam iti hi śābdā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7291: yathendriyārthasannikarṣotpannamityukte jñānaṃ sukhādi ca sāmanyena prāptam /
GSP29nystik_u:7297: tat kri loke na kpacidavadhāraṇam ityata āha---yatra ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7314: prajñāpanīyena dharmaiṇa dharmiṇo viśiṣṭasya parigrahavacanam iti sūtrārthaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7319: ito 'pi nāsiddhayorhetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅga ityāha---sādhyanirdeśa iti ca pratijñāyāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7323: nanu yadi sarvatantrasiddhāntātiriktānāṃ siddhāntāntarāṇāṃ sādhyatvaṃ tarhi sādhyenaiva caritārthatvād apārthakaṃ pṛthagabhidhānameteṣāmiti,
GSP29nystik_u:7328: dhibhāgasūtreṇa prakaraṇotthānahetavo vākyāvayavatayā nirākāryatvena jijñāsādayo buddhisthīkṛtāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7330: na ca cākṣuṣatvādiṣu pramāṇabādhiteṣu santi ta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7333: evaṃ tāvad vyutpattyādyālocanayā sādhyaśabdasya na hetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:7336: anyatarāsiddhayorhetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgo mā bhūditi karmatayā te upādīyanta ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:7344: tathā ca na sākṣāt tatpratyāyanāya te vibhavantīti tadarthaṃ sādhane vyāpriyante /
GSP29nystik_u:7345: tena siṣādhayiṣitadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī teṣāṃ pradhānaṃ viṣayaśca /
GSP29nystik_u:7346: pradhānaṃ ca prathamaṃ buddhau viparivartate iti sādhyaśabdena sa evocyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7348: tadevamaduṣṭamasmallakṣaṇamiti yadasmallakṣaṇamanena doṣeṇa bhaṅktvā bhadantena anyathā lakṣaṇaṃ praṇītam,
GSP29nystik_u:7350: nanu yatra sādhyapadam asti bhavatu tatreṣṭagrahaṇamanarthakam,
GSP29nystik_u:7354: tadapi hi pacyamānaṃ vyajyamānaṃ sādhyamevāha---tacca karma,
GSP29nystik_u:7357: nanvaniṣṭaḥ pakṣa iti vipratiṣiddhamityata uktam---arthataḥ kileti /
GSP29nystik_u:7365: no khalu mahatī pradīpe ghaṭo mahān alpe vā alpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7366: mahati tu kāraṇe mahān śabda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7375: yadyapyāgamo 'pi śabdānityatve 'sti yathā somaṃ rājānamasṛjata tatastreyo vedā asṛjyanta //
GSP29nystik_u:7377: tathāpi nāsadāsīnno sadāsīdāmnāya eva khalvayamagra āsīt //
GSP29nystik_u:7380: prasiddhivirodhaṃ tu na budhyamāhe pramāṇavirodhād bhedena /
GSP29nystik_u:7388: asmākaṃ tu mānasapratyakṣavirodha iti sarvathā na pramāṇādanyā prasiddhiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:7391: vastu hi yādṛśaṃ svakāraṇādutpannaṃ tādṛśameva tat /
GSP29nystik_u:7392: na tasyānyathābhāva iti na tatra doṣo niviśate /
GSP29nystik_u:7394: yā punaḥ ṣauruṣeyī dṛṣṭamanyatrārthamanyatra samāropya bhrāntyā vā paravipralambhāya vā pratijñādirūpeṇa vākyakriyā,
GSP29nystik_u:7398: svārthāpavādaḥ svavacanavirodhaḥ kartṛdoṣo bhramo vā vipralambho vā kriyāyāmupacaryate /
GSP29nystik_u:7399: na ca kriyāyāṃ bhramo vā vipralambho vā,
GSP29nystik_u:7400: tayorabhiprāyabhedatayā puruṣadharmatvāt kriyāyā vastubādhanāt puruṣābhiprāyāvagatiriti kriyādvāreṇetyuktam //
GSP29nystik_u:7405: sa triṣu rūpeṣvanyatamena rūpeṇa rahito nyūno 'siddho vā viruddho vā anaikāntiko vā bhavatīti so 'yaṃ nyūnatādoṣo hetoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7411: sa hi vādino vā prativādino vābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7414: pratijñāgatā hi doṣā yadi tadgatatvena udbhāvyamānā na vādino nigrahamāpādayeyuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7416: pārayanti tu pratijñāgatāni dūṣaṇāni nigrahituṃ vādinamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7422: iṣṭagrahaṇamanakṣarārūḍhamapyabhiprāyavyāptaṃ sādhyaṃ tathā syādityevamarthaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7426: tacca noccārayati mā bhūdananvayo hetuḥ saṃghātatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7433: tātparyaṃ cāsya kvacid vācye kvacillakṣya iti sarva evāsau vacanārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7442: tataśca saṃśayaviṣaya iṣyamāṇo jijñāsyamānaśca sādhya eva bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:7453: ata evaṃ vaktavyaṃ pakṣo yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7455: tathāpi tumunā ya eva sādhayitā vādī sa evaiṣitetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7456: na punarvādino niyoktā sādhayitā vādī caiṣiteti /
GSP29nystik_u:7461: sa hi sidhyantaṃ sādhyaṃ vādī tasminniyaṃ sādhanā samavetā /
GSP29nystik_u:7462: yastu tasyāpi prayojakastṛtīyasthānapatito na tasmin sādhanā samavaitīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7463: yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeveti kathañcidasya bhaktyā kartṛtvam,
GSP29nystik_u:7468: yastāvat śāstrāviruddho 'rthaḥ pramāṇasiddhaḥ sa śāstrīya eva śāstrābhyupetapramāṇasiddhatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7470: yastu pramāṇīkṛtavaiśaṣikatantraḥ śabdanityatvaṃ sādhayati so 'navadheyavacanaḥ na hetvabhidhānaṃ yāvat pariṣatprativādibhyāṃ nīyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7472: yastu vaiśeṣikatantrādhyayanamātrād vaiśeṣikatvamātmano darśayitvā śabdanityatāṃ pratijānīte nāsau pramāṇīkṛtavaiśeṣikatantra iti na nigṛhyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7482: tathā hi parapratyāyanāya vacanam uccārayanti prekṣāvantaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7483: tadeva ca pare bodhayitavyā yad bubhutsante /
GSP29nystik_u:7485: no khalvāmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārānācakṣāṇaḥ praṣṭuravadheyavacano bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7487: yathā ca māṭhara samidhamāhareti guruṇā preṣita eṣohamāharāmītyanuktvā tadarthaṃ tadaryaṃ yadāyaṃ dātrāya gṛhaṃ praviśati,
GSP29nystik_u:7488: tadāsmai kupyati guraḥ āḥ śiṣyāpasada chāndasavacara māṭhara māmavadhīrayasīti bruvāṇaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7489: evamanityaṃ śabdaṃ bubhutsamānāyānityaḥ śabda ityanuktvā yadeva kiściducyate kṛtakatvāditi vā,
GSP29nystik_u:7491: kṛtakaśca śabda iti vā tat sarvamasyānapekṣitam āpātato 'saṃbaddhābhidhānabuddhyā,
GSP29nystik_u:7493: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvamanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7498: na ca pariṣatprativādinau pramāṇīkṛtavādinau yadetad vacanaṃ saṃbandhāya pratīkṣete,
GSP29nystik_u:7501: anityaḥ śabda iti tvapekṣita ukte kuta ityapekṣāyāṃ kṛtakatvāditi heturupa tiṣṭhate /
GSP29nystik_u:7502: so 'yaṃ pañcāvayavaprayoge ca tallakṣaṇe ca pratijñānantarakāla evāvasaro hetoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7506: sa ca vibhāgoddeśe vākyāvayava iti vacanarūpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7507: tasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyasādhanamiti sādhyate 'neneti vyutpattyā yadyapi pārārthyāpannaṃ kṛtakatvādikamartham āha,
GSP29nystik_u:7509: yadi ca vacanaṃ heturityucyeta tatsādhyena samabhivyāhṛtaṃ pratijñā syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7514: kiṃ tu prātipadikārthapradhānatayā svaniṣṭhamiti na tatrāpi prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7527: sādhyasyeti dharmimātre buddhirmā bhūdityata uktaṃ dharmasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7534: yo dharmo dhūmādi---sādhye bhavati sa tathābhūta evodāharaṇe 'pīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7535: udāhniyata ityudāharaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmī tasmin na punaḥ sa eva /
GSP29nystik_u:7539: sā hi tattvānyatvavirodhinītyata āha---kiṃ tu tattulyaḥ sa evetyucyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7540: yathā tāneva śalīn upayuṅkte tāneva tittirīnīti tadanena sāmānyād iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam //
GSP29nystik_u:7542: sādharmyamātratvaṃ hi viruddhe cāsādhāraṇe savyabhicāre cāstīti teṣāmapi vacanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7544: nanu tathāpi savyabhicāre 'pyudāraṇasādharmyamiti kathaṃ nivartyate ityata āha---udāharaṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7547: sādharmyādityato viśeṣeṇa sarvasādharmyaprāptau udāharaṇasādharmyamapi prāptameveti vidhānānarthakyaṃ parisaṃkhyāyakaṃ sadavadhāraṇārthameva bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7548: tadavadyotanāya ca evakāraḥ sādharmyameva ityatra sādhyapadaṃ yojanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7555: sādhyasādhanamiti ca padena sannidhāpitamiti tadeva dvitīyam avadhāraṇaṃ sphuṭīkaroti---atrāpi ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7565: etat kila hetulakṣaṇa bhadanto dūṣayāṃbabhūva sādhanaṃ yadi sārdhmyaṃ na vākyāṃśaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7567: yadi sādhanasādharmyayoratyantābhedo yadi vā sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena kathañcid bhedaḥ ubhayathāpi na pañcamī,
GSP29nystik_u:7579: na tatrāpi dvidhā doṣāt sākṣād vā sādhanaṃ pāramparyeṇa vā?
GSP29nystik_u:7581: vaktṛjñānaṃ tarhi sākṣāt sādharmyasamutthaṃ pāramparyeṇa ca śrotuḥ sādhyavijñānasādhanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7583: tarhi śrotṛjñānaṃ pāramparyeṇa sādharmyasamutthaṃ sākṣāt sādhanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7600: yadā hi sādhyasādhanaṃ nāmodāharaṇasādharmyādatiriktaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu śabdamātramavaśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7602: tathā ca sādhyanirdeśaḥ pratijñā ityanena virodhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7609: tadetallakṣaṇaṃ vyācakṣāṇairasmābhiḥ parihṛtamiti na parihārāntaraṃ prayojayatītyāha---tatra tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:7610: uktaṃ yathā hetupadasannidhau sādhanapadaṃ hetupade pravartate,
GSP29nystik_u:7614: sādharmyasya liṅsya kṛtakatvādihetupadavācyasya vyabhicāritvādiyogādudāharaṇaviśeṣaṇayogo na punaḥ sādhyasādhanapadavācyasya kṛtakatvādityāderhetuvacanasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7625: tathā prātisvikamapi bhedaṃ sarveṣāmeva śabdānāmitikaraṇo darśayatītyāha---dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7628: anabhyupagato 'rthāntaraṃ vipakṣo yasya hetoranityatve sādhye kṛtakatvādeḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7629: yadabhyupagataṃ bhadantena tasmāt ṣaṣṭyastviti tad dūṣayati---yadapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7633: na tu ṣaṣṭhī vā hetupañcamī vā kārakavibhaktiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:7634: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa śuddhaṃ hetuvacanamudāhṛtam---utpattidharmakatvāditi tasya codāharaṇasādharmyasamutthatvajñāpanāyodāharaṇamapi darśitam utpattidharmakamanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:7638: sato vināśo vā anityatvam, tadyogo vā?
GSP29nystik_u:7642: tataścānityaḥ śabda iti samānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7647: na ca sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vastvantaraṃ dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:7652: aparānteti vaktavye ubhayāntagrahaṇena pūrvāntaniveśanaṃ hetorutpattimattvasyātyantiṅkīṃ pratyāsattimavinābhāvopayoginīṃ darśayitumiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7655: taccāparāntasya bhinnakālasya saṃbaddhasyāpi virodhitayā buddhisthasya saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7656: tathā ca yaivāparāntāvacchinnasya sattā piṭharasya saivāparāntāvacchinnasya śabdasyāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:7668: tenāsadviśeṣaṇasya sata ityetāvataiva pūrvāntaparicchinnasya sattāsaṃbandhaḥ sattā vā tadviśeṣaṇotpattirdarśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:7672: na caivaṃ labdhotpattini vastuni utpadyata iti pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7674: tasmāt pūrvāntāvacchinnavastusattayā tatsaṃbandhena vā tasyaiva vastuno 'parāntāvacchinnā sattā vā tatsaṃbandho vā jñāpyate iti sarvaṃ ramaṇīyam //
GSP29nystik_u:7675: nanu bhāṣyakṛd abhūtvā bhavatītyasya vākyāsyārthamutpattiṃ vakṣyati,
GSP29nystik_u:7677: ataḥ kuto na virodha ityata āha---vākyārtheti / ya
GSP29nystik_u:7682: api svasadviśeṣaṇasya sataḥ sattā vā tatsaṃbandho vetyuktamityarthaḥ//34 //
GSP29nystik_u:7686_1: yadā viṣāṇitvena sādhyate tasyāsti pakṣavaidharmyamiti hetuḥ syādityata āha---udāharaṇena vaidharmyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7688: tathāpi yadā śarīramātraṃ pakṣīkṛtya sātmakatvaṃ sādhyate prāmādimattvena,
GSP29nystik_u:7689: tadāsti tasyodāharaṇena vaidharmyamiti so 'pi hetuḥ syādityata āha---eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:7693: tathāpi anvayavyatirekiṇo hetāranaikāntikasya vipekṣaikadeśavyāpinaḥ saṃgrahaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7695: utpattidharmakatvād anityo mūrtatvādityata āha---vaidharmyameva codāharaṇeneti vipakṣodāharaṇenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7703: prāṇādinā ca svakāraṇaṃ prayatnecchādyupalakṣayati---yadubhayapakṣasaṃpratipannaṃ nirātmakaṃ ghaṭādi tatsarvamaprāṇādimad dṛṣṭam iti vyatyāsena yojanā /
GSP29nystik_u:7709: anvayivyatirekiṇastadvivekasya ca tantrāntaraprasiddhena nāmnā tantrāntaraprasiddhatāṃ darśayati---so 'yamavīta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7717: gṛhītāvinābhāvo hi hetuḥ sādhyena tasya paricchedakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7718: sa ca dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi hetusādhyadharmayordarśane satyavinābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7721: darśane vā nāvītaḥ kiṃ tu vīta evetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7730: atrāpi yāvannirātmakaṃ tat sarvam aprāṇādimad dṛṣṭamiti vyatyāsena yojanā,
GSP29nystik_u:7734: yadi punarevamucyate nivartatāmaprāmāṇādimattvaṃ jīvaccharīrāt prāṇādimattvasya pramāṇata upalabdhermā nivartiṣṭa nairātmyam, tasmād
GSP29nystik_u:7737: kiṃ jīvaccharīre sādhye nairātmyaniścayād vyabhicāra uta tatsandehāt?
GSP29nystik_u:7750_1: gṛhītvā jīvaccharīre vyāpakasyāprāṇādimattvasya nivṛttyā nairātmyasya vyāpyasya nivṛtterātmā avagantavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7751_0: evaṃ ca sati kalpanākoṣasyāparimeyatvāt yad yadeva kalpyate tattadabhāvasyadhaṭādau
GSP29nystik_u:7757: akṣaṇikatve ca vyavasthite kāryaṃ samavāyikāraṇāpekṣamitīcchādīnāṃ samavāyikāraṇena bhavitavyam,
GSP29nystik_u:7759: śarīrendriyādīnāṃ ca samavāyikāraṇatvaniṣedhe sati yad icchādīnāṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃ pariśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7760: tad dravyamātmeti ca kṣetrajña iti ca jīva iti cākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7761: tadasya viśeṣato 'navagatasyāpīcchādisamavāyikāraṇatayā sāmānyarūpeṇāvadhāritasya śakyaḥ prāṇādirahiteṣu ghaṭādiṣvabhāvaḥ pratipattum /
GSP29nystik_u:7764: so 'yaṃ jīvaccharīre kāryasyābhāvo vyāpako nivartamānaḥ svavyāpyaṃ tatkāraṇābhāvamādāya nivartate iti siddhaṃ jīvaccharīre prāṇakāraṇam, sa cātmeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7770: sa eva svabhāvo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7774: ye 'pi hi nairātmyavādino buddhiṃ vā bhūtapatiṇāmabhedaṃ vā icchādikāraṇamācakṣate,
GSP29nystik_u:7778: so 'yaṃ jīvaccharīre kāryābhāvo vyāvartamānaḥ kāraṇābhāvaṃ vyāvartayati /
GSP29nystik_u:7781: ṛjumārgeṇa sidhyantaṃ ko nu vakreṇa sādhayet
GSP29nystik_u:7790: yathā ca bhūtānāṃ pariṇatibhedo na kāraṇaṃ tathā hi tṛtīye upapādayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7791: vyatirekamukhenāpi prāmādeḥ sātmakatvenānvayasiddhau na kevalavyatirekīti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:7793: kiṃ tu sapakṣābhāvena vidhimukhenāsya pratibandhaṃ nirākurmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7799: sapakṣābhāvastu nairātmyenāpyavyapadeśya iti kathaṃ nairātmyaniṣedhena vyapadiśyatām?
GSP29nystik_u:7807: vipakṣavyatirekamātreṇa vyatirekiṇo gamakatvaṃ matvā codayati---yadi tarhīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7813: nanu mā bhūd gandhavattvaṃ heturvyatireka vyabhicārād anityādivannityādapyasya vyatirekāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7814: tasya tu pakṣa eva kevalaṃ na tu sapakṣavipakṣau,
GSP29nystik_u:7815: na tasaya vyatirekavyabhicāro 'stīti sa kasmāt na heturiti codayati---yaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:7822: yadi hi pakṣaikadeśavṛttirapi vipakṣābhāvāt na vyatirekī hetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7823: tarhi tasya pakṣaikadeśavṛtterapi sato vipakṣanivṛttirasti sa hetuḥ prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:7828: atra ca yena pakṣaikadeśavṛttervyatirekyābhāsasya nirākaraṇaṃ tadavadhāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:7830: asya tu pakṣeṇāpīti vyatirekyapi na hetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7848: tatra pūrvayoḥ prakārayoryathākramamasādhāraṇasya cāsiddhasya ca hetutvaprasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7853: sa cāyaṃ viśeṣe cāviśeṣe ca prasṛta iti vipakṣekadeśavṛtterapi pakṣasapakṣasādhāraṇasya hetutvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7858: viśeṣa evetyavadhāraṇena vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ gaurayaṃ viṣāṇitvāditi hetutvena pratiṣiddhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7860: tathā ca vipakṣādeva yo viśeṣa eva sa hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7861: sapakṣāttu yo viśeṣa eva sa na heturityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7862: yathā ca aśvo 'yaṃ viṣāṇitvāt iti sapakṣād viśeṣa eveti hetutvena pratiṣiddho bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7863: yastu sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnanāntarīyakatvādiḥ sa sapakṣād viśeṣa eva na bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:7867: yadi sapakṣādapi yo viśeṣaḥ sa sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvādirhetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7868: evaṃ sati vipakṣādeveti avadhāraṇaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7870: na vipakṣādevetyetanmātramavadhāryate yena sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnāntarīyakatvādinarna hetuḥ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7871: api tu yo viśeṣa eva sa heturiti prāpte vipakṣādeveti niyamyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7872: tena sāvadhāraṇasya viśeṣasya vipakṣavṛtterhetutvaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati yathā aśvo 'yaṃ viṣāṇītvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7874: tasya hetutve 'pi na vipakṣādeveti bādhitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7875: yadyapi caivaṃ satyapi sapakṣaikadeśavṛtterhetutvaṃ na śrutam,
GSP29nystik_u:7882: pakṣadharmatve sati viśeṣa eva vipakṣādeveti niyame kutaḥ pakṣaikadeśavṛtteḥ prāptiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7903: heturvipakṣād viśeṣa iti ca yadā sautrāntikapakṣamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7904: yadā tvanityatvahetau lakṣye lakṣaṇaṃ vicāryate iti vipakṣaśabdārtho vācyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7905: nanu ca nityo vipakṣa ityata āha---na hyasatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7907: na cāsyāpādānatvaṃ nāpyadhikaraṇatvaṃ yena pañcamī vā saptamī vā prayujyeteti āha---na cāsatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7908: na cāsato vipakṣād vyāvṛttyabhāvena viśeṣo 'pītyāha---vipakṣāsaṃbhave ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7911: pakṣasyaiva dharma iti hetulakṣaṇe asādhāraṇa eva hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7912: samāna eva siddha iti tu hetulakṣaṇe aśvasya viṣāṇitve sādhye gotvādirhetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7914: tathā ca pakṣasya dharmaḥ samāne ca siddhaḥ ityatra savyabhicāro hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7915: pakṣasya dharmo vipakṣe ca nāstītyatrāsādhāraṇo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7916: samāne ca siddho vipakṣe ca nāstītyatra anityaḥ paramāṇuḥ kṛtakatvāditi hetuḥ syāditi trayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7919: atra dignāgena sapakṣe sannasan dvedhā pakṣadharmaḥ punastridhā /
GSP29nystik_u:7921: iti nava pakṣadharmān hetutadābhāsān darśayitvā tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvedhā cāsaṃstadatyaye /
GSP29nystik_u:7925: yaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ sa sapakṣe san asan dvedhā iti trividhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7926: sa punarasapakṣe sadasaddvividhatvataḥ pratyekaṃ tridhā bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7937: tadeteṣu hetutadābhāseṣu heturnirdhārito yena tadupanyasya vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭe---tatra ya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7939: tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvedhā cāsaṃstadatyaye ityetāvanmātrāt na labhyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7952: hetuhetvābhāsāveva pakṣadharmau nānya iti niyamajñāpanārthamavadhāraṇamiṣṭaṃ bhavadbhirityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7961: yadyavadhāraṇaṃ yujyeta avadhāraṇārtho yukta ārambhaḥ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7964: pakṣasya dharma eva ityetasmin pada ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7969: sajātīye dvedhā ceti padopādāne cānupādāne cetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7970: sajātīya eva dvidhetyanenaiveti hetutadābhāsayorautsargike pakṣadharmatve sthita ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7971: śaṅkate---atha mā bhūditi sajātīya eva dvidheti nāvadhāraṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7978: yadi ca tadatyaya eveti nāvadhāryeta tato 'naikāntiko 'pi hetuḥ syāditi doṣaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7985: tadaṃśena vyāpta ityasya vivaraṇālocanena sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣācca vyāvṛttirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7996: yastu tādṛśavinābhāvīti vipakṣe sattāpratiṣedhāt sapakṣe sattvaṃ gamyate eva,
GSP29nystik_u:8003: vauddhānāṃ rūpatvādijāternityāyā abhāvād na cākṣuṣatvamanityatvena vinā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8005: tathā copadarśanapadena pakṣe hetoḥ sattopadarśanaṃ bhavatīti taṃ pratyupetyāha---upetya veti /
GSP29nystik_u:8009: prayatnanāntarīyakatvaṃ prayatnakāraṇakatvaṃ tat sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā?
GSP29nystik_u:8018: yat tāvadupalabdhikarma tatsarvaṃ prayatnādeva puruṣavyāpādādevopalabhyate nānyathetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8031: prāyeṇa tasya tatra tatra sulabhatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8036: na hi bhavatāmasmākamiva viśeṣātiriktamasti sāmānyaṃ vastu sad yo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8037: na ca kalpanāropitaṃ hetuḥ samyagjñānasya bhavitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:8045: yasya tu janmaiva nāsti tasya tadviśeṣaṇaṃ dūrotsāritamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8048: tasyāpi hi prāgasataḥ savakāraṇena samavāya iti janma nāstīti na tadviśeṣaṇayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8057: dṛṣṭānto 'rtharūpo nodāharaṇasya vacanātmakasya svarūpato lakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8058: tasmāt svābhidhāyakavacanopalakṣakatvena lakṣaṇatvaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca bhajata ityabhisandhinoktam---udāharaṇopalakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8059: anena ca samānajātīyebhyaḥ pratijñādibhyaḥ asamānajātīyebhyaśca pramāṇādibhya udāharaṇaṃ vyavacchinnaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8065: kaddhyanityatvena sādhye ca śabde dṛṣṭānte ca sthālpādau samānam /
GSP29nystik_u:8067: taddharmabhāvī tasyaiva sādhyasya śabdasya yo dharmo dharmāntaram,
GSP29nystik_u:8074: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sūtrapadaṃ vyācakṣāṇa eva phalato bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---sādhyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8085: avadhāraṇadvayayoginaḥ sādhyasādharmyād dṛṣṭānto 'vaśyameva taddharmabhāvī bhavatīti gatārthaṃ taddharmabhāvītyetaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8087: yathā nitye śabde sādhye amūrtatvādeḥ sādhyena śabdena karmaṇaḥ sādharmyāt karma na taddharmabhāvi bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8092: atra ca sādhyasādharmyagrahaṇena sādhanavikalamanudāharaṇaṃ bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8098: pañcamyupādānena ca sādhyasādharmyaprayuktaṃ taddharmabhāvitvaṃ yatra vacane pradarśyate tadevodāharaṇaṃ nānyaditi darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8099: prayojakatvaṃ ca sādhyasādharmyasya hetoḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho vyāpyatvamiti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:8104: yo yo 'nityaḥ sa sarva utpattimān yathā ghaṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8105: samākhyānirvacanasāmarthyāt sāmānyalakṣaṇamapyanena sūcitamityāśayavatā bhāṣyakṛtā samākhyāyā niruktiḥ kṛtā /
GSP29nystik_u:8115: tadetad bhāṣyam anubhāṣya vyācaṣṭe---tasya dharma iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8116: tasya dharmastaddharma iti hi dharmasya saṃbandhitvena pṛthagvacanam /
GSP29nystik_u:8120: anena bhāṣyakārīyāmanupapattimuktvā vārttikakāraḥ svakīyāmapyāha---dharme ca sādhya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8132: anuvṛttena pūrayitvā savyākhyānaṃ sūtraṃ paṭhati---sādhyavaidharmyādataddharmabhāvī ca dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8133: sātmakatayā sādhyena jīvaccharīreṇa vaidhamyād ghaṭāderdṛṣṭāntasya sātmakatvasādharmyavirahāditi yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:8134: yasya sādhyasya jīvaccharīrasya dharmaḥ prāṇādimattvaṃ taddharmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8149: tatra tatpūrvakatvād vaidharmyapratīteḥ ṛjumārgeṇa sidhyato 'rthasya vakreṇa sādhanāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8152: anyathā sapakṣaikadeśavartī na hetuḥ syāditi manyamāno vārtikakāra āha---udāharaṇamavītahetāviti /
GSP29nystik_u:8154: atra ācāryadeśīyāṇām anārṣasūtrapāṭhadūṣaṇaṃ nāsmākamārṣasūtrapāṭhe 'stiti pratipipādayiṣurācāryadeśīyānāṃ pāṭhamabhiprāyaṃ cāha---anye tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:8168: na ca jñāpanādanyā kriyā saṃbhavatīti gamakatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:8171: anye tu taddharmabhāvītyetad vikalpya dūṣayantītyāha---anye tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:8174: tasmāt na kiñcidetat taddharmaṃ bhāvayituṃ śīlamasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8178: tadidaṃ pareṣāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ daṇḍinyāyamālambya pariharati---na vaktavyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8182: sā ca bahuvrīhiṇai labhyata iti kṛtamatreninetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8185: atra ca vasubandhunā pratijñādayastrayo 'vayavā durvihitā akṣapādalakṣaṇenetyuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:8187: tadevamudāharaṇalakṣaṇamupapādya pareṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasya vyācaṣṭe---yathā siddha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8188: yathā ca sa eva sādhyo viśiṣṭaḥ pratyayabhedabheditveneti,
GSP29nystik_u:8192: prāgabhāvo hi sthālyāḥ kṛtakatvaṃ pradhvaṃsābhāvaścānityatā rāddhānte bauddhānām /
GSP29nystik_u:8198: asmadrāddhānte tu yathā tayoḥ sthālyādau saṃbhavaḥ tathoktaṃ hetulakṣaṇasūtra iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8201: NyS_1,1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8202_0: svapratipattau vyāptismaraṇānantaraṃ tathā cāyaṃ na tatheti vā parāmarśajñānotpādādudāharaṇavacanasya
GSP29nystik_u:8214: tathā cānupapannaḥ sādhyasyopasaṃhāra ityata uktam---sādhyasya śabdasyotpattidharmakatvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8217: tathā na tatheti sāmānyalakṣaṇāpekṣe viśeṣalakṣaṇe iti bodhyavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:8218: atra kecit āhuḥ hetuvacanādeva sodāharaṇāt sādhyasiddherasādhanāṅgamupanaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8221: tadanena vyutpannāvyutpannatayā pareṣāmaniyatapratipattisādhanatvāt svapratipattyanusāreṇa pare bodhayitavyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8231: tathāpi tannāsiddhaṃ tatra sādhanatvena vyavatiṣṭhata iti svasiddhimākṣipati sāmarthyāditi bhāva /
GSP29nystik_u:8233: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti śābdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8236_0: asyāpi sādhanasāmarthyādākṣepāt avyāptasya sādhanatvāyogāt tadvidhasyāpi prameyatvādeḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8240: sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa dvividhānāmapi hetūdāharaṇopanayānāṃ samānaṃ nigamanalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8242: hetvapadeśāt taddhetukam anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyā punarvacanam /
GSP29nystik_u:8246: tasyaiva nigamane siddhatvamityavasthāvantamekamāśritya samānaviṣayatayā nigamanaṃ pratijñetyupacaryate /
GSP29nystik_u:8251: atra prathamasūtravadeva yathāsvamavayaveṣu pramāṇānāṃ paramanyāyaṃ stotuṃ saṃbhavamāha---avayavasamudāye ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:8263: sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratibandhaṃ saṃdṛśya samyag dṛṣṭvā liṅgasya pratīteḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8265: tathāpi tadekadeśe madhyame 'pi liṅgadarśane samudāyopacārādanumānavyapadeśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8267: kasmāt? dṛṣṭena udāharaṇe pratibandhena adṛṣṭasya sādhyadharmiṇyanumeyasya siddheḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8271: pratijñādīnāmupanayāntānāmeko 'rthaḥ svabhāvapratibaddhaṃ liṅgaṃ vā anumeyaṃ vā,
GSP29nystik_u:8281: taduttarakālaṃ hi sādhanākāṅkṣāyāṃ pratijñāmāśritya hetupadaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8287: avayavānāṃ prātisvikaṃ prayojanamuktamapi śiṣyahitatayā bhāṣyakāraḥ pratipādayati---atheti /
GSP29nystik_u:8290: vyavasthāpite tu na jāteravasara ityāha---vyavasthite hīti //
GSP29nystik_u:8293: tanmatam apākartuṃ vārttikakāraḥ saprayojanaṃ nigamanaṃ darśayati---pratijñāviṣayasyārthasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8294: caturbhiḥ khalvavayavairhetostrīṇi rūpāṇi dve vā pratipādite,
GSP29nystik_u:8296: pañcasaṃ vā caturṣu vā rūpeṣu hetoravinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8300: so 'yaṃ pratijñāviṣayārthasya aśeṣapramāṇamūlāvayavopapattau satyāṃ pratijñeyasyārthasya siddhatayā punarvacanena nigamanena pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8306: yathā ca trairūpyātiriktametadrūpadvayaṃ tathopapāditam asmābhiḥ prathamasūtre /
GSP29nystik_u:8308: etasmin sūtrārthe parasya pratijñāyāṃ nigamanaṃ gatārthaṃ manyamānasya avakāśo nāstīti //
GSP29nystik_u:8309: yastu manyeta na hetoravinābhāvasiddhimantareṇa siddhanirdeśo nigamanaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8332: yacca paraiḥ upanaye dūṣaṇaṃ vikalpyābhyadhāyi tat tāvadupanyasyati---yadapi yathā tatheti /
GSP29nystik_u:8339: tasmāt sāmānyapratiṣedhe viśeṣapratiṣedhe ca kṛtakatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ pariśiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8341: tathā ca na hetorvyatireka upanayaḥ syādityāha---pariśeṣāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:8347: sādhye śabde sādhanasya kṛtakatvasya sthālīgatasya yaḥ sarvathābhāvaḥ sthālītvādyekārthasamavāyaḥ tamāśritya na pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8348: tathā ca śabdasthālyoḥ abhedaprasaṅgād yathā tathetyeva na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8352: tathā ca na hetoratireka ityuktamityata āha---kṛtakatvasāmānyaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:8353: na hi jātu śāvaleyasannidhau gotvasāmānyamātraṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8360: vyāptipradarśanaviṣayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāvyāptikasya hetoḥ sādhyadharmiṇyupasaṃhāra upanaya iti mahān bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8361: etena nigamanaṃ pratijñāyāḥ samānābhidheyatve 'pi pratijñārthatvena pratyuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:8364: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa ekasminnanvayavyatirekiṇyeva vītāvītavākye pañcāvayave udāhṛte /
GSP29nystik_u:8365: tatra kadācid bhrāntiḥ syādekodāharaṇatayā dve api vākye parasparāpekṣe eveti,
GSP29nystik_u:8373: //40// tarkapravṛttikramamāha---avijñāyamānatattve 'rthe iti yadyapi saṃśayasya paścādeva jijñāsā bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8377: tarkeṇa hi prasaṅgāparanāmnā dvayoḥ pakṣayorekataraniṣedhenaikataraḥ pramāṇaviṣayatayā abhyanujñātavya iti viṣayapratyāsattyā tarkapravṛttiṃ pratyaṅgatā saṃśayasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8385: yasmin viṣaye pramāṇaṃ pravartitumudyataṃ tadviparyayāśaṅkāyāṃ na tāvat pramāṇaṃ pravartate,
GSP29nystik_u:8387: tadapanaya eva ca svaviṣaye pramāṇasaṃbhava iti copapattiriti vyākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8388: tayā pramāṇasyopapattyā itikartavyatayā pramāṇaviṣayamabhyanujānatyā viśodhite viṣaye pramāṇāmapratyūhaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8389: na copapattirevāstu niścayahetuḥ kṛtaṃ pramāṇeneti vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:8393: svakṛtasya karmaṇa ityādinā pūrvasya kāraṇamityantena saṃsāro darśitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8395_0: tena saṃsārāpavargāvicchantau vādiprativādinau prati ātmanityatvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:8395_1: pravartamānamanena tarkeṇānugṛhyata iti pramāṇaviṣayaviparyayānanujñaiva ca pramāṇaviṣayābhyanujñā,
GSP29nystik_u:8397: ata evānte bhāṣyakāra upasaṃjahāra---yatra kāraṇam anupapadyamānaṃ paśyati,
GSP29nystik_u:8401: kathaṃ punarayaṃ tattvajñānārtho na tu tattvajñānameveteti deśayati---kathaṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:8408: hanta bhoḥ kimarthaṃ tarhi vāde pramāṇatarkasādhanetyuktamityata āha---so 'yaṃ tarka iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8415: tathāpi na kāraṇopapattita iti tayorvyavaccheda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8428: na tvatra hetuḥ abhidhīyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8431: jñeyena hi jñānaṃ nirūpyate na jñātrā,
GSP29nystik_u:8436: nādyāpi anena svābhiprāyo darśita iti mattvā punaścodayati---anukte 'pīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8439: sāmarthyaprāptasyānabhidhāne 'tiprasaṅga iti na sāmarthyamāśritya lakṣaṇe saṃśayo nirākaraṇīya iti tannirākaraṇārthamarthagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:8441: na hi tattve jñāte tattvajñānārthitā bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8447: yadyapi nāsmākaṃ rāddhānte śuśrūṣādayo buddhidharmā buddhitattvasyaivābhāvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8452: tato vijñāte 'pi tattve ya ūhaḥ pūrvānubhūtaparicchedātmā jāyate punastattvajñānārthaṃ so 'pi tarkaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8456: tathā hi adhigataparicchedātmāpyūhaḥ kāraṇasyopapattyā saṃbhavena jāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:8459: tathā ca sati pramāṇamapi tarkaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8470: nityatvādayo viśeṣāḥ samavāyino vahnyādayaśca dhūmādisaṃyogina iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8474: anye tvanumānameva yuktyapekṣaṃ viparyaye 'niṣṭaprasaṅgāpekṣaṃ tarka iti varṇayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:8478: viśeṣadarśanāditi viśeṣadarśanāt niścayaḥ pramāṇena bhavati na tarkeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:8482: tarhi tasya svarūpaṃ vaktavyamiti pṛcchati---kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:8494: nanu yadeva kiścit svaviṣayādhigame anumānamapekṣate saivāpekṣaṇīyā yuktiranumānasya bhaviṣyatītyata āha---svaviṣayadhigame ceti //
GSP29nystik_u:8503: anumānabhedasya cedṛśasya pramāṇa evāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8510: yuktaṃ vyatirekiṇi jīvaccharīre dharmiṇi prāṇādimattvasya sādhanadharmasya darśanāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8512: na saṃsārāpavargāvupapatsyetāmityatrātmani dharmiṇi sādhanadharma utpattirasti yaddarśanataḥ saṃskārodbodhe sati liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhasmṛtirbhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8522_1: nirṇayabhedalakṣaṇamiti nāvyāpakaṃ tatra tallakṣaṇamiti darśayituṃ bhāṣyakāro nirṇayalakṣaṇamavatārayati---etasmiśca tarkaviṣaye //
GSP29nystik_u:8523_0: vimṛ---yaḥ //42 // atra pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ karmatayā na nirṇayasādhanatvamityanupapattyā
GSP29nystik_u:8523_1: sādhanopālambhau vādasūtragatau lakṣaṇīyaviti tāveva tāvad bhāṣyakṛd vibhajate---sthāpanā sādhanam,
GSP29nystik_u:8533: tasya sādhanasya vā upālambhasya vā yo 'rthaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣo vā tasyāvadhāraṇamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8534: atra pakṣapratipakṣaprayogād vāde saṃśayo 'stīti vādabhrāntyā codayati---nedamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8537: dvitīyasya prativādinaḥ pratiṣiddhaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ vādyuktasya hetordūṣaṇamiti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:8539: dvitīyena tu prativādinā vādyuktasya hetoḥ sthāpanāhetutvaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8541: sa vādino vā prativādino vā heturvopālambho vā nivartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8546: na tāvat saṃśayaviṣaye nirṇaye vādiprativādinau staḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8549: vādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavaḥ prativādina upālambhasya asaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8550: evaṃ prativādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavo vādina upālambhasyāsaṃbhava iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8557: na nirṇayamātrasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamapi tu parīkṣāviṣayasyetyāha---na cāyaṃ nirṇaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8560: na hi jyotiṣṭomādīnāṃ svargādisaṃbandhanirṇaye āgamena kartavye vimarśo 'sti,
GSP29nystik_u:8568: nanu bhavatu pakṣaśabdalakṣitasya sādhanasya nirṇayaṃ prati karaṇatvam,
GSP29nystik_u:8569: pratipakṣalakṣitasya tu taddūṣaṇasya na sākṣātsādhakatvamityata āha---pratipakṣācceti hetutvaṃ pāramparyeṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8574: tadā hi yata evakāraḥ tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇamiti nirṇaye niyamo bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:8580: tasmin vikalpe nirṇayaḥ pakṣapratipakṣavimarśātilaṅghanenānyatra na pravartata iti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ nirṇayaphalaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8582: nāpi vimarśa iti pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8586: tadā nirṇayasyāniyamāt pakṣapratipakṣau ca tadabhāvaśceti tadubhayam,
GSP29nystik_u:8592: na nirṇaya iti na nirṇayamātra ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8596: pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmeva vāde nirṇayo na tu vimarśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8597: śāstre tu nirṇaya eva na tu tatra śāstrātiriktaṃ sādhanāntaramāśrīyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8599: lakṣaṇāyāṃ hi yena yat lakṣyate tadavacchedakatayā tadapi buddhau sannidhīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8615: kadācit prathame kadācid dvitīye kadācit tṛtīye ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8619: taṃ nivartyaṃ vādinaḥ sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇena nivartya prativādī svapakṣe sādhanaṃ bravīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8631: na ca phale pramitirūpe nirṇaye pramākaraṇatvaṃ phalatve nāstīti nānumānatvaṃ tadviśeṣa
GSP29nystik_u:8633: itaścānumānāt nirṇayo bhidyate ityāha--nirṇayaḥ svaviṣaya eveti na hi nirṇayo nirṇayatvena pratipattyanubandhibhūtād viṣayādanyatra,
GSP29nystik_u:8636: yadā tu dhūmajñānenāgniranumīyate tadānyatra ceti gamayitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:8640: NyS_1,2.1: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapannaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8643: uddeśakramaprāptaṃ vādalakṣaṇaparaṃ sūtram avatārayituṃ bhāṣyam---tisraḥ kathā bhavantīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8647: vādādayaśca kathāviśeṣā ityata āha vārttikakāraḥ---tisraḥ kathā bhavantīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8650: api tu yannānāpravaktṛke vicāre vasati tad vicāravastu /
GSP29nystik_u:8652: tasyāḥ kathāyā eṣa niyamaḥ tisra eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:8653: tathā ca nānāpravaktṛkavicāraviṣayā vākyasaṃdṛbdhiḥ katheti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraha
GSP29nystik_u:8673: tathāpi na pramāṇamūlairavayavaistarkeṇa ca sādhanopālambhāviti jalpavitaṇḍabhyāṃ pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhagrahaṇena vyavacchedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8677: tarkasyetikarttavyatārūpasya pramāṇānugrāhakatayā pramāṇamūlā avayavāstarkamūlā api bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:8678: tathā ca tarkasyāpi sādhanopālambhahetubhāvaḥ siddho bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8694: dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣo vā karma,
GSP29nystik_u:8696: tasya dharmiṇo vāstavaṃ tādṛśatvamatādṛśatvaṃ vā karaṇasya tu karmaiva viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8702: yathā ākāśe niśātamasiṃ vyāpārayataḥ puruṣasyāparādho nākāśasya śabde samarthasya,
GSP29nystik_u:8707: vacana upacaryate na tu pakṣe pakṣadvāreṇānudbhāvanāditi siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:8708: yathāyamarthaḥ sūtrapadebhyo labhyate tathā praśnapūrvakaṃ darśayati---kathaṃ punariti //
GSP29nystik_u:8719: tarkānugṛhītapramāṇamūlā avayavāḥ paramārthato bhavantu mā bhūvan,
GSP29nystik_u:8725: yathā cāsya śāstre vyutpādanaṃ nāsadṛśaṃ yathā caiṣa satāmācāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8730: upālambhagrahaṇādeva vāde 'pi nigrahasthānasya labdhatvādityata āha vārttikakāraḥ---chalajātīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8735: hanta bho na jalpād vādasya viśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8744: bhāṣyamate dūṣite pṛṣṭvā svamatena vyācaṣṭe---atha kimidaṃ padamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8748: adhikaṃ tu na yadyapi tattvapratipattiṃ sākṣād
GSP29nystik_u:8749: vyāhanti, tathāpi tatprayojanānusaraṇe paraḥ pratipattā samākulitabuddhirna tattvaṃ pratipattumarhatītyadhikasyāpi tattvapratipattividhātahetutvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8757: pāramārthikāt tarkasahitāt pramāṇādekasmin viṣaye sādhanopālambhayoḥ saṃbhave viruddhadharmasamāliṅgitamekadā vastu prasajyata
GSP29nystik_u:8760: vāde 'bhiprāyo niyamyate vādiprativādinoḥ prāmāṇikadhiyā sādhanopālambhau tābhyāṃ prayoktavyau,
GSP29nystik_u:8764: tathā ca vāde abuddhipūrvaṃ chalādiprayoge tadudbhāvanamapi saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8771_0: na hi pañcāvayavopapannatvaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca tadanugrāhakaṃ ca tarkamantareṇa bhavatīti
GSP29nystik_u:8772: anyathaikaḥ svasthānasthita eva śabdasyānityatvaṃ prati pañcāvayavopapannaṃ vākyaṃ prayuṅkte,
GSP29nystik_u:8773: aparo 'pi tādṛśaḥ śabdanityatā prati tādṛśameva vākyaṃ prayuṅkte iti so 'pi vādaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:8785: jalpagataśca nigraho na vāda iti sa mā vijñāyati /
GSP29nystik_u:8789: tadevaṃ svābhimataṃ vādalakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyāya vāsubandhavaṃ lakṣaṇa dūṣayitumupanyasyati---apare tviti svapakṣasya siddhiḥ parapakṣasya cāsiddhiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8795: ekasya vā śabdasya dharmino 'nekanityānityaviśeṣaṇābhisaṃbandhinaḥ puruṣābhisandhibhedāt anekaśabdābhidhānam,
GSP29nystik_u:8799: tāvad bhūmidhanādiṣviva svocitāsu arthakriyāsu yatheṣṭaviniyogayogyatvaṃ svatvamarjanāpāditamanityatvādinā pratijñāte śabdādau saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8806: api copakārakatvena vyāptaṃ satvaṃ goghaṭādiṣu tathā darśanāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8807: pakṣāt nivartamānamupakārakatvaṃ svatvamapi svavpāpyaṃ nivartayati vṛkṣatvamiva śiṃśapātvamityāha---yacca yasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8811: api cedaṃ viśeṣaṇapadaṃ viśeṣyaṃ sāmānyataḥ prasṛtaṃ viśeṣe 'vasthāpayati na vā?
GSP29nystik_u:8817: tataśca śaknoti samānamarthaṃ vaktumiti codayati---sāmānyaśabdā apīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8820: varuddhopadarśanena sphuṭā pratītirbhavatīti ayuktapratipādanārthaṃ yuktasyāpyupanyāsa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8821: yadi na pakṣeṇa dūṣaṇaṃ saṃbadhyate kastarhi tasya viṣaya iti śaṅkate---atha dūṣaṇasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8834: lakṣaṇe tato varamevaṃ kriyatāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ lāghavāyetyāha---yadi ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:8848: iti sūtre hi niyameva svapakṣe sādhanaṃ parapakṣe dūṣaṇamuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:8853: api cāyuktasya pūrvapakṣasya sādhaṇaṃ yuktasya cottarapakṣasya dūṣaṇamiti viparītaprasaṅga
GSP29nystik_u:8863: na kevalaṃ viśeṣyāt pṛthak svārtho viśeṣaṇaṃ nāvadhāryate,
GSP29nystik_u:8866: na kevalaṃ patyurviśeṣyāt senā na bhidyate 'pi tu tato 'nyebhyo 'pi hāstikāśvīyarathapadātibhya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8871: uktaṃ nismṛtya śaṅkatī---atha manyase svārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8875: api ca svaḥ pakṣo yasya sādhayituḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8882: api ca pakṣāt svapakṣabhede sūtrāntaravyāghāto 'bhede vā etasya vyāghāta
GSP29nystik_u:8884: api ca vākyasamāsayoḥ samāso jyāyān lāghavādityāha---āstāṃ tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:8886: siddhyasiddhyarthamityayaṃ samāsaḥ svaparapakṣayoḥ pratyekaṃ na saṃbandhārtha ityarthāt kasyacit siddhiḥ kasyacidasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8891: anityatve 'pi samāsavidheḥ samāsa eva vigrahāt jyāyāniti codyasamādhānābhyāṃ darśayati---anitya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8896: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /
GSP29nystik_u:8898: iti atarthakaprayogaścānapekṣitaḥ śiṣyairiti teṣāmaśāsanāt na śāstraṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8910: na tāvat jñānaṃ pakṣaviṣayaṃ prāśnikādhikaraṇaṃ ceti bauddharāddhānte saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8920: yasmāt so 'rthastathā bhavati tasmāt tathābhāvādadhikaraṇapratyāyanaṃ bhavatīti dvitīyaṃ kalpamāśaṅkate---athāsiddha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8921: yāvat pakṣaviṣayaṃ sādhanaṃ na prayujyate tāvadyadyadhikaraṇapratyāyanaṃ tataḥ sādhanaprayogāt prāgadhikaraṇapratyāyanamastīti vādavaiyarthaṃ sādhanadūṣaṇaprayogo 'narthakaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8927: mañcasthāḥ krośantīti vaktavye vināpi prayojanaṃ mañcāḥ krośantītyupacāro dṛṣṭa ityata
GSP29nystik_u:8930: nanvihāpi vināpi prayojanaṃ pramāṇāsaṃbhavamātreṇopacāro mañcāḥ krośantītivadbhaviṣyatītyata āda---lokaprayukteti lokaprayuktaśabdārthavat /
GSP29nystik_u:8931: upacāro 'pi laukiko na prayojanābhāvena śakyo 'pavadituṃ na lokaḥ paryanuyojyo yataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8932: idānīntanastu asmadādiprayogaḥ prayojanābhāve na śakyaḥ paryanuyoktumityāśayenāha---na cedaṃ laukikamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:8939: yataḥ tayoḥ pakṣadharmatvāt etadbhavati siddhaḥ pakṣo 'siddhaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:8942: naiva draṣṭrādhāratā jñānasya viṣayatā ca bauddharāddhānte saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8944: asti khalvālayajñānaṃ yadupāśritya ṣaḍapi pravṛttijñānāni jāyante /
GSP29nystik_u:8957: punaḥ śaṅkate---atha tathātathāne iti pramāṇayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8963: tathāpi prameyasya prādhānyāt tatraivābhidhānapratyayāviti prameyadharmāvucyete vyaktyavyaktī,
GSP29nystik_u:8968: iha sūtre dhananimittādivacanatārthaśabdasya na saṃbhavatīti trayamavaśiṣyata iti tredhā pravartata ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:8969: sādhanaṃ sādhanābhāso dūṣaṇaṃ dūṣaṇābhāsa iti caturvidhaṃ vākyam /
GSP29nystik_u:8972: granthāntare yuktāyuktatvena viśeṣaṇāt caturvidhavākyasaṃgrahārtho hyuddeśe arthaśabdo vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8973: na ca yuktāyuktatvaviśeṣaṇe caturvidhavākyasaṃgraho bhavati sādhanābhāsasaṃbandhinaḥ pakṣasya yuktatvābhāvāt dūṣaṇābhāsaṃbandhinaśca pratipakṣasyāyuktatvābhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8974: atha na sādhanādiyogo 'pi tu sādhyadharma eva sādhanānapekṣo yuktāyuktatvamiti śaṅkate---atha punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:8981: tathāpi karma karaṇaṃ na saṃbhavatīti vyāghāta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8986: na hi vahniriti gṛhītaḥ khadyoto dahati pacati vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8996: na hi siddhirdhanaṃ vā svaparapakṣayoḥ sādhanaṃ vā nivṛttirvā saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9005: avācakapadaprayogāt sādhanadūṣaṇābhāsavādinaśca vāditvena lokasiddhasyāvāditvāpādanāt siddhyasiddhiśabdayośca vādatvāpādanārthatvādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:9010: pakṣavyatirekeṇaṃ pakṣādhāraṃ sādhyaṃ jñānamanyad vā siddhiśabdābhidheyaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:9012: pakṣasya tu bhavet kenacit saṃbandhena yādṛśatādṛśenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9017: api ca yuktāyuktārthābhyāmabhede sādhanadūṣaṇapadamanarthakaṃ te ityanenaiva yuktāyuktatvāvamarṣiṇā gatārthatvādityāha---yuktāyuktatvaśabdābhyāṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:9021: sādhanadūṣaṇe ca viśeṣa iti śaṅkate---atha manyase iti /
GSP29nystik_u:9025: na khalu yogo nāma bauddhānāṃ sādhyasādhanavṛttirdūṣyadūṣaṇavṛttirvā kaścidastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9026: api ca sāṃvṛto 'pi yogaḥ sādhyasādhanajñānādhīnanirūpaṇatayā nānirūpite sādhye nirūpito bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:9027: nirūpaṇaṃ ca nirṇaya iti yoganirūpaṇāt prāk sādhyanirṇayāt kṛtaṃ yoganirūpaṇena sādhyanirṇayārtheneti /
GSP29nystik_u:9032: yuktāyuktatvenādhikaraṇapratyāyanamiti yuktāyuktatvayoḥ karaṇatvaṃ darśitam tat tathātvātathātvapakṣe na saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:9035: na tu vyavacchedasya paricchedasya sādhane iti //
GSP29nystik_u:9045: na khalvādhyātmikaśaktisaṃpannaḥ samāhitaḥ samagre sādhanaprayoge sati santamarthaṃ na pratipadyata iti saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9053: na cāyamunajñāniṣedho na pratipadyate iti vāde vītarāgakathātvena jigīṣāyā abhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9060: vādasya jalpavitaṇḍābhyāmabhedam abhipretya codayati---yadā tu nāyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:9069: sūtroktaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vṛttau āha---tadarthaṃ vacanaṃ siddhyasiddhyarthamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9072: prāśnikā eva tāvad vāde na santi,
GSP29nystik_u:9082: mā bhūd gardabho 'pi dhūmasya kāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9083: codayati, yadi prāśnikā na santi tadvāda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:9084: tayorvādiprativādinorvādasya parīkṣā kā kasya ca tayorvādasya kva ca,
GSP29nystik_u:9087: vītarāgau hi vādiprativādināveva vādasvarūpajñānaṃ ca tatparīkṣāṃ ca kartuṃ śaknutaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9092: tadarthaṃ parīkṣārthaṃ tasmin vāde 'dhikāro vītarāgayoreva vādiprativādinoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9094: tasmāt saptamyartho 'dhikaraṇārthaḥ parābhimataḥ prāśnika iti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:9096: yadapi vṛttau coditaṃ yadi siddhyasiddhyarthaṃ vacanaṃ vādaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9097: tataḥ prāśnikaprativādinoḥ priyāpriyavacasi rathyāvāde prasaṅga iti tadapyatinirbījamityāha---yadapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:9098: na hi priyāpriyavacasaḥ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā siddhyasiddhyarthatā,
GSP29nystik_u:9111: seyaṃ sūkṣmekṣikā parairiha kṛteti tadanubandhena vārttikakṛtāpi kṛteti//1 //
GSP29nystik_u:9115: atrāpi samānajātīyābhyāṃ vādavitaṇḍābhyāmasamānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇādibhyo vyavacchedo jalpasya sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9126: api tu tadarthe pratīte tasyānyataḥ siddhau satyāṃ gamyata iti pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambha ityetadatidiśyata
GSP29nystik_u:9128: tena pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambha pañcāvayavopapannaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraha ityetasya vādapadavarjaṃ samastasya lakṣaṇasyātideśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9137: yathā gobhiryukto ratho goratha iti yuktapadalopa
GSP29nystik_u:9140: iha vādalakṣaṇaṃ paṭhatā bhāṣyakāreṇa niyamo 'pyatidiṣṭa iti manvānaścodayati---bhāṣyam
GSP29nystik_u:9146: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa chalādīnāṃ niṣedhārthatayā sādhanāṅgabhāvamākṣipya parapakṣavighātena svapakṣarakṣaṇādaṅgabhāva
GSP29nystik_u:9155: na hi sahasreṇāpyandhaiḥ pāṭaccarebhyo gṛhaṃ rakṣyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:9159: tathāpi teṣāṃ tattvam avidvān ebhirahaṃ sādhanaṃ vihaniṣyāmītyanayā buddhyā upahṛtaḥ vyāmohitaḥ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:9161: yatra tveṣāṃ tattvaṃ vidvān pravartate, na sa vādaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9164: nanu jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ prayogāt sādhanamaṅgaṃ vā syādata
GSP29nystik_u:9169: sādhusādhanopādāne ca vādinā kṛte pareṇa prativādinā jigīṣuṇākulitabuddhirdrāk pāramārthikamuttaramapratipadyamānaścchalādīni prayuṅkte /
GSP29nystik_u:9184: pūrvavādipakṣāpekṣayā prativādina ātmīya eva pakṣaḥ pratipakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9191: tayorekataraṃ prativādī ātmīyaṃ pakṣaṃ na sthāyapatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:9201: prathamapakṣavādino hi sthāpanāyā abhāve kiṃ vaitaṇḍika
GSP29nystik_u:9202: āhanti? na ca pakṣaḥ śakya āhantum /
GSP29nystik_u:9203: tasmāt prathamapakṣavādino 'sti sthāpaneti dvitīya eva pakṣaḥ sthāpanāhīna iti samārthyād yuktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:9209: vaitaṇḍiko 'pi hi vādī pāriśeṣyāt matpakṣaḥ setsyatīti buddhyā svapakṣamasthāpayan parapakṣasthāpanāmāhanti /
GSP29nystik_u:9210: tasmāt parapakṣapratiṣedhalakṣaṇaṃ vākyam asya pakṣaḥ parapakṣaniṣedhena pāriśeṣyāt pakṣasiddhihetutvādupacārataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9221: na tāvadasthāpyamānasyāpi sthāpanārhatālakṣaṇā pakṣatā na yujyate,
GSP29nystik_u:9224: tathā ca caturvargābhyupagame virodho 'nabhyupagame vā nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka iti prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9226: yastu manyate caturvargābhyupagame 'pi dūṣaṇamātraṃ vitaṇḍetyeva vaktavyaṃ lāghavāyeti,
GSP29nystik_u:9230: tadanenārthato yad vai khalvityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam //3 //
GSP29nystik_u:9233: uddeśakramānurodhena vitaṇḍānantaraṃ hetvābhāsesu lakṣayitavyeṣu arthākṣiptasāmānyalakṣaṇameṣāṃ vibhāgoddeśaparaṃ sūtram---savya--sāḥ // 4 //
GSP29nystik_u:9234: tadvyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ samākhyāniruktivaśena sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayan vārttikāraḥ paṭhati---hetulakṣaṇābhāvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:9237: mā bhūt sarvasya sarveṇa sādṛśyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9249: catuḥṣaṣṭidvitayamaṣṭāviṃśaṃ śataṃ pūrvayā triṣoḍaśyā saha ṣaṭsaptaṃ śatam /
GSP29nystik_u:9264: yadi bāhyakaraṇapratyakṣe vāṅmanase iti sādhyeta tadā nānityatvaṃ sapakṣavyāpakaṃ syāt, sāmānye
GSP29nystik_u:9269: tajjātīyaikadeśavṛttitvamamūrtatvasya darśayituṃ yatra na vartate tatpuraḥsaramudāharaṇaṃ rūpādivaditi //
GSP29nystik_u:9289_0: vyāpakāvyāpakabhedena tu dviṣoḍaśī yadā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāsiddhyā cobhayasaṃpratipannayā
GSP29nystik_u:9289_2: vikriyate tadā catuḥṣaṣṭhitrayeṇa dvānavataṃ śataṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:9293: te punarvyāpakāvyāpakā vyadhikaraṇaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyavyadhikaraṇasandigdadhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyavyadhikaraṇāsamarthaviśe ṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedena catuḥṣaṣṭitrayeṇa dvānavataṃ śatamaparam //
GSP29nystik_u:9297: te punaraprasiddhāśrayāḥ pūrvavadbhedena vyadhikaraṇaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasandigdhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasamarthaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedena catuḥṣaṣṭitraye sati dvānavataṃ śatam /
GSP29nystik_u:9298: tadevamanantarābhyāṃ dvānavataśatābhyāṃ śatatrayaṃ caturaśītaṃ yat tadevāṣṭāviṃśakaśatābhyāṃ dvānavatena ca śatena saṃpiṇḍitaṃ dvātriṃśaduttarāṣṭaśatī vikārabhūtā bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:9302: uktaṃ hi prāg yathā na deśo 'gnimattayā sādhyo 'pi tu dhūmaviśeṣa eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:9308: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatve sati kṛtakatvāditi kṛtakatvasyaiva viśeṣyasya sāmarthyādasamarthamanityatve prayatnānantarīyakatvam,
GSP29nystik_u:9310: vyadhikaraṇatayā asiddhaṃ ca koṣṭhavāyutālvādikriyāyāṃ eva prayatnānantarīyakatvam,
GSP29nystik_u:9323: candanaśabdādatyantaṃ vibhinnārthāḥ samudāyasamudāyyasaṃbhave sati rūpādīnāmarthānāṃ rūpādiśabdānāṃ ca tena candanaśabdena vyapadiśyamānatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:9324: candanasya rūpādaya iti samudāyasamudāyyasaṃbhavo rūpādiṣu vyapadeśaśca rūpādiśabdeṣviti vyadhikaraṇaṃ viśeṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9327: seyaṃ kriyābhyāvṛttiryathā śabdānityatve 'pyupapadyate tathā dvitīye darśayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:9329: viśeṣaṇaśabdaḥ tantreṇa viśeṣaṇe viśeṣye ca karmakaraṇasādhanatayā prayukto vartate /
GSP29nystik_u:9330: tena sandigdhaṃ viśeṣaṇam aprasiddhaṃ vyadhikaraṇatayā viśeṣyaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣāmudāharaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9331: yathā sandihyamāne dhūmādibhāve 'gnimān deśo dhūmavattve sati prakāśakatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:9339: ye ye sandigdhāsiddhā vyāpakāvyāpakabhedena dvātriṃśat ta
GSP29nystik_u:9340_0: evobhayānyatarāsiddhyā catuḥṣaṣṭirbhavanti tataḥ kimityata āha--te catuḥṣaṣṭitāmāpannāḥ
GSP29nystik_u:9355: dvātriṃśaduttarayā aṣṭaśatyā sahasramekaṃ caturaśītisahitā ca navaśatī /
GSP29nystik_u:9356: tadevaṃ prakṛtibhūtāṣṭā catvāriṃśatprakṣepeṇa saṃpiṇḍitaṃ dvātriṃśe dve sahasre bhavata iti //
GSP29nystik_u:9365: pañcānāṃ hetūnāṃ sarūpāsarūpapratibandhāt pañca pañcakā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:9372: anvayyādāvekaikasmin sarūpāsarūpāḥ pañca hetavaḥ pratibandhakā iti pañcabhiḥ pañcakaiḥ pañcaviṃśatirviruddhāvyabhicāriṇa
GSP29nystik_u:9377: samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedakaṃ ca lakṣaṇasūtramiti tatraiva pramāṇam na tviyattāyāmatatparatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:9387: yasya tu savyabhicārapadārtho 'prasiddhaḥ prasiddhaścānaikāntikapadārthastaṃ prati savyabhicāra iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9390: tatra savyabhicāra iti lakṣaṇapadaṃ kakṣīkṛtyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ vyabhicāra
GSP29nystik_u:9395: tad vārttikakāraḥ paryudāsābhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe---ekasminnante niyata aikāntika iti /
GSP29nystik_u:9396: na heturaikāntiko yena tadanyatvena hetvābhāsamātrasaṃgrahādekajātīyatvena hetvābhāsānāṃ vibhāgasūtravirodhaḥ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:9397: kiṃ tvekasminnante yo niyataḥ sa aikāntikaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9398: tadviparyayādanaikāntiko 'niyato 'nityatve ca nityatve cānvayena ca vyatirekeṇa cobhayapakṣagāmīti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:9400: tadevam anaikāntikaḥ savyabhicāraḥ iti sthite pṛcchati---kaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:9415: bhāvadharmau hi vyabhicārāvyabhicārau nābhāve sarvopākhyāvirahiṇi yujyete ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9418: kevalamayaṃ prasajyapratiṣedhavallabhastamāsthāya sarvaṃ dūṣayatīti tamevāṅgīkṛtya sarvatra brūma
GSP29nystik_u:9425: api tu kasyacid vastuno 'bhāvena viśiṣṭaṃ kiñcideva vastvityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:9430: vaidharmye vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasya vaiparītyāditi vaidharmyavyabhicāramāha---dṛṣṭānte sparśavattvamanityatvaṃ ca dharmau na sādhyasādhanabhūtau gṛhyete /
GSP29nystik_u:9431: na hi yadanityaṃ tat sarvaṃ sparśavad buddhyādibhirvyabhicārāt /
GSP29nystik_u:9437: tathāpi yadasparśavanna bhavati tannityamapi na bhavatīti vaidharmyaṃ vyabhicarati,
GSP29nystik_u:9440: atra vārttikakāro 'sparśavattvasya hetoḥ praśnapūrvakaṃ svarūpaṃ niṣkarṣati---kiṃ punastat asparśatvaṃ śabdād
GSP29nystik_u:9448: yadi hi kvacit śāstrapradeśe anaikāntikaḥ kathitaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9449: taddeśātilaṅghanena atrātidiśyamāno viditarūpa iha savyabhicāraṃ lakṣayet,
GSP29nystik_u:9462: no khalūdāharaṇamādriyante parīkṣakāḥ kiṃ tu lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ// 5 //
GSP29nystik_u:9469: yaścābhyupagacchati cetano nāsāvanyatamena hetulakṣaṇena yujyate iti na hetvābhāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9470: na ca pakṣaḥ siddhānta iti tadvirodhī na viruddhaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9472: abhyupagamaviṣayamātravivakṣayā ca siddhāntaśabdaḥ prayukto na punaḥ siddhānta
